['', 'Cloud experience is must - GCP preferable.', 'Values-driven and engaged leadership', 'Database - Strong SQL experience, NoSQL (good to have).', 'Cloud experience is must - GCP preferable.One or more of these programming skills: Python (a PLUS), Golang, JavaWebservices – should be able to write and consume RESTful webservices.Database - Strong SQL experience, NoSQL (good to have).Should be able to write complex queries involving Inner and Outer Joins.Should be able to write User Defined FunctionsShould have good analytical skills - should be able to analyze the given data to find incorrectness Good to have - any front end technology - Angular, Node.js, React.', 'Employment Type', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Economics, Engineering, or a comparable discipline', 'Information Technology and Services', 'Good to have - any front end technology - Angular, Node.js, React.', '\xa0Mindtree Equal Employment Opportunity Policy', 'Good work-life balance encouraged', '\xa0Educational Qualifications', 'Welcome to possible', 'Should be able to write User Defined Functions', 'Mindtree [NSE: MINDTREE] is a global technology consulting and services company, helping enterprises marry scale with agility to achieve competitive advantage. “Born digital,” in 1999 and now a Larsen & Toubro Group Company, Mindtree applies its deep domain knowledge to 300+ enterprise client engagements to break down silos, make sense of digital complexity and bring new initiatives to market faster. We enable IT to move at the speed of business, leveraging emerging technologies and the efficiencies of Continuous Delivery to spur business innovation. ['', 'In Conversation with Dr. Arif Nathoo, Komodo Health’s CEO', ' Owned ingestion of several complex data sources and / or enhanced existing data sources.  Participated in design and implemented distributed data systems using Spark or similar technologies. Company InformationEnergyHub is a growing enterprise software company that works with the most forward-thinking companies in smart energy. Our platform lets consumers turn their smart thermostats, electric cars, water heaters, and other products into virtual power plants that keep the grid stable and enable higher penetration of solar and wind power. We work on technology that already provides energy and cost savings to millions of people through partnerships with the leading companies in the Internet of Things.Company BenefitsEnergyHub offers a generous benefits package including 100% paid medical for employees and a 401(k) with employer match. ['', 'Minimum Experience, Skills, and Education:', 'Roles & Responsibilities:', '- 7+ years of cloud-based data science or algorithm experience', 'Duties:', '**BioIntelliSense is proud to be an equal opportunity employer.  All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, veteran, disability status or any other status protected under federal, state or local law.', 'Data Science Engineer', '- Being able to work under pressure in a startup environment', ' sensor fusion algorithms', '- Mentoring junior members of team in technical areas', 'The ideal candidate will have a mix of research with a solid track record of engineering execution with at least 7+ years of experience as a full-stack data scientist with Google Cloud or AWS expertise. Experience with time-series sensor data at scale along with sensor fusion algorithms background.', '- Developing ML models from time-series sensor and bio-signal data', '- Masters or Ph.D. helpful, but not required', 'This is a unique opportunity to apply your experience, roll-up-your-sleeves and significantly contribute to the rapid development, growth and expansion of BioIntelliSense in delivering clinical intelligence, globally. ', 'time-series sensor data', '- Running data science experiments at scale on Google Cloud infrastructure ', 'We are seeking a Data Science Engineer to help spearhead our catalogue of cloud-based BioSignatures for early detection and screening for various disease states and physiological deterioration.  ', 'We are looking for top talent anywhere in the U.S.A, with a preference for the Denver, CO, or Northern California areas for a role that is work from home, with occasional travel to meet with the engineering team (once the pandemic is under control). ', '- BS in related field', 'PM20', 'For more information on how BioIntelliSense is redefining remote patient monitoring through medical-grade and cost-effective data services, please contact us at info@biointellisense.com or visit our website at BioIntelliSense.com.', "BioIntelliSense is ushering in a new era of continuous health monitoring and clinical intelligence for Remote Patient Monitoring (RPM) and Screening (COVID-19/Infection). Our medical-grade Data-as-a-Service (DaaS) platform seamlessly captures multi-parameter vital signs, physiological biometrics and symptomatic events through an effortless patient experience. The FDA-cleared BioSticker and BioButton devices make remote monitoring and early detection simple. Through the platform's advanced analytics, clinicians, patients, and employers will now have access to high-resolution patient trending and reporting to enable medical grade care at home, and medical grade screening in the office, school, or residence.", '- Developing and reviewing system architecture to optimize the balance across cloud vs. edge processing. ']

job_text: ['', 'A Little About Us', 'Help bring Data & Analytics Engineering operations into the future!', 'Demonstrates leadership and active pursuit of optimizing CI/CD process and tools, testing frameworks and practices ', 'Analyze technical system problems, and design and implement effective solutions', 'Data Engineer/Sr Data Engineer - Master Data Management Team ', 'Handle end-to-end development, including coding, testing, and debugging during each cycle', 'Must be proactive, demonstrate initiative, and be a logical thinker.', 'Identify and recommend appropriate continuous improvement opportunities', 'Develop automated tests for multiple scopes (Unit, System, Integration, Regression)', "Bachelor's or Master's degree in technical or business discipline or equivalent experience, technical degree preferred.", ' Work with a team committed to excellence!Help bring Data & Analytics Engineering operations into the future!Model and promote a “Data First” attitudeWork with a modern tech stack! company: Wisconsin Court System / Wisconsin Supreme Court
job_text: ['', 'Required: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field and at least three years of work experience in data analysis, data profiling and SQL. Preferred: Graduate degree/advanced certifications in computer science or information technology and at least one year of work experience in data engineering.', 'Data Engineer', ' ', '1) Employment will require a criminal background check. 2) Must meet the minimum standards for driving a state vehicle. 3) Must be able to travel throughout the State of Wisconsin with occasional overnights.', 'SALARY', 'Preferred:', 'Required: 1) Design, develop and optimize ETL solutions, stored procedures/views using SQL and tools like Talend and Informatica. 2) Create data visualizations, reports, dashboards and analytical solutions using tools like Tableau, Advanced Excel (e.g. Pivot Tables) and automate report generation processes using job schedulers. 3) Provide ad-hoc analytics support to judicial policymakers and court officials to drive court system decision making. 4) Improve data quality and fix data issues in dashboards, reports, data warehouses, operational data stores and other disparate data sources. 5) Document data warehouse ecosystem and administration process.', 'single .pdf document', 'SALARY: Data Analyst: $56,640 to $70,517, Data Engineer: $70,800 to $90,624 annually with a State of Wisconsin benefits package. Appropriate position and salary will be determined based on the selected candidate’s qualifications and experience.', 'QUALIFICATIONS:', 'CLASSIFICATION: ', 'Preferred: 6) Monitor and recommend enhancements for Justice data warehouse ecosystem based as needed in order to update data warehouse scope and capabilities. 7) Design and develop data models using tools like pgModeler. 8) Administer and manage Linux servers for ETL applications (e.g. Talend) and business intelligence applications (e.g. Tableau) Tableau server and Talend server to keep pace with changing demands and scale. 9) Administer and manage Tableau server and Talend server to keep pace with changing demands and scale. 10) Analyze data with statistical techniques like regression and other machine learning algorithms using software like Python or R.', 'LOCATION: ', 'LOCATION: Madison, WI with occasional statewide travel required.', 'TO APPLY:\xa0', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:\xa0', 'Please submit a cover letter, resume, and writing sample in a single .pdf document indicating the position Data Analyst-Data Engineer #20-1606 to human.resources@wicourts.gov.\xa0All materials should address your relevant education, experience, and skills as it relates to the qualifications and special requirements listed above.\xa0Failure to follow these procedures may result in your disqualification. ', 'Required:', 'SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS:\xa0', 'Data Analyst-Data Engineer #20-1606', 'The Wisconsin Court System has an exciting opportunity for a skilled and experienced data professional to make a valuable contribution to the Wisconsin criminal justice system. Candidates who meet core qualifications will be considered for the position of Data Analyst and candidates who meet the core qualifications and the preferred qualifications will be considered for the position of Data Engineer.', 'Data Analyst', 'In order to be assured consideration, applications must be received by 11:59 PM on January 22, 2021. The Wisconsin Court System will provide reasonable accommodations to qualified applicants when requested. For additional information on the court system visit our website at www.wicourts.gov.', 'CLASSIFICATION: Data Analyst or Data Engineer depending on qualifications and experience.', 'DEADLINE:\xa0']

['', 'Ø\xa0Work on Python, Apache Spark, Kafka, MongoDB, and Machine Learning', 'Data Engineer--Clinical Data Science', '\xa0\xa0', 'Ø\xa0Additional responsibilities include developing prototypes and proof of concepts\xa0for the selected use cases, and implementing complex machine learning pipeline', ' ', 'Formed in September 2013, The Mount Sinai Health System combines the excellence of the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai with seven premier hospital campuses, including Mount Sinai Beth Israel, Mount Sinai Beth Israel Brooklyn, The Mount Sinai Hospital, Mount Sinai Queens, Mount Sinai Roosevelt, Mount Sinai St. Luke’s, and New York Eye and Ear Infirmary of Mount Sinai.', 'Knowledge of deploying and maintain the Machine Learning Software in production environment.', 'Minimum of 2 years job experience in related field', 'Proficient with at least 1 programming languages among Scala/Python/Java/C/C++. Must be flexible and fast to pick up new languages.', 'The Mount Sinai Health System', 'Are you ready to discover the limitless possibilities of big data analytics and machine learning on improving the patient’s care? Are you interested in learning and developing machine learning data product?', 'The Data Engineer will work on learning and creating batch and streaming machine learning pipeline for\xa0accelerating translational research and improving clinical care.\xa0Day to day responsibilities include:', 'Knowledge of cloud architecture and implementation on\xa0Azure or AWS is a big plus.', 'Duties and Responsibilities:', 'Knowledge of Supervised and Un-supervised Learning', 'Hands-on experiences on Apache Spark, Kafka, MongoDB, Apache Nifi \xa0and other big data technology stacks and streaming tools.Familiarity with and the ability to leverage a wide variety of open source technologies and tools.Knowledge of cloud architecture and implementation on\xa0Azure or AWS is a big plus.Advanced Knowledge of Machine Learning', '\xa0', 'Preferred Qualification:', 'Data Engineer ', 'Ø\xa0Create machine learning pipeline using big-data technology stacks \xa0', ' Basic Qualification:', "Bachelor's degree in Engineering (e.g. Computer Science , Biomedical Informatics, Physics, Statistics)", 'Proficient on Big Data Technology Stacks like Apache Spark, Apache Kafka, NoSQL, and Machine Learning.', 'The Mount Sinai Health System’s commitment to excellence extends beyond delivering world-class health care. The System’s ongoing success is dependent upon our highly motivated, nonclinical professionals working to improve business operations. Our leadership team is driven to provide exceptional service by cultivating a workforce that is dedicated to upholding Mount Sinai’s mission of delivering innovative, breakthrough medicine with compassion and integrity.', 'Over 35,000 employees strong, the mission of the Mount Sinai Health System is to provide compassionate patient care with seamless coordination and to advance medicine through unrivaled education, research, and outreach in the many diverse communities we serve.', 'Who We Are:', 'Hands-on experiences on Apache Spark, Kafka, MongoDB, Apache Nifi \xa0and other big data technology stacks and streaming tools.', 'Advanced Knowledge of Machine Learning', "Bachelor's degree in Engineering (e.g. Computer Science , Biomedical Informatics, Physics, Statistics)Minimum of 2 years job experience in related fieldProficient with at least 1 programming languages among Scala/Python/Java/C/C++. Must be flexible and fast to pick up new languages.Proficient on Big Data Technology Stacks like Apache Spark, Apache Kafka, NoSQL, and Machine Learning.Knowledge of Supervised and Un-supervised LearningKnowledge of deploying and maintain the Machine Learning Software in production environment.", 'Familiarity with and the ability to leverage a wide variety of open source technologies and tools.', 'Are You Ready?\xa0', 'Do you have what it takes to wear the badge?']

['', 'Contributing to internal programming packages for more efficient analytical tooling', 'What You’ll Be Doing.', 'What We’ll Expect From You', ' We value development. You will work with some of the smartest and most interesting people in the industry. We are a high-performance organization that is always challenging ourselves to continuously grow. We maintain a growth mindset in everything we do and invest deeply in employee development through formalized mentorship, LinkedIn Learning tracks, and other internal programs. We also provide all employees with reimbursement for relevant conferences, training, and education. We care about your physical, financial and mental well-being. We offer competitive health, dental, and vision benefits for employees and their dependents, a monthly gym reimbursement to support your physical health, and a commute or internet allowance to make your trips to your office or your desk easier. We offer generous parental leave with transition time built-in upon return to work. We offer competitive compensation and a 401k plan with up to a 4% employer match.  We support our remote employee experience. While we have great office spaces in NYC, Cambridge and Palo Alto, we’re very distributed—we use a number of communication tools to connect across the company—and all remote employees have the opportunity to visit our offices and meet their teams face-to-face at team offsites. We also have an annual company offsite, Shark Week, to get quality in-person time with the entire company at least once a year. We also allow employees to outfit their workstations to meet their needs—whether remote or in office. We value diversity and inclusivity. We are an equal opportunity employer and we do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. ', 'We value diversity and inclusivity. ", 'Azure Data Lake', 'Must be decisive and show ability to work with clients and assist their business and technical decision-making.', 'Contribute collaboratively to team meetings using your experience base to further the cause of innovating for OmniData clients.', 'OmniData Is An Equal Opportunity Employer And All Qualified Applicants Will Receive Consideration For Employment Without Regard To Race, Color, Religion, Sex, National Origin, Disability Status, Protected Veteran Status, Or Any Other Characteristic Protected By Law.', 'Analytical approach to problem-solving; ability to use technology to solve business problems', 'Salary and benefits commensurate with experience. ', 'SQL Server Analysis Services (Tabular & Multi-Dimensional)', 'Experience and a proven track-record with designing and building solutions in Azure is required.', 'Work independently toward client success, at the same time knowing your own limitations and when to call on your OmniData team for help.', 'What does our recruitment process look like?', 'You need to be a Microsoft Certified Azure Data Engineer or demonstrate experience in the same skill set. ']

['', 'POSITION:\xa0Senior Data Engineer', 'EMPLOYMENT STATUS:\xa0Direct Hire', '-Perform Data Services benchmarking, enhancements, optimizations, and platform analytics', '-Participate in research, development, and adoption of trends in big data, BI, and analytics', '-Produce and maintain accurate project documentation for moderate to complex ETL processes', '-Quality driven', '-Analytical', '-Collaborate with various data providers to resolve data issues', 'DIRECT REPORTS:', 'The Data Services team mission is to unify data across the enterprise to optimize business decisions made at the strategic, tactical, and operational levels of the organization. We accomplish this by providing an Enterprise Data Warehouse, reporting platform, and business processes that provide quality data, in a timely fashion, from any channel of the company and present them in such a manner to maximize the value of that data for both internal and external customers.', 'DEPARTMENT:\xa0', 'REPORTING SUPERVISOR:\xa0Solutions Architect, Data Services', 'QUALIFICATIONS:', '-Experience with big data technologies like Snowflake, Spark, Scala, Kafka, Hbase, Hadoop, HDFS, AVRO, MongoDB, Redshift, and Mesos is a plus', "Education:\xa0Bachelor's degree preferred or equivalent experience\xa0", '-Determine methods and procedures for new or existing standards, operating procedures, and data processing tools.', '-1-year experience programing in C++, C#, or Python a plus', 'DEPARTMENT:\xa0Data Services\xa0', '-Interact cross-functionally with a variety of people, teams, and management. Work closely with analysts from sales, marketing, HR, and Finance, as well as product development, and data scientists, to identify opportunities and assess improvements of our products and services', '-Advanced to Expert working knowledge of ANSI SQL or Microsoft Transact-SQL (T-SQL) and demonstrated ability to create ad-hoc SQL queries to analyze data, create prototypes, etc.', '-Experience with visual data analysis using tools such as Tableau, QlikView/QlikSense, Microstrategy, or other Business Intelligence platforms.', 'TRAVEL REQUIREMENTS:\xa0N/A', '-Strong organizational skills with the ability to prioritize and execute tasks across multiple projects with tight deadlines and aggressive goals.', 'ABOUT THE JOB:', '\xa0', 'TRAVEL REQUIREMENTS:\xa0', '-Design database systems and develop tools for real-time and offline analytic processing', 'DIRECT REPORTS:\xa0No', 'ABOUT THE TEAM:', 'POSITION:', '-Perform peer code reviews for other Seniors and Data Engineers, as well as train, mentor, and provide guidance to Data Engineers and other Data -Services and business users on processes and standards the Data Services group has established', 'FLSA:\xa0', 'SCHEDULE:', '-Detail oriented', '-Passionate about data', 'Education:', '-Independently design an effective and maintainable solution based on the gathered requirements that meet reliability, accuracy, and performance standards while also meeting or exceeding the user expectations', '-Excellent verbal and written communication skills.', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', '-Contribute to the definition and development of the overall data roadmap by making recommendations', 'Experience:', 'REPORTING SUPERVISOR:', '-Standardize data that helps generate insights and addresses reporting needs', 'FLSA:\xa0Exempt', 'Knowledge/Skills/Abilities:', 'The Senior Data Engineer is responsible for designing and developing automated ETL processes for Business Intelligence reporting to facilitate business operations. This role will be part of a team adopting and implementing new data technologies and tools like Spark, Scala, HBase, Hadoop, HDFS, MongoDB and/or others to provide faster, more accurate, and deeper insights into our products and services. As a senior member of the growing data services and business analytics team, this person will be a key contributor to the successful deployment of strategic future state capabilities critical for our business. It will be this person’s responsibility to perform code reviews, identify additional opportunities for efficiency, mentor team members, and be the subject matter expert for specific areas of the Enterprise Data Warehouse (EDW). Over time, these subject areas will be rotated to ensure each senior member gets an opportunity to have a full knowledge of the EDW.', 'EMPLOYMENT STATUS:\xa0', '-Experience with public or hybrid cloud environments are a plus.', '-Positive and creative attitude', '-Minimum 3 years of experience with Snowflake, MS SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB required', '-Design, develop, and test moderate to complex ETL processes using a variety of tools, which may include Transact-SQL, SSIS, Stored Procedures, -Functions, and existing ETL tool accelerators in Snowflake or SQL Server 2014 and later environments.', '-Minimum 5 years of experience with SQL required', '\ufeffPersonal Attributes:', '-Committed to personal development and professional growth', '-Minimum 3 years of experience with database design and development required', '-Integrate data from a variety of sources, assuring that they adhere to data quality and accessibility standards', 'SCHEDULE:\xa0Standard business hours']

['', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Management Information Systems, Physics, or related field is required ', 'Own the creation and maintenance of company data structures and databases in AWS to support predictive model development, analytics, and business intelligence.Implement, test, document, and deploy integrations and maintain production readiness for cloud-based technology stack including real-time streaming, batch feeds, and predictions models from multiple cloud-based and on-premise sources.Take on specific ETL projects to assimilate data from multiple new structured and unstructured data sources in batch or real-time, as appropriate.Assimilate and implement business rules to process raw data. Strong verbal and written communications skills that enable you to explain data infrastructure complexity with clarity and precision to executive management.', 'What you will contribute:', 'Must have hands-on experience with AWS services: Lambda, Athena, Redshift Spectrum, Glue, S3, EKS, EC2, EMR, Kinesis, and RDS.', '3+ years of professional experience working with SQL and Python with working knowledge PySpark.', 'Passion for taking ownership of new opportunities and projects.', 'Own the creation and maintenance of company data structures and databases in AWS to support predictive model development, analytics, and business intelligence.', '\xa0', 'What the job looks like:', 'Experience with DevOps and CI/CD preferred.', 'Reporting Systems experience with PowerBI & Tableau ', 'What you should bring to the table:', 'As a key member of the Big Data Analytics team, you will be responsible for creating and operating the Big Data environment that enables eFinancial and Fidelity Life Association to optimize business processes and grow rapidly. You will move and integrate data across multiple disparate systems, aggregate and organize large sets of data in order to enable lead operations, analytics, and predictive modeling. If you would love being an owner-operator of a fast-growing complex online business with modern technology stacks, building analytical and infrastructure solutions, and driving success via analytics, this role is for you!', 'Ability to think strategically to anticipate and plan for future business needs.', '3+ years of professional data engineer experience working with large data sets and predictive services ', 'Fidelity Life', 'Experience with DevOps and CI/CD preferred.Reporting Systems experience with PowerBI & Tableau Front End Engineering—JavaScript (Angular, React, Vue, Node, etc.), HTML, CSS', 'What the job looks like', 'Knowledge and experience in Big Data and in building Data Pipelines/ETL processes.', 'Fidelity Life is a leading provider of financial security for middle market consumers. With a history of innovation, the company is redefining the life insurance industry with patented products and processes. Fidelity Life pioneered the use of predictive analytics to streamline the new business process and revolutionize the speed with which policies can be issued. Established in 1896, Fidelity Life enjoys a long track-record of success and continues to build its reputation of sound fiscal management and customer-focused innovation. ', 'Together, Fidelity Life and eFinancial are revolutionizing the life insurance industry to make life insurance more accessible and affordable for everyday Americans. With an integrated marketing, product manufacturing, and controlled distribution system, the enterprise is uniquely positioned for growth.\xa0', 'In concert with Fidelity Life, eFinancial is an online and call-center-based insurance agency with a proven direct-to-consumer life insurance model. Using a proprietary and patented sales technology platform, eFinancial operates call centers in Chicago, IL; Seattle, WA; and Tempe, AZ. eFinancial’s licensed agents and representatives reach thousands of consumers each day to help meet their unique life insurance needs – often with just a single phone call. To complement this channel, the company recently expanded to offer an entirely digital purchase experience.', 'Serve as data steward for Analytics team and third-party technology partners.', 'eFinancial', '\xa0Nice to have skills and experience:', 'Front End Engineering—JavaScript (Angular, React, Vue, Node, etc.), HTML, CSS', 'Assimilate and implement business rules to process raw data. Set up visualization tools to meet the needs of both cloud and on-premise user community.']

['We are currently seeking a Senior Data Engineer / ETL Developer with experience in the design, development, and implementation of ETL solutions, data modeling, and construction of business intelligence and analytics solutions, including database design, core data architecture, and data transformation and processing systems. Candidates will be tasked with the analysis of business data and requirements, and the transformation of those requirements into data analytics solutions to support the business strategy of the Group. Strong written and oral communication skills are essential and candidates should be self-directed and motivated to work in a fast paced, team-oriented environment. Major responsibilities include: \uf0b7 Requirements gathering, design, development, and implementation of business intelligence solutions which can be leveraged by end-users \uf0b7 Hands-on development of ETL, internal/external data feeds and reporting solutions \uf0b7 Development of surveillance patterns and deep analytics processing solutions against big data stores \uf0b7 Design and development of data models, reports and visualization and analytics solutions needed to support dynamic business intelligence capabilities \uf0b7 Support of critical production systems, including, when necessary, off-hours support Location: Princeton, NJ Organizational Structure: The Sr. Data Engineer will report directly to the Sr. VP of Business Systems Development. Qualifications: \uf0b7 Experience working independently with users to define BI concepts, information needs and functional requirements, specifications and database models to determine appropriate data warehouse, ETL and BI report development solutions \uf0b7 Extraction and analysis of data, patterns, and related trends as needed, with the subsequent ability to synthesize the data into information consumable by the organization \uf0b7 Experience in database design and data modeling \uf0b7 Advanced knowledge of SQL scripting and working with relational database systems \uf0b7 Expert knowledge of Linux/UNIX and shell scripting and Cloud exp\uf0b7 Experience with very large data warehouse systems is a plus \uf0b7 Well versed in industry standard architecture design methodologies and processes \uf0b7 Strong written and oral communication skills \uf0b7 Self-directed and motivated to work in a fast paced team-oriented environment Education and Experience: \uf0b7 Minimum of a Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science or Engineering \uf0b7 Five plus years of experience building ETL and related data processing and transformation technologies to build large-scale data analytics solutions \uf0b7 Financial industry experience is a plus']

This person will help build the data platform and solutions necessary to level-up our analytics capability, effectively surfacing insights to internal users and clients. You’ll work closely with members of the tech team and stakeholders across the business to deliver highly impactful solutions.']

job_title: Senior Data Engineer - Platform Data Science & Engineering

engineering team, understand their challenges, and make opinionated recommendations that empower them with data solutions to efficiently scale Netflix infrastructure and tools Maintain and rethink regression, classification, clustering etcJoin a stunning team of data experts with diverse skill set, and deliver excellent solutions that better enable our decision-making process', 'Engineer and deliver excellent solutions that better enable our decision-making process', 'What You Will Do', 'Excel at taking vague requirements and crystallizing them into scalable data solutions ', 'Develop ['', 'You have 5+ years of experience as a data engineer coding in Python and using SQL.', "We're Brigit, a financial health app for the everyday American. By using cash flow data to automate finances, not only do we help people today, but also empower them to start saving for tomorrow and permanently transform their financial future. Brigit analyzes data from billions of individual bank transactions and formulates a deep understanding of each member’s cash-flow mismatches and spending habits. Using that data, we're able to send no-fee predictive advances and help millions of Americans avoid late payment fees, predatory overdraft fees, and interest rates. Our initial product is focused on disrupting the predatory $44 Billion payday loan and overdraft market and our future products will continue to empower and improve the lives of over 100M underserved Americans!", 'Your Role', 'Competitive compensation package with stock options at a high-growth startupDay 1 benefit coverage for health, dental, and vision401k participationOffer competitive paid parental leave policy', "What You'll Do ", 'A self starter who searches out problems and can work with Eng/Business management to prioritize.', "You have 5+ years of experience as a data engineer coding in Python and using SQL.Experience in a fast-paced consumer finance or fintech environment is strongly preferred.You have familiarity with Google Cloud and data warehousing technologies like Snowflake.An expert in data engineering using tools like Spark, Pandas, Airflow, Luigi, etc.You love empowering and enabling others to be able to answer questions efficiently.You can communicate with a cross functional team and articulate ideas to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.A self starter who searches out problems and can work with Eng/Business management to prioritize.You've had exposure to modeling pipelines and analysis workflows.People management experience is a plus!\xa0", "You've had exposure to modeling pipelines and analysis workflows.", 'An expert in data engineering using tools like Spark, Pandas, Airflow, Luigi, etc.', 'Monitor and manage our ETL pipelines, train other engineers and data analysts to contribute to our data infrastructure.', 'Lay the groundwork for our ETL infrastructure, setting up tools like Airflow and Spark to enable the rest of the team to contribute data pipelines, for us to be able to monitor data reliability and quality and grow our data footprint sustainably.', 'You love empowering and enabling others to be able to answer questions efficiently.', "We’re hiring a Senior Data Engineer to join our team responsible for building Brigit’s data platforms.\xa0You'll work closely with our Data Scientists, Engineers, and Product Managers as a thought partner, technical leader and resource. This is a unique opportunity to help build the data strategy and architecture at a data driven startup that’s changing the world of fintech.", 'Experience in a fast-paced consumer finance or fintech environment is strongly preferred.', '\ufeffWhat You Have', 'You can communicate with a cross functional team and articulate ideas to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.', 'Work directly with the team of data analysts and other business teams to understand our analytics goals and pain points.Lay the groundwork for our ETL infrastructure, setting up tools like Airflow and Spark to enable the rest of the team to contribute data pipelines, for us to be able to monitor data reliability and quality and grow our data footprint sustainably.Monitor and manage our ETL pipelines, train other engineers and data analysts to contribute to our data infrastructure.Work closely with the Co-founder and CTO to build a first class data organization.', 'People management experience is a plus!\xa0', 'Offer competitive paid parental leave policy', 'Work directly with the team of data analysts and other business teams to understand our analytics goals and pain points.', 'Day 1 benefit coverage for health, dental, and vision', 'Our team is small, nimble and customer centric. If autonomy, ownership and having a meaningful say in the direction of the Company you work for is important to you - apply today!', 'Work closely with the Co-founder and CTO to build a first class data organization.', 'You have familiarity with Google Cloud and data warehousing technologies like Snowflake.', 'Competitive compensation package with stock options at a high-growth startup', 'Our Benefits & Team ', '401k participation']

job_title: Sr. Big Data Engineer / Sr. Data Engineer
job_text: ['', ' Experience with Analytical stores like Snowflake would be a plus.', " Must have worked with AWS services like EMR, S3, EC2, Athena, ECS and knowledge of IAM, Step functions, Lambda's is an addon.", ' Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management.', " Experience building and optimizing 'big data' data pipelines, architectures and data sets.", ' Experience working on Machine learning models will be a plus.', ' Experience creating CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins.', 'Preferred Skill:', ' following software/tools:', 'PySpark', 'Python ', 'We are looking for a candidate with minimum 5+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role, who has attained a Graduate degree in Computer Science, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field. They should also have experience using the', 'EMR', ' Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.', ' Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.', ' Strong project management and organizational skills.', ' Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets.', '\xa0', 'NumPy/Pandas', 'AWS – Athena, S3, ECS', ' Experience with the github version control system.', ' A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.', ' Expertise in Python language developing data engineering applications (ETL) using Spark, pandas, numpy, pyarrow/fastparquet, pyspark, pytest, behave', 'Duration: 12+ Month', 'Spark', ' Experience working on data pipelines that consume a wide variety of data formats e.g parquet, avro, json and csv from AWS S3.', 'Location: McLean ,VA ( Remote till Covid) ', 'Mandatory Skills:', ' Very good experience developing ETL pipelines on Apache Spark and experience with Hadoop, Databricks etc will be good to have.', ' Experience with stream-processing systems: Spark-Streaming, Storm etc will be a plus.', ' Must have Advanced working SQL knowledge, understanding and writing complex SQL queries, fine tuning the performance of queries.', 'Position: Sr. Big Data Engineer / Sr. Data Engineer', 'Snowflake - preferred']

['', 'About Sprout Social', 'Whenever possible, Sprout wants to provide our team with the flexibility to work in the location that makes the most sense for them. ['Solid problem solving skillset', "I am working with one of Europe's fastest growing Fintech firms who we have supported over the last 15-18 months build out their first international office in New York. ['', 'Experience with monetizing consumer products or paid digital goods', 'Proficiency with relational database (e.g., SQL) and statistical analysis/programming languages (e.g., R / Python)', 'Experience interfacing with executive or C-suite level stakeholders', ' You will be deeply integrated with our innovative Economy team, which moves quickly and is constantly experimenting with unique product ideas to help achieve revenue goals. You’ll play a key role in determining the monetization strategy for users throughout their lifecycle. You’ll play with petabytes of data full of user interactions and events to develop new revenue opportunities that will impact the entire company.  In addition, you will work side by side with a world-class org of Engineering, ML, Search, Data Science, Data Warehouse, and Analytics practitioners who work together to create a variety of capabilities for Reddit to be more successful in its decision-making and product creation. In this process, you will be exposed to a variety of new techniques in experimentation, statistical frameworks, machine learning, deep learning, and causal inference. ', 'How You’ll Have Impact', 'In addition, you will work side by side with a world-class org of Engineering, ML, Search, Data Science, Data Warehouse, and Analytics practitioners who work together to create a variety of capabilities for Reddit to be more successful in its decision-making and product creation. In this process, you will be exposed to a variety of new techniques in experimentation, statistical frameworks, machine learning, deep learning, and causal inference.', 'Who You Might Be', ' Interface with the Executive team on the data reasoning behind product strategy: why we are doubling down on specific bets and what is the expected outcome Lead proactive exploratory data analysis, distill data insights into strong product recommendations and own the A/B tests in order to ideate new opportunities for monetizing Redditors via coins, awarding, premium subscriptions, or a completely new product idea Partner with Eng and Product to define and execute Economy’s roadmap and initiatives Define team metrics and goals and scale data-informed decision making through ETLs and reporting dashboards Mentor and guide analysts from across the company on best practices, techniques, and thought processes ', 'Partner with Eng and Product to define and execute Economy’s roadmap and initiatives', 'Mentor and guide analysts from across the company on best practices, techniques, and thought processes', 'Define team metrics and goals and scale data-informed decision making through ETLs and reporting dashboards', 'Lead proactive exploratory data analysis, distill data insights into strong product recommendations and own the A/B tests in order to ideate new opportunities for monetizing Redditors via coins, awarding, premium subscriptions, or a completely new product idea', 'You will be deeply integrated with our innovative Economy team, which moves quickly and is constantly experimenting with unique product ideas to help achieve revenue goals. You’ll play a key role in determining the monetization strategy for users throughout their lifecycle. You’ll play with petabytes of data full of user interactions and events to develop new revenue opportunities that will impact the entire company. ', 'What You’ll Do', 'What You’ll Learn', 'Demonstrated ability to ideate data research, distill insights into strong product recommendations and lead A/B tests to test the data-led hypotheses', 'Desire to mentor other data scientists and share best practices to elevate the data science practice at Reddit', ' 7+ years of experience in data analytics or related quantitative role Demonstrated ability to influence, guide, and ideate product strategy with data Demonstrated ability to ideate data research, distill insights into strong product recommendations and lead A/B tests to test the data-led hypotheses Experience with monetizing consumer products or paid digital goods Experience interfacing with executive or C-suite level stakeholders Desire to mentor other data scientists and share best practices to elevate the data science practice at Reddit Proficiency with relational database (e.g., SQL) and statistical analysis/programming languages (e.g., R / Python)', 'Demonstrated ability to influence, guide, and ideate product strategy with data', '7+ years of experience in data analytics or related quantitative role', 'Interface with the Executive team on the data reasoning behind product strategy: why we are doubling down on specific bets and what is the expected outcome']

['', 'Interest in probabilistic optimization', 'Familiarity with SQL, database modeling and data warehousing principles', "Experience with AWS services of Redshift, S3, and Amazon stack in generalPrevious experience in SEM or digital marketingBachelor's degree, but will consider relevant experienceInterest in probabilistic optimization", 'Hands-on machine learning experience and general service-oriented architecture', 'Work in a fast-paced operational environment, servicing clients with customized software that will deliver extraordinary resultsApply statistics modeling and ML to improve the efficiency of systems and relevance algorithms across ad unitsParticipate in the improvement of our algorithmic keyword bidding software after interfacing with client roadmaps and wish lists upon seeing resultsSupport all engineering efforts to deliver the essential code on time and error-freePerform deep dive analysis to drive new model and feature developmentCollaborate with teams on client implementationWork with product managers and engineers to design data products and debug A/B experiments\xa0Collaborate with the backend engineering team to execute solutions within our production environment', 'Strong working knowledge of statistical and analytical algorithms including regression, classifiers, clustering algorithms, and anomaly detection techniques', '100% distributed workforce', 'Who We Are', 'Competitive Salary', 'Who You Are', 'Responsibilities', '5 weeks vacation after one yearCompetitive SalaryStock OptionsMedical/Dental CoverageFlexible work-life balanceStipend for home office100% distributed workforce', 'Collaborate with teams on client implementation', 'Data Scientist', 'Stipend for home office', '5 weeks vacation after one year', 'Perks', 'Work with product managers and engineers to design data products and debug A/B experiments\xa0', 'Minimum requirements', 'We are an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and strive to have an inclusive work environment.', 'Perform deep dive analysis to drive new model and feature development', 'Medical/Dental Coverage', 'Nice to have', 'Minimum 3 year of work experience applying scientific methods to solve real-world problems on web-scale data', 'Work in a fast-paced operational environment, servicing clients with customized software that will deliver extraordinary results', 'Collaborate with the backend engineering team to execute solutions within our production environment', 'Participate in the improvement of our algorithmic keyword bidding software after interfacing with client roadmaps and wish lists upon seeing results', 'Experience with AWS services of Redshift, S3, and Amazon stack in general', "Bachelor's degree, but will consider relevant experience", 'Stock Options', 'FT Optimize is looking for an experienced data scientist to lead improvements in our proprietary and highly customizable bidding system. This person will contribute by enhancing our bidding algorithms and software to meet and exceed specific client requirements. Our stack utilizes Python, R, and many Amazon Web Services.\xa0', 'Apply statistics modeling and ML to improve the efficiency of systems and relevance algorithms across ad units', 'FT Optimize was founded in 2016 as a way to offer companies custom SEM keyword bidding technology. Most agencies use a one-size-fits-all approach while FT Optimize develops right-size solutions for businesses. We are a modern SEM agency, partnering with clients and handling every aspect of SEM, from planning and forecasting to implementation and running the campaigns. With its initial success stories, clients started asking FTO to also customize software and ML tools for Retargeting, Social Media, Product Ads, and Video Marketing. FTO is driving this machine learning revolution and bringing it to several brand name clients.', 'You are someone who can easily switch between communicating a strategic product vision, working with engineers on scoping technical requirements or interfacing with clients from a customer service perspective. We also offer homeownership & loan programs.', "Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or Mathematics, or equivalent experience.5 or more years of experience in a Database Developer or Data Engineer role.5 or more years of experience with data analysis, data migration, data modeling, data integration, and data warehousing.In-depth understanding of data management (e. g. permissions, security, and monitoring).Extensive experience with Transact-SQL, and scripting languages such as R and Python.Hands-on experience with the data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI and SSRS.Excellent analytical and organization skillsEffective working in a team as well as working independently.Strong written and verbal communication skills.Expertise in database development projects and ETL processes.Experience in an agile SDLC environment, and software development best practices.Experience planning and implementing QA and testing, and data warehousing.Experience with Microsoft Azure Data Lake, Data Factory, and SQL Database products or equivalent products from other cloud services providers (e. g. AWS Elastic MapReduce, AWS Data Pipeline, Amazon RDS).", "What you'll need:", 'Assist on Installing and configure information systems to ensure functionality.', 'Support compliance with data stewardship standards and data security procedures.', 'Why you should apply:', 'Extensive experience with Transact-SQL, and scripting languages such as R and Python.', "What you'll do:", 'Apply proven communication and problem-solving skills to resolve production issues.', 'Excellent analytical and organization skills', 'Effective working in a team as well as working independently.', 'Wedgewood is looking for an experienced, collaborative Senior Data Engineer to join our team in the ongoing development and support of enterprise solutions for custom operational applications, data warehousing, enterprise analytics, and integrations across the enterprise (D365 CE and D365 F&O, Power Automate, SharePoint, Yardi Voyager, FileMaker Pro, etc.), and support the buildout of our data management and analytics environment on Microsoft Azure platform.', 'Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, etc.', 'In-depth understanding of data management (e. g. permissions, security, and monitoring).', 'Expertise in database development projects and ETL processes.', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills.', 'APPLY TODAY, Let’s start your future with Wedgewood!', 'FINANCIAL HEALTH –\xa0UNLIMITED EARNING POTENTIAL', '5 or more years of experience with data analysis, data migration, data modeling, data integration, and data warehousing.', 'WORK HARD – PLAY HARD -\xa0You can expect to get invited to various company sponsored events throughout the course of the year. Past events have included sporting events,\xa0happy hour, parking lot BBQs, bowling and bocce ball tournaments, office theme parties, and more.', 'Participate in conceptual design and documentation of logical data models and flowcharts', 'This position is responsible for working with the existing team to design, code, and implement new functionality, support existing functionality, and support data analytic needs on our Microsoft technology stack. A Senior Data Engineer should be comfortable working within a core team, occasionally interfacing with other technical stakeholders. This position is a mix of project-based and production support work with an emphasis on building a robust, sustainable enterprise data environment. The Senior Data Engineer will be a member of the Information Technology team and works alongside Technical project managers, Senior Business Analysis, Program Developers, and SQL Developers.', 'About the role:', 'Wedgewood is a leading acquirer of distressed residential real estate, specializing in the purchase, rehab, and resale of single family homes. Founded in 1985, we have since grown into a diversified, vertically integrated company, expanding our business footprint to also include non-performing notes, lending, design, brokerage, property management, escrow, and more. We are a unique combination of an established 30 year old company that has been able to keep its start-up feel.', 'Work with the Enterprise Architect to translate functional specifications into technical specifications.']

['', "  You have a strong quantitative and/or technical academic background in Mathematics, Computer Science, Statistics, Operations Research or another quantitative field. A master is required, and a Ph.D. is a plus!   You have 5+ years of experience using operations research and quantitative analysis to solve challenging, real-world problems in supply chain, warehouse operations, call center operations, or other related topics in eCommerce   You're knowledgeable in one or more of the following areas: mathematical programming, simulation, or statistical modeling.   You have hands-on experience implementing solutions in Python and/or R.   You're able to execute across the entire life cycle of an advanced analytics project: data collection and wrangling, abstraction of business problems to tractable mathematical models, delivery of recommendations, implementation of business changes, and performance measurement.   You're proficient in SQL; you can confidently perform your own data munging and build your own data pipelines when necessary   You have a passion for data and its ability to inform (and transform!) business strategy   You have an owner’s mindset, a bias to action and the ability to work with minimal supervision in a rapidly changing environment, under tight project timelines   You have excellent communication skills; you can effectively suit your communication style for your audience.  ", ' You have a strong quantitative and/or technical academic background in Mathematics, Computer Science, Statistics, Operations Research or another quantitative field. A master is required, and a Ph.D. is a plus! ', 'About Us', ' Flexibility Policy - when our corporate employees return to the office post COVID they will have the option to work remotely 2-3 days a week. ', '  Apply expertise in operations research, statistical modeling, simulation, and quantitative analysis to reduce operational costs, optimize the transportation network and improve inventory uptime.   Pair robust inventory attribute and operational data to optimize the efficacy and efficiency of garment care, including cleaning, repairs and quality assurance.   Use simulation and optimization techniques to inform the deployment of different transit carriers and shipping methods across different customer scenarios   Define and monitor KPIs to evaluate our supply chain network and operational process; identify opportunities to test into new processes that meaningfully improve metrics   Work in cross-functional teams of operators, product managers, and engineers focused on delivering a best-in-class customer experience   Grow to become a key influencer of operations strategies. Tell us what other questions should we be asking! job_text: ['', 'Description', ' Data analytics and insight environments (Apache Hadoop, Spark, Hive, SQL Server, SAP Bus, WH). ', ' Prior Innovation Development, or Supply Chain, or IoT or related experience ', ' An aptitude for communicating insights and collaborating across teams/organizations ', 'Qualifications', ' Live within 50 miles of Cincinnati or plan to relocate to Cincinnati, at your own expense as no relocation will be provided. ', ' Data analytics insights and work processes for learning and decision support ', ' Skills in data visualization (Tableau, Power BI, or similar) and script program languages (SQL, Python/Scala, R, JAVA, C+). ', ' Data management, ingesting new data, transforming/harmonizing data ', ' Passion to learn/develop and bring in emerging trends/technology that drive further insight value. ', 'Key Responsibilities Include', ' Proven success of applied analytics through related full-time or internship experience ', ' Strong leadership, business problem definition, and priority setting skills ', 'We Are Also Looking For Someone With Experience In', 'Just So You Know', ' Data management, ingesting new data, transforming/harmonizing data  Data analytics insights and work processes for learning and decision support  Strong leadership, business problem definition, and priority setting skills  Prior Innovation Development, or Supply Chain, or IoT or related experience  An aptitude for communicating insights and collaborating across teams/organizations  Skills in data visualization (Tableau, Power BI, or similar) and script program languages (SQL, Python/Scala, R, JAVA, C+).  Data analytics and insight environments (Apache Hadoop, Spark, Hive, SQL Server, SAP Bus, WH).  Passion to learn/develop and bring in emerging trends/technology that drive further insight value. ['', 'In this role, you will be building business-critical, robust, and scalable data solutions that power financial reporting, self-serve analytics, user recommendations, and marketing integrations. Additionally, working closely with the DevOps team, you will function as a service owner that owns, manages, and helps to evolve our data infrastructure!', 'Crunchyroll', 'An analytical demeanor and passion for solving business problems using data', '2+ years of experience in any programming language, preferably Python', 'Spark experience is a plus', 'Pet insurance and dog-friendly office', 'Crunchyroll COVID-19 Hiring Status', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at Crunchyroll. Pursuant to applicable law, we do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'About the Team', '2+ years of experience with Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment using tools such as Jenkins, CircleCI, etc.', 'Competitive salary“Use What You Need” time away from work policyMedical, dental, vision, STD, LTD, and life insuranceHealth care and dependent care FSA401(k) plan with employer matchEmployer-paid commuter benefitOn-site gym, showers, yoga, and wellness classesSupport program for new parentsCatered lunch 4 days per weekFun, passionate and skilled co-workersPet insurance and dog-friendly office', 'Employer-paid commuter benefit', 'On-site gym, showers, yoga, and wellness classes', 'With our data platform, we now power reporting, personalization, analytics, and other multi-functional integrations.', 'Medical, dental, vision, STD, LTD, and life insurance', 'Experience with handling large data sources of varying types - structured/relational and unstructured', '401(k) plan with employer match', 'Senior Software Engineer, Data Engineering', 'Our values as a team - we love opensource, encourage collaboration, value opinions, and foster continuous learning.', '5+ years of ETL, schema design, data modeling, and database programming', "Questions about Crunchyroll's hiring process? Please check out our FAQ", '1+ years of experience with AWS infrastructure automation (Infrastructure as Code) using tools such as Terraform or CloudFormation', 'Location: San Francisco', '2+ years of experience with Amazon or similar cloud services', 'Significant experience working with large scale distributed data systems', 'Benefits and Perks: San Francisco Office', 'Crunchyroll is the world’s most popular anime brand, connects anime and manga fans across 200+ countries and territories with 360-degree experiences. We’re an international business passionate about creating both online and offline experiences for fans through content (licensed, co-produced, originals, distribution), merchandise, events, gaming, news, and more. Visit our About Us pages for more information about our collection of brands and companies.', 'FAQ', 'About You:', 'Support program for new parents', 'We are a humble team that takes on not-so-humble challenges. From supporting the reporting needs of a few partner teams way back in 2015 to building a widely used data platform that provides custom solutions to multiple downstream consumers today; our journey has been exciting, celebratory, and educational.', 'Comfortable with using Linux/Unix systems when debugging infrastructure issues', 'Competitive salary', '5+ years of ETL, schema design, data modeling, and database programming2+ years of experience with Amazon or similar cloud services2+ years of experience in any programming language, preferably PythonSignificant experience working with large scale distributed data systemsExpert-level SQL skillsAn analytical demeanor and passion for solving business problems using dataExperience with handling large data sources of varying types - structured/relational and unstructuredComfortable with using Linux/Unix systems when debugging infrastructure issues2+ years of experience with Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment using tools such as Jenkins, CircleCI, etc.1+ years of experience with AWS infrastructure automation (Infrastructure as Code) using tools such as Terraform or CloudFormationSpark experience is a plus', 'Expert-level SQL skills', 'A day in the life of our Engineer:', 'We are looking for a cross-functional engineer ready to join our data engineering team in San Francisco.', 'Catered lunch 4 days per week', 'Crunchyroll employees are currently working from home, and we are still conducting remote interviews and hiring during this time. We are focused on the nationwide launch and the need to support that scale. A Citizen international launch will follow.Bursting: We designed our infrastructure to scale without notice in case of a spontaneous incident where we need to inform our entire user base. The core systems need to be able to efficiently support these traffic patterns and continue to scale to millions of more users in the future.Machine learning: We process thousands of hours of audio every day looking for incidents that impact our users’ safety. To do this at scale, we’ve built ML models for audio analysis and targeting using the current state of the art from academia.Analytics: We want to alert users to the incidents that matter to them, in a way that scales across different geographic densities and demographics.Mobile video streaming: Our app will ingest high-quality video at low-latency, transcode, and redistribute the video to external media outlets seamlessly.Radio hardware: We build our own software-defined radio-based devices to consume all radio dispatch in every major city, whether analog or digital.', 'Experience with data, analytics and visualization technologies', 'Citizen is backed by Sequoia Capital, 8VC, Founders Fund, and Goodwater Capital and has raised tens of millions in VC funding.\xa0', 'Our core challenges come from intersecting our growing internal datasets on user behavior and real-time crime, fire, and medical incidents with large, messy external datasets from governmental and private sources in order to enable optimal decisions and maximally-useful products.', 'Bursting: We designed our infrastructure to scale without notice in case of a spontaneous incident where we need to inform our entire user base. On significant events, we see over a million simultaneously connected clients and their associated live streams. The core systems need to be able to efficiently support these traffic patterns and continue to scale to millions of more users in the future.', 'About Citizen', 'This year Citizen will expand further across the United States with the express mission of making your world a safer place. We’re looking for hardworking, mission-driven individuals to help take the Citizen app to the next level as we scale up nationwide. With a group of passionate builders from Facebook, Square, Uber, Google and HQ Trivia, Citizen is the company your current company doesn’t want you to know about.', 'Our Stack - languages we use and teach', "The mission of Citizen's Data team is to empower users with the information and intelligent products needed to keep everyone, everywhere safe. They are responsible for Citizen's entire data stack across data engineering, analysis, and machine learning.", 'Mobile: Swift (iOS), Kotlin (Android)', 'Strong knowledge of relational databases and ability to write SQL code at an expert level.', 'Experience using heuristics and basic ML techniques to solve practical consumer product problems such as predicting churn, notification targeting, user cohorting', 'Using our unique technology, 911 alerts are made available to the public and are accompanied by live stories, real-time updates, and user-generated content to provide you with the information you need to protect yourself and your loved ones. We act fast, break news, and give people the immediate information they need to stay safe. And we’re just getting started.', 'Citizen is a free app that keeps you and your loved ones safe. It is a powerful force for good that has already evacuated people from burning buildings, diverted school buses from nearby terrorist attacks and reunited missing children with their parents.', 'Mobile: Swift (iOS), Kotlin (Android)Web: React.js, TypeScriptServices: Go for transactional systems; Python for analytical systemsDatastores: Cassandra, MySQL, Redis, Google PubSubInfrastructure: Kubernetes on Google Cloud', 'Requirements']

ability to convey technical topics to non-technical audiences; ability to communicate at an executive level', 'Take ownership of north-star metrics and build weekly, monthly, and quarterly reporting of the health of the business, including revenue, sales, retention, engagement, and customer churnDeliver complex analyses and provide actionable insights to continually drive revenue opportunities via new customer acquisition, reactivation, product offerings, logistical efficiency, and retention across all customer life stages and cohortsWork with Data and Engineering to build reporting tools to make data accessible across the business, scale a culture of data-driven decision making while monitoring to ensure proper strategic executionInterpret large data sets, prepare recommendations, and present to senior members of the team to influence the strategic direction of the companyExcel at developing insights from various data sources, both inside and outside the company.Closely collaborate with functional group leads throughout the reporting and analytics lifecycle, from initial scoping to deployment to maintenancePartner with Lead Data Engineer to procure and maintain data sources', 'Good news!\xa0 We are Territory Foods and we are hiring a Business Data Analyst to drive key strategic, financial, and operational insights and improvements across the business.\xa0 You will work closely with key stakeholders across the organization to surface critical data, conduct complex analyses, and help the organization make fast, data-informed decisions. This role reports to the Chief of Staff.', 'We’re a platform for the next generation of wellness, focused on the hardest problem -- personalized nutrition. We sell fresh food for Food Tribes (representing 39% of the U.S. population, including whole30, gluten-free, paleo, ketogenic, vegan, and vegetarian).\xa0', 'Work with Data and Engineering to build reporting tools to make data accessible across the business, scale a culture of data-driven decision making while monitoring to ensure proper strategic execution', 'Our company is growing and evolving, your role, professional skills and development will as well.\xa0\xa0You’ll almost never be in an office.\xa0\xa0Your ability to manage your time properly will be critical to success. And you will be held accountable for daily, weekly and monthly deliverables.\xa0\xa0We’re a food and fitness-oriented team, so we provide food in our operating markets, and company sponsored membership to your fitness provider of choice (CrossFit, yoga, multi-program, etc.) in all markets.\xa0', 'Partner with Lead Data Engineer to procure and maintain data sources', 'Business Data Analyst', 'Interpret large data sets, prepare recommendations, and present to senior members of the team to influence the strategic direction of the company', 'Your ability to manage your time properly will be critical to success. And you will be held accountable for daily, weekly and monthly deliverables.\xa0\xa0', 'Experience driving fast-paced projects from scratch to completion in a highly organized manner, while managing multiple stakeholders', 'Take ownership of north-star metrics and build weekly, monthly, and quarterly reporting of the health of the business, including revenue, sales, retention, engagement, and customer churn', 'We’re a platform for the next generation of wellness, focused on the hardest problem -- personalized nutrition. We sell fresh food for Food Tribes (representing 39% of the U.S. population, including whole30, gluten-free, paleo, ketogenic, vegan, and vegetarian).\xa0We lead with purpose and intention, just like our customers. We’re operating in four markets (DC, DFW, SoCal, and the Bay Area). In each, we work with amazing chefs using responsibly sourced ingredients to create healthy meals that our customers rely on to undergird their health & wellness goals.\xa0At Territory, we believe that our people and culture are our biggest assets. Because of our passion for wellness, community development and entrepreneurship, we want to have the best team members who not only believe in this mission but live it too. Our remote operating model allows us to have a strong team of cutting-edge thinkers around the USA who provide diverse and innovative ideas.\xa0We’re also entrepreneurial, strategic thinkers who are rooted in operations. All of our operational fervor serves as the foundation for scale. We are a fast-growing enterprise with the deeply held belief that the more people we serve the more lives we change. The magic happens where operational excellence meets our growth mindset, and our teams try and live in the intersection.\xa0']

job_text: ['', 'Summary', 'Note: Curriculum must include 30 semester hours of course work in a combination of mathematics, statistics and computer science. Of the 30 semester hours, 15 must be in any combination of statistics and mathematics which includes differential and integral calculus. Degrees in engineering technology are not considered qualifying for this position. To find out if a school has an ABET accreditation, go to http://www.abet.org. Degrees must have been received in the year of, or any year subsequent to the original date of accreditation. Engineering degrees earned outside the United States: Engineering degrees earned outside the Unites States must be recognized by a Mutual Recognition Agreement (MRA), often known as accords. These are non-governmental agreements among organizations that accredit academic degree programs. MRAs recognize the substantial equivalence of mature accreditation systems and programs accredited by signatory organizations within their jurisdictions. For a listing of Signatories, please visit, https://www.abet.org/global-presence/mutual-recognition-agreements/is-your-program-recognized/. Science and other related degrees earned within the United States: Science and other related degrees must have been awarded from colleges or universities that are accredited by recognized accrediting organizations. For a list of schools that meet this criteria, go to http://ope.ed.gov/accreditation/. Science and other related degrees earned outside the United States: If you are using education completed in foreign colleges or universities to meet the qualification requirements, you must show that the education credentials have been evaluated by a private organization that specializes in interpretation of foreign education programs. These education credentials must be deemed equivalent to that gained in an accredited U.S. education program; or full credit has been given for the courses at a U.S. accredited college or university. For further information, visit: https://www2.ed.gov/about/offices/list/ous/international/usnei/us/edlite-visitus-forrecog.html.', " Meet the minimum qualifications requirements for the positionSubmit proof that you meet the requirements for CTAP/ICTAP as indicated in 'Required Documents' For additional information about CTAP/ICTAP eligibility, click here - https://www.opm.gov/policy-data-oversight/workforce-restructuring/employee-guide-to-career-transition/#ictap.", ' Completed all requirements for a doctoral degree (i.e., Ph.D. or equivalent) in an appropriate field', 'Note:', ' Completed 3 full academic years of graduate education in an appropriate field', ' Any combination of experience and graduate study in an appropriate field', ' Have an equivalent combination of experience and graduate study as discussed in a), b) and c) above Your resume must include a clear and detailed narrative description, in your own words, of how you meet the required specialized experience. Experience statements copied from a position description, vacancy announcement or other reference material constitutes plagiarism and may result in disqualification and losing consideration for the job. Required college majors for applicants qualifying on the basis of undergraduate or graduate education only: Computer Engineering. Other majors will qualify if the major includes or is supplemented as follows: a. Computer Science and Pure Mathematics are fully qualifying for Data Analysis, Modeling and Theoretical Simulation Techniques positions without further course requirements. For Data Systems, Hardware Systems and Software Systems positions, Computer Science and Pure Mathematics are qualifying if the major includes or is supplemented by 12 semester hours (or the equivalent) in appropriate Physical Science or Engineering courses and includes or is supplemented by at least two courses shown under "b.2." b. Applied Mathematics is qualifying if includes or is supplemented by at least two of the following courses: 1. For Data Analysis, Modeling and Theoretical Simulation Techniques: numerical methods (or numerical analysis); linear algebra, theory of equations, differential equations, mathematical statistics (if six semester hour course), operating systems, theory of computation, computer networks, programming languages, data structures, data base management, computer graphics, compiler construction, computer architecture, software engineering. 2. For Data Systems, Hardware Systems and Software Systems: electronics, electrical networks, solid-state physics (for transistors, tapes, etc.), optics (for simulation), electricity and magnetism, computer organization, logic design, control systems, communication theory. c. Other appropriate physical science and engineering majors are qualifying if the major includes or is supplemented by six semester hours (or the equivalent) in Mathematics beyond Basic Calculus and includes or is supplemented by at least two courses shown above under "b."', 'Education', 'Responsibilities', " Completed all requirements for a master's or equivalent graduate degree in an appropriate field", ' Meet the minimum qualifications requirements for the position', ' Completed 2 full academic years of graduate education in an appropriate field', " Any combination of experience and graduate study in an appropriate field You may also qualify at the GS-07 level by meeting one of these Special Provisions: Are in the upper third of your class, based on completed college work at the time of filing an application. Have an average of 9 or better on a 4.0 scale for either all completed college work at the time of application or all college courses completed during the last 2 years of the undergraduate curriculum. Achieved a grade average of B+ (5 on a 4.0 scale) or better in the major field of study where such field is fully qualifying. This is either the average of all completed college work in the major field of study at the time of application or the average of all college courses completed in the major field of study during the last 2 years of the undergraduate curriculum. Elected to membership in one of the national honorary scholastic societies meeting the minimum requirements of the Association of College Honor Societies (other than freshman honor societies). These honor societies are listed at ACHS. Completed 12 months of student trainee experience that includes at least one work period equivalent to the GS-5, or at least 15 months of appropriate student trainee experience which includes one work period equivalent to the GS-04 level. One work period is 2 months or 320 hours. For engineering positions, successfully completed a 5-year program of study, or at least 160 semester hours, leading to a bachelor's degree. For engineering positions, have a professional engineering degree, and up to 12 months of experience gained as a technician or technologist equivalent to the GS-5 or higher level. Successfully completed all requirements for two bachelor's degrees, one in an appropriate field of science or engineering. Have six months of directly related/specialized experience or training, including 3 months gained after the junior year of college. This experience may have been obtained on a part-time or intermittent basis and may have been paid or unpaid. Received honors or elective positions indicating superior leadership outside of your academic setting. Additionally, your academic standing must have been in the upper half of the graduating class. Have pattern of completing courses that include unusual preparatory value or direct relation to the particular aerospace specialty for which you are being considered. Have creative research aptitude or special talent for NASA scientific or engineering work. This must be shown by evidence obtained and documented by NASA in certifications from college professors or officials, or standardized questionnaires, or similar techniques. To qualify for GS-09, you must have: One year of directly related specialized experience equivalent to the GS-07 level performing duties such as basic software coding/programming preferably in C and/or C++; software and data systems design and testing; assisting with embedded hardware/software development. OR Completed all requirements for a master's or equivalent graduate degree in an appropriate field", 'Additional Information', ' Have an equivalent combination of experience and graduate study as discussed in a), b) and c) above To qualify for GS-11, you must have: You must have one year of directly related specialized experience equivalent to the GS-09 level performing duties such as using programming languages C, C++, C# and/or VHDL and their applications in software and data systems; applying knowledge of embedded hardware/software development and/or embedded operating systems to support projects. Experience with Field Programmable Gate Array (FPGA) is desired. Achieved a grade average of B+ (5 on a 4.0 scale) or better in the major field of study where such field is fully qualifying. This is either the average of all completed college work in the major field of study at the time of application or the average of all college courses completed in the major field of study during the last 2 years of the undergraduate curriculum. Elected to membership in one of the national honorary scholastic societies meeting the minimum requirements of the Association of College Honor Societies (other than freshman honor societies). These honor societies are listed at ACHS.
