['', 'You will translate system requirements into technical specifications.You will develop complex software code and functional tests in a Linux based environment.You will document the developed software.You will formulate ideas for continuous improvement.Depending on your expertise, you guide and coach junior developers in your team.You will apply and follow existing processes with regards to coding, documentation, task follow up, etc.… to your day-to-day workYou will work tightly together with remote R&D teams and project teams in Belgium', 'Our Offer', 'You will work tightly together with remote R&D teams and project teams in Belgium', 'You learn new technologies quickly.', 'Broad knowledge of different technologies, e.g. Networking, Linux OS, Scripting (Bash/Python), Audio/Video, …', 'About Televic', 'At least 5 years of experience with C++ software in an embedded Linux environment is preferred but can be compensated with motivation and eagerness to learn.', 'You will develop complex software code and functional tests in a Linux based environment.', 'You will document the developed software.', 'You will apply and follow existing processes with regards to coding, documentation, task follow up, etc.… to your day-to-day work', 'You are familiar with object-oriented programming and you can divide a complex system into logic modular components.', 'Depending on your expertise, you guide and coach junior developers in your team.', 'The Big Picture', 'Televic Rail is booming. Join our highly skilled R&D team and design, develop, test and maintain on-board passenger information and mechatronic safety systems for trams and trains worldwide. We are considered the 1° reference, but we need you to help us take the next step!', 'Televic Rail is the lead supplier for high-quality on-board communication and control systems. As a Rail colleague you get the opportunity to collaborate with top-notch references worldwide (e.g. Siemens, Hitachi, Bombardier, Eurostar and NMBS).', 'Our strong focus on training and development sets us apart! At Televic you work in a stimulating environment that emphasizes your unique talents and growth.', 'You have a relevant Bachelor or Master’s degree (Informatics/ ICT/ Computer Science).', 'You enjoy working in a multi-disciplinary and an international team.', 'We value direct communication, team spirit and a drive for results.', 'About You', 'Televic develops, manufactures, and installs high-tech communication systems. We bridge the gap between people, systems and information and provide our customers with reliable and state-of-the-art interaction solutions. Communication is in our DNA!', 'You have knowledge of UML modeling and application architecture design.', 'We focus on 4 niche markets: Conference, Education, Healthcare and Rail. ', ' We welcome you in our regional headquarters in Sacramento. We offer you an attractive salary with exciting legal benefits.', 'As our new embedded software colleague, you will get the chance to collaborate on a brand new, IP based, audio platform for trains and tramways. ', '\ufeff', 'You will translate system requirements into technical specifications.', 'At least 5 years of experience with C++ software in an embedded Linux environment is preferred but can be compensated with motivation and eagerness to learn.Broad knowledge of different technologies, e.g. Networking, Linux OS, Scripting (Bash/Python), Audio/Video, …You have a relevant Bachelor or Master’s degree (Informatics/ ICT/ Computer Science).You are familiar with object-oriented programming and you can divide a complex system into logic modular components.You have knowledge of UML modeling and application architecture design.You learn new technologies quickly.You enjoy working in a multi-disciplinary and an international team.', 'The Details', 'You will formulate ideas for continuous improvement.']

job_text: ['', 'Some combination of these qualifications and technical skills will position you well for this role:', ' Take part in DevOps by building utilities, user defined functions and frameworks to better enable data flow patterns.', " Design and implement distributed data processing pipelines using Spark, Hive, Python, and other tools and languages prevalent in the Hadoop ecosystem. You will be given the opportunity to own the design and implementation. You will collaborate with Product managers, Data Scientists, Engineering folks to accomplish your tasks. Publish RESTful API's to enable real-time data consumption using OpenAPI specifications. This will enable many teams to consume the data that is being produced. Explore and build proof of concepts using open source NOSQL technologies such as HBase, DynamoDB, Cassandra and Distributed Stream Processing frameworks like ApacheSpark, Flink, Kafka stream. Take part in DevOps by building utilities, user defined functions and frameworks to better enable data flow patterns. Work with architecture/engineering leads and other teammates to ensure high quality solutions through code reviews, engineering best practices documentation. Experience in Business Rule management systems like Drools will also come in handy.", ' Programming skills in Java/Scala, Python, Shell scripting, and SQL', ' Experience in Business Rule management systems like Drools will also come in handy.', 'Here are some tasks that you could do day to day:', ' Work with architecture/engineering leads and other teammates to ensure high quality solutions through code reviews, engineering best practices documentation.', ' Development skills around Spark, MapReduce, and Hive', " MS/BS degree in a computer science or related discipline 3+ years' experience in large-scale software development/Big Data technologies Programming skills in Java/Scala, Python, Shell scripting, and SQL Development skills around Spark, MapReduce, and Hive Strong skills around developing RESTful API's", " Strong skills around developing RESTful API's", ' MS/BS degree in a computer science or related discipline', 'Job Description', ' Explore and build proof of concepts using open source NOSQL technologies such as HBase, DynamoDB, Cassandra and Distributed Stream Processing frameworks like ApacheSpark, Flink, Kafka stream.', " 3+ years' experience in large-scale software development/Big Data technologies", ' Design and implement distributed data processing pipelines using Spark, Hive, Python, and other tools and languages prevalent in the Hadoop ecosystem. You will be given the opportunity to own the design and implementation. You will collaborate with Product managers, Data Scientists, Engineering folks to accomplish your tasks.', " Publish RESTful API's to enable real-time data consumption using OpenAPI specifications. This will enable many teams to consume the data that is being produced.", 'Job Title: Data EngineerJob Location: Beaverton, ORJob Duration: 5 Months']

['', 'You are fluent in SQL, have opinions about a well-designed database, and know how to deal with data too big to analyze in-memory.You are comfortable working in a highly technical team: contributing through version control, peer-reviewing code, and managing processes in production.You are comfortable being the technical resource for non-technical teams: translating business needs to technical requirements, communicating quantitative observations to make the teams around us more effective and well-informed. You’ve got a natural attention to detail and drive for order that yields accuracy and reliability in the data you work with. You can own the critical trust-based relationship with our internal stakeholders.You have experience in and a passion for visualizing data to tell clear stories and support decision making.You have some familiarity with data science languages like R or python, and enjoy learning more.You’re confident in taking ownership of projects from start to finish and enjoy the process of turning nebulous ideas into reality.You believe that teams succeed and fail together and take responsibility for ensuring the success and safety of your teammates.', 'You can own the critical trust-based relationship with our internal stakeholders.', 'Develop SQL to transform the raw data produced by the farm into a comprehensive data warehouse as the authoritative source for all facts about the business.', 'You believe that teams succeed and fail together and take responsibility for ensuring the success and safety of your teammates.', 'You have some familiarity with data science languages like R or python, and enjoy learning more.', 'Collaborate on the design and creation of data tools and decision frameworks used by our farm operators, agricultural scientists, and sales team to drive positive change.', "What You'll Have", 'Partner with other functional areas to develop metrics, understand analytical needs, and interpret results about our crops and our business.', 'You are comfortable working in a highly technical team: contributing through version control, peer-reviewing code, and managing processes in production.', "What You'll Do", 'You have experience in and a passion for visualizing data to tell clear stories and support decision making.', 'Contribute to Bowery’s data-driven culture, and influence best practices.', 'You are comfortable being the technical resource for non-technical teams: translating business needs to technical requirements, communicating quantitative observations to make the teams around us more effective and well-informed. ', 'Build automated reporting which effectively draws attention to important information and helps decision makers understand our priorities.', 'You are fluent in SQL, have opinions about a well-designed database, and know how to deal with data too big to analyze in-memory.', 'Develop SQL to transform the raw data produced by the farm into a comprehensive data warehouse as the authoritative source for all facts about the business.Build automated reporting which effectively draws attention to important information and helps decision makers understand our priorities.Partner with other functional areas to develop metrics, understand analytical needs, and interpret results about our crops and our business.Collaborate on the design and creation of data tools and decision frameworks used by our farm operators, agricultural scientists, and sales team to drive positive change.Build and use statistical and algorithmic models to proactively surface and predict relationships in data.Contribute to Bowery’s data-driven culture, and influence best practices.', 'You’re confident in taking ownership of projects from start to finish and enjoy the process of turning nebulous ideas into reality.', 'You’ve got a natural attention to detail and drive for order that yields accuracy and reliability in the data you work with. ', 'About The Role', 'Build and use statistical and algorithmic models to proactively surface and predict relationships in data.']

['', 'This Principal Data Scientist Role is an opportunity to join an innovative organization that is amongst the largest privately held companies in the U.S.\xa0with data driven business operations. As a\xa0senior level individual contributor, you will have expertise in complex data modeling, forecasting and possess a strong business acumen!\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Start 100% remote, targeting relocation mid 2021 with relocation package!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Servant leadership and collaborative team environment', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Never had a layoff in over 60 years in business', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Preferred experience in AI / Deep Learning for text/image/video analytics and/or cloud Computing and/or data streaming', 'Do you enjoy using data to influence company business decisions? Do you support operational leaders in a production environment to tell the story using data?\xa0', 'Why this company?', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Employee centric culture\xa0', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ph.D. Required\xa0(e.g., statistics, computer science, economics, mathematics, physics, electrical engineering, industrial engineering,\xa0or other STEM fields)\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ph.D. Required\xa0(e.g., statistics, computer science, economics, mathematics, physics, electrical engineering, industrial engineering,\xa0or other STEM fields)\xa0AND', 'In this role, be a hands-on thought leader using large data sets, complex algorithms and data modeling to tell the story and successfully guide C-suite business decisions working with senior leadership.', '***Must be authorized to work in the United States without restrictions or the need of sponsorship, now or in the future. ***', 'Qualifications:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to run standard model algorithms in Python, to perform classification/regression, clustering, basic text analytics, image recognition, etc.\xa0', 'AND', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Employs over 22,000 employees nationwide', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa05+ years of relevant professional work experience in data science or closely related field (e.g., as a statistician/ data analysis/ data engineer).\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with writing SQL queries, usage of R/RStudio, Python, Jupyter Notebook']

['Learn more about engineering at ThousandEyes: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b9a_c8yJyzc ', "What we're looking for:", '6+ years of software development experience A fast learner Comfortable working with newer technologies Experience with streaming architectures, in particular, Kafka Experience in OLAP oriented database (Druid, Clickhouse etc) Experience building custom data visualizations (D3) Experience with network protocols is a plus Strong Computer Science fundamentals Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or similar', ' ', 'Experience building custom data visualizations (D3) ', 'Comfortable working with newer technologies ', 'At ThousandEyes, we use cutting-edge technologies and innovative techniques to study and visualize networks on a global scale. ThousandEyes engineers are focused on continuous improvement -- of our product, our codebase, our knowledge, and our skills. We believe in innovation, simplicity, and elegance. We work in small, cross-functional teams where everyone has a voice. ', 'About ThousandEyes', 'About the Role ', "ThousandEyes empowers enterprises to see, understand and improve digital experiences for their customers and employees. The ThousandEyes cloud platform offers unmatched vantage points throughout the global Internet and cloud providers, delivering immediate visibility into the digital experience for every user, application, website or service, over any network. ThousandEyes is central to the global operations of the world's largest and fastest growing brands, including Comcast, eBay, HP,120+ of the Global 2000, 75+ of the F500, 20 of the top 25 SaaS providers, 6 of the top 7 US banks, 4 of the top 5 UK banks, and 5 of the top 10 companies on the 2018 Forbes Cloud 100 list. ", 'One of the unique advantages of our platform is the powerful visualizations that can encapsulate an incredible amount of information with simple and elegant ways of summarizing data.  We have built a scalable and flexible data platform to surface business and technical insights utilizing different visualization and business intelligence report types used on a daily basis by the biggest organizations of the planet. ', 'Learn more about engineering at ThousandEyes: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b9a_c8yJyzc', 'Strong Computer Science fundamentals ', 'A fast learner ', 'Experience in OLAP oriented database (Druid, Clickhouse etc) ', 'Experience with streaming architectures, in particular, Kafka ', 'Engineering at ThousandEyes', '\xa0 ', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or similar', 'About ThousandEyes ', "What we're looking for: ", 'About the Role', '6+ years of software development experience ', 'As a Senior Software Engineer on the Data Visualization Platform team you will be directly involved in projects such as scaling our OLAP oriented backend to handle billions of data points with sub-second response times and building out custom data visualizations. ', 'Engineering at ThousandEyes ', 'Experience with network protocols is a plus ']

['', 'A love of coding (and learning).', 'Development experience “for fun” outside of work.', 'Experience working in a sprint-driven development process.', 'Innovative, challenging programming work in the Microsoft stack, with SQL Server as a back endSolid work experience in a 24/7 SaaS platform or e-commerce environment.Experience building for the web using C#, Bootstrap, Vue, AJAX, CSS, jQuery, REST and the latest technologies.A love of coding (and learning).Development experience “for fun” outside of work.Past experience working in a team setting - co-developing, code-reviewing, mentoring, etc.3+ years working in the Microsoft stack (C#/VB.net, etc).3+ years working in SQL-backed environments.Experience working in a sprint-driven development process.', '3+ years working in the Microsoft stack (C#/VB.net, etc).', 'In this role your focus will be the new feature development for our Platform and its various applications and supporting tools. This includes core application functionality, API work as well as integrations with key partners. This is a hands-on position, working in two week sprints building big, meaningful projects with a direct, immediate and visible impact to key global brands like Toyota/Lexus, VW/Audi, Nissan/Infiniti, Volvo and Subaru.\xa0', 'Experience building for the web using C#, Bootstrap, Vue, AJAX, CSS, jQuery, REST and the latest technologies.', 'Top 3 - 5 Skills/Requirements:', 'Strong candidates will be able to show us:', 'Innovative, challenging programming work in the Microsoft stack, with SQL Server as a back end', '\xa0', 'This is a fun, fast-paced, close-knit environment with plenty of room to grow and be creative. We are an established, solidly profitable company with a start-up working environment and a brilliant team. We offer full-time W2 positions with company-paid health/dental/vision/life benefits, FSA, matching 401(k), unlimited paid vacation, dog-friendly office, relaxed dress code, eclectic company culture, and a great office location in Downtown Atlanta.', 'Past experience working in a team setting - co-developing, code-reviewing, mentoring, etc.', '3+ years working in SQL-backed environments.', 'Solid work experience in a 24/7 SaaS platform or e-commerce environment.', 'Will be remote during Covid-will require onsite work and canidates must be local to Atlanta area. ']

['Help design and deliver long term analytics projects: finding answers to business problems, implementing a solution, and tracking downstream effectiveness.Communicate effectively with peers on the marketing science team, internal clients, and company leadership regarding ongoing projects and future possibilities.Carry out ad-hoc data extracts and analyses as needed.', '', '3-5 years of experience in data science / data analysis or an advanced degree (MS, MBA, PhD) in a related field.', 'Responsibilities', 'Communicate effectively with peers on the marketing science team, internal clients, and company leadership regarding ongoing projects and future possibilities.', 'As the\xa0Data Scientist, Marketing, you will work closely with the Director of Marketing Science, channel managers, and a variety of cross-functional teams to identify promising market segments and optimize our marketing efforts to efficiently drive profitable growth. You will work closely with the Data Science team on a range of compelling projects, from recommendation engines to lead scoring to marketing mix modelling. To be successful in this roll, you will use creativity and curiosity to make meaningful contributions across these efforts.', 'Help design and deliver long term analytics projects: finding answers to business problems, implementing a solution, and tracking downstream effectiveness.', 'Responsible and reliable; able to set and meet deadlines.', 'Data Scientist', 'Carry out ad-hoc data extracts and analyses as needed.', 'Qualifications', '3-5 years of experience in data science / data analysis or an advanced degree (MS, MBA, PhD) in a related field.Fluent in English and at least one language related to statistical analysis (e.g., R, SAS, Spark, STATA), data management (e.g., Hadoop, SQL), and/or basic computing such as C++, Java, Julia, or Python.Attention to detail and overarching curiosity are both essential.Willingness to learn new quantitative techniques and programming languages.Responsible and reliable; able to set and meet deadlines.', 'Attention to detail and overarching curiosity are both essential.', '\xa0', 'The ability to pull data using tools such as SQL, mySQL, Google Analytics, and Adobe Analytics will be key in this role; building models in R, Python, or Spark; work with IT resources to first test, then deploy their models. The ideal candidate will be comfortable with a range of analytical techniques, from machine learning (e.g., support vector machines, gradient boosted trees, random forest) to simple t-tests and power analyses. Experience with distributed processing is a plus.', 'Fluent in English and at least one language related to statistical analysis (e.g., R, SAS, Spark, STATA), data management (e.g., Hadoop, SQL), and/or basic computing such as C++, Java, Julia, or Python.', 'Willingness to learn new quantitative techniques and programming languages.', 'The Marketing team is looking for an outstanding Data Scientist to join its growing Data Science organization. This person will play a central role in one of our company’s most highly visible departments, pulling insights from the data warehouse to guide strategic decisions of C-Level executives and shape the way that we find and serve our customers.']

job_title: Software Engineer II - Data Warehouse Specialist
job_text: ['', 'In this role you will work closely with our internal business teams and BI specialists to define the end goal for any analytics needs of the company', ' You have 5+ years of experience ', ' You have 5+ years of experience  working on architecting and building a data warehouse. ', 'You will also be a key player in building the ETL stack to cleanse, transform and load data from different enterprise sources using multiple ETL technologies.', 'In this role you will assist the Data Warehouse Architect in building an enterprise data warehouse to provide insights and analytics to our internal clients.', ' You are a broadly skilled engineer  , accustomed to interfacing with web services of external and internal systems, building ETL pipelines using variety of technologies and service layers. ', 'WHAT WE CARE ABOUT: ', ' You are a broadly skilled engineer ', 'Our Senior Engineers contribute to more than our product – they build up our team. Through a combination of mentoring, technical leadership, and/or direct management of small teams, they make others better and raise the bar for those around them. ', ' You have 3+ years of experience developing solutions using iPaaS applications  such as Dell Boomi, SSIS or Informatica. ', ' You work with confidence and without ego. Our engineers have deep knowledge and exercise a high degree of leadership in their daily work. You have strongly-held, defensible ideas, and advocate for what you believe is right. You are also adept at identifying and evaluating trade-offs, willing to be proven wrong, and quick to walk through fire to support your fellow teammates. ', ' You value, seek out, and foster diversity. ', 'You will help formulate the vision for data integrity and security of the data within the warehouse.', ' You have basic understanding of engineering fundamentals and database technologies. This will be key to highly performant world class design and implementations.', ' You have 5+ years of experience  working on architecting and building a data warehouse.  You have 3+ years of experience developing solutions using iPaaS applications  such as Dell Boomi, SSIS or Informatica.  You have basic understanding of engineering fundamentals and database technologies. This will be key to highly performant world class design and implementations. You are a broadly skilled engineer  , accustomed to interfacing with web services of external and internal systems, building ETL pipelines using variety of technologies and service layers.  You have a product-focused mindset. You have the passion and ability to contribute to the process of discovering what will delight our clients and push forward one of the world’s largest and most influential industries toward a vision of openness, transparency, and evidence-based decision-making.  You work with confidence and without ego. Our engineers have deep knowledge and exercise a high degree of leadership in their daily work. You have strongly-held, defensible ideas, and advocate for what you believe is right. You are also adept at identifying and evaluating trade-offs, willing to be proven wrong, and quick to walk through fire to support your fellow teammates.  You value, seek out, and foster diversity. We are a global team from many diverse backgrounds, with different experiences and perspectives. To complement this team, you will welcome ideas that are different from your own and be skilled at finding and building from common ground. ', ' You value, seek out, and foster diversity. We are a global team from many diverse backgrounds, with different experiences and perspectives. To complement this team, you will welcome ideas that are different from your own and be skilled at finding and building from common ground. ', 'You will work with a team of Senior engineers who are end-to-end owners and help us define the current and future of technology within the group and the entire company.', ' You have basic understanding of engineering fundamentals and database technologies. ', ' You have 3+ years of experience developing solutions using iPaaS applications ', 'You will develop a deep understanding of our company’s various operational systems and datasets in order to then extract data into the data warehouse, model it and build data marts.', 'WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR:', ' You have a product-focused mindset. ', 'About The Role', ' You have a product-focused mindset. You have the passion and ability to contribute to the process of discovering what will delight our clients and push forward one of the world’s largest and most influential industries toward a vision of openness, transparency, and evidence-based decision-making. ', ' You work with confidence and without ego. ', 'In this role you will assist the Data Warehouse Architect in building an enterprise data warehouse to provide insights and analytics to our internal clients.You will develop a deep understanding of our company’s various operational systems and datasets in order to then extract data into the data warehouse, model it and build data marts.You will help formulate the vision for data integrity and security of the data within the warehouse.You will also be a key player in building the ETL stack to cleanse, transform and load data from different enterprise sources using multiple ETL technologies.In this role you will work closely with our internal business teams and BI specialists to define the end goal for any analytics needs of the companyYou will work with a team of Senior engineers who are end-to-end owners and help us define the current and future of technology within the group and the entire company.Our Senior Engineers contribute to more than our product – they build up our team. Through a combination of mentoring, technical leadership, and/or direct management of small teams, they make others better and raise the bar for those around them. ']

['', 'Knowledge with Linux and Shell Scripting/Python Scripting', '0-2 years of experience in related software development job, internship, or co-op', 'Duration: 6-12 month CTH', '0-2 years of experience in related software development job, internship, or co-opBachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, CIS, or EngineeringBasic knowledge of software development methodologies (e.g., Agile, Waterfall) and experience working in Agile environments, such as Scrum and KanbanStrong knowledge of relational databases, Oracle SQL, stored procedures, and/or TeradataBasic Knowledge of data storage subsystems and the ability to write Simple to Medium SQLs for data transformations, profiling, and query tasksExposure working within a Cloud Environment: AWS, Snowflake, or Azure (preferred)Experience in software engineering using Java with data formats like JSON, XML, and HTMLKnowledge with Linux and Shell Scripting/Python ScriptingAbility to code and develop prototypes in any languages such as Python, C++, Java, Scala, or SQL – with the ability to pick up new languages, process, and technologies quickly', 'Technical Leadership: Collaborates with technical team to deliver technical solutions. Continuously learns new technologies. Ability to offer and communicate ideas and opinions. Ability to learn technologies being used. Awareness of technology roadmap.', 'Technical responsibilities fall into the following categories:', 'Technical Documentation: Maintains knowledge of existing technology documents. Maintains clear documentation for new code and systems used. Documenting systems designs and business requirements.', 'Role: Associate Software Engineer ', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, CIS, or Engineering', 'Location', 'Duration', 'Ability to code and develop prototypes in any languages such as Python, C++, Java, Scala, or SQL – with the ability to pick up new languages, process, and technologies quickly', 'Role: ', 'Basic Knowledge of data storage subsystems and the ability to write Simple to Medium SQLs for data transformations, profiling, and query tasks', 'Technology Strategy: Updates job knowledge by tracking and understanding emerging engineering practices.', 'Basic knowledge of software development methodologies (e.g., Agile, Waterfall) and experience working in Agile environments, such as Scrum and Kanban', 'Exposure working within a Cloud Environment: AWS, Snowflake, or Azure (preferred)', 'A successful Associate Software Engineer will have all the following (prioritized):', 'Technical Engineering Services: Participates in engineering projects by adapting and applying patches and software solutions; conducting tests and inspections; preparing reports and calculations.', 'Technical Engineering Services: Participates in engineering projects by adapting and applying patches and software solutions; conducting tests and inspections; preparing reports and calculations.Innovation: Understands and shares new ideas which improve an existing system/process/service. System analysis and innovation for continuous system improvement.Technical Documentation: Maintains knowledge of existing technology documents. Maintains clear documentation for new code and systems used. Documenting systems designs and business requirements.Technical Leadership: Collaborates with technical team to deliver technical solutions. Continuously learns new technologies. Ability to offer and communicate ideas and opinions. Ability to learn technologies being used. Awareness of technology roadmap.Technology Strategy: Updates job knowledge by tracking and understanding emerging engineering practices.', 'Experience in software engineering using Java with data formats like JSON, XML, and HTML', 'Location: Overland Park, Kansas', 'Strong knowledge of relational databases, Oracle SQL, stored procedures, and/or Teradata', 'Innovation: Understands and shares new ideas which improve an existing system/process/service. System analysis and innovation for continuous system improvement.', 'Required Skills:', "Our Fortune Top 50 Telecom client is looking for an Associate Software Engineer to join their Enterprise Data Solutions team to help with upcoming data ingestion initiatives! You will join a team of other Software Engineers, SDETs, and Architects to design, implement, and deploy software which meet customer's requirements, scales easily, removes the limitations of traditional networking solutions, and supports deployment in highly available environments. "]

['', 'Review sales performance, insights data, key initiatives, and new item launches with brand and customer teams to ensure robust plans are in place and being executed.', 'Communicate complicated technical topics and nuanced insights to diverse audiences;', 'Your Tasks And Responsibilities', 'Cultivates innovation, learning and change agility, customer focus, action oriented/drives results, collaborates globally and locally, plans and aligns and drives stakeholder engagement;', 'Master’s degree in Data Science, Business Analytics, Computer Science, Information Systems, or any other Quantitative discipline with at least one year of work experience as a Data Engineer or Data Scientist including college internships and projects;', 'Robust analytical capabilities across a variety of data sources and platforms with ability to translate into action-minded recommendations;', 'Previous experience in developing and maintaining complex big data analytical solution;', 'Automate existing systems to reduce data leakage and increase reporting frequency;', 'Strong knowledge of an experience with databases (SQL, etc.) and strong programming knowledge in Python;', 'Who You Are', 'Your application', 'An interest in, and some exposure to, one or more of the following tools and techniques, SQL, Tableau, Alteryx, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Data processing and basic statistical methods;Experience in the application of syndicated databases (IRI, Nielsen, and Custom). ', 'Solve brand-level analytical problems using quantitative approaches;', 'Support development and deployment of analytical models in the areas of statistical consumption forecasting by brand and key retailers;', 'Superior problem-solving skills;', 'Advanced computer literacy skill required, specifically Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint.', 'Bayer is an Equal Opportunity Employer/Disabled/VeteransBayer is committed to providing access and reasonable accommodations in its application process for individuals with disabilities and encourages applicants with disabilities to request any needed accommodation(s) using the contact information below.', 'An interest in, and some exposure to, one or more of the following tools and techniques, SQL, Tableau, Alteryx, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Data processing and basic statistical methods;', 'Previous experience working with cloud-based data and analytics platforms, standard business intelligence dashboards, and data enrichment techniques;', 'Proven experience in influence management; ', 'Build cutting edge machine learning algorithms to gain deeper insights into sales drivers;', 'Experience in the application of syndicated databases (IRI, Nielsen, and Custom). ', 'Break traditional patterns of thought by generating and recognizing imaginative, workable solutions to business situations and problems;', 'Adaptability to a diverse working environment with the ability to work successfully across the organization while being self-motivated;', 'Work with large amounts of data in service of concrete conclusions and actionable insights;', 'Master’s degree in Data Science, Business Analytics, Computer Science, Information Systems, or any other Quantitative discipline with at least one year of work experience as a Data Engineer or Data Scientist including college internships and projects;Strong knowledge of an experience with databases (SQL, etc.) and strong programming knowledge in Python;Previous experience in developing and maintaining complex big data analytical solution;Experience with Machine Learning/Statistical Learning;Previous experience working with cloud-based data and analytics platforms, standard business intelligence dashboards, and data enrichment techniques;Cultivates innovation, learning and change agility, customer focus, action oriented/drives results, collaborates globally and locally, plans and aligns and drives stakeholder engagement;Excellent written and oral communication skills;Adaptability to a diverse working environment with the ability to work successfully across the organization while being self-motivated;Proven experience in influence management; Proven ability to develop win-win solutions to complex situations; Superior problem-solving skills;Robust analytical capabilities across a variety of data sources and platforms with ability to translate into action-minded recommendations;Advanced computer literacy skill required, specifically Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint.', 'Excellent written and oral communication skills;', 'Experience with Machine Learning/Statistical Learning;', 'Proven ability to develop win-win solutions to complex situations; ', 'Automate data pipelines by doing ETL in cloud data systems such as Snowflake;', 'Write data pipelines to convert raw data into aggregated data that can be used as signals;', 'Support development and deployment of analytical models in the areas of statistical consumption forecasting by brand and key retailers;Work with large amounts of data in service of concrete conclusions and actionable insights;Communicate complicated technical topics and nuanced insights to diverse audiences;Write data pipelines to convert raw data into aggregated data that can be used as signals;Automate data pipelines by doing ETL in cloud data systems such as Snowflake;Build cutting edge machine learning algorithms to gain deeper insights into sales drivers;Automate existing systems to reduce data leakage and increase reporting frequency;Solve brand-level analytical problems using quantitative approaches;Break traditional patterns of thought by generating and recognizing imaginative, workable solutions to business situations and problems;Review sales performance, insights data, key initiatives, and new item launches with brand and customer teams to ensure robust plans are in place and being executed.']

job_title: Sr. Data Engineer, Corporate Decision Science
job_text: ['', ' Ability to provide clear data engineering technical leadership, mentoring, and best practices for data management and quality within and across teams', ' Experience and passion for the Media and Entertainment industry a plus', 'Sub-Business', 'Career Level', 'About Us', ' Process structured and unstructured data into a form suitable for analysis and reporting, empowering state-of-the-art analytics and machine learning environments for business analysts, data scientists and engineers ', ' Familiarity with relational databases and SQL and API implementations a plus', ' Experience building and maintaining production-grade data pipelines', ' Experience with open source and Enterprise software, Javascript preferred', ' Minimal Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or other quantitative field or equivalent, Master’s Degree preferred', 'Country', ' Ability to communicate insights and findings through data visualization tools such as Tableau', ' Provide clear data engineering technical leadership, mentoring, and best practices for data management and quality within and across teams ', ' Team-oriented and collaborative approach with a demonstrated aptitude and willingness to learn new methods and tools', 'Responsibilities', 'Qualifications/Requirements', ' Ability to quickly establish solutions and take advantage of ML/AI technologies', ' Evangelize a very high standard of quality, reliability and performance for data models and algorithms that can be streamlined into the engineering and sciences workflow ', ' Process structured and unstructured data into a form suitable for analysis and reporting, empowering state-of-the-art analytics and machine learning environments for business analysts, data scientists and engineers  Operationalize data science models and products in a cluster-computing environment working closely with data scientists to understand requirements and develop appropriate feature engineering to deliver high performing models  Build data pipeline frameworks to automate high-volume and real-time data delivery  Provide clear data engineering technical leadership, mentoring, and ['', 'What you’ll do', 'Propose and deliver scalability and performance enhancements to our GUIs', 'The secret to our award-winning culture is our Core Values:\xa0Team Belvedere, Me In Team, Own It, Iterative Innovation, and Passionate Discourse.\xa0We live and breathe these values every day.', 'Who we are', 'Belvedere Trading is looking for a Front Office Software Engineer with the experience to work on an entrepreneurial team building high-performance automated trading systems. Belvedere encourages initiatives to increase diversity and provide equal opportunity to all applicants and employees. Belvedere is committed to providing a positive environment in which team members are treated with respect, dignity, and courtesy. ['', 'Genworth Financial, Inc. is a leading insurance holding company committed to helping families achieve the dream of home ownership and address the financial challenges of aging through its leadership positions in mortgage insurance and long-term care insurance. Headquartered in Richmond, Virginia, Genworth traces its roots back to 1871. ', '• Strong communication (i.e. oral, written, interpersonal, and presentation) skills', '• We have a real impact on the lives of the people we serve', 'The Data Scientist will report to the Senior Manager, Data Science and provides analytical cross-functional support through effective use of predictive analytics and forecasting methods to improve operational visibility and efficiencies. This Raleigh-based position will support cross-functional as well as cross-platform (including international) advanced modeling and promote best practices sharing at Genworth.', '• Research current processes and proactively identify emerging needs for analytic models', '• Bachelor’s degree required', '• Become a trusted analytical partner to the functional areas of support (Marketing, customer solutions, Underwriting, Loss Mitigation, Pricing) and collaborate on the development and planning of analytic projects in response to business needs', 'Genworth Mortgage Insurance, headquartered in Raleigh, North Carolina, is a global mortgage insurer with a major presence in the United States and Australia. With origins dating back to 1980, Genworth Mortgage Insurance provides primary mortgage guaranty insurance coverage on residential mortgage loans, as well as mortgage pool insurance policies that enhance insurance coverage for various types of mortgage-related securities. Our mortgage insurance can help individuals secure low down payment loans and realize the dream of home ownership faster – even for the first time.', '• Business acumen along with a strong understanding of statistical modeling / machine learning (ML) and forecasting techniques is required. The candidate must be able to drive processes and implement project plans effectively', '• Design, create and implement advanced analytics and forecasting models to optimize business processes. Provide insights for decision making through the use of ML, and traditional statistical modeling', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'o Child Care Subsidy Program', 'YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES', 'REQUIREMENTS', 'LOCATION', '• Ability to perform complex day-to-day ETL tasks such as data gathering, data cleaning, wrangling, coding or programming, business and analytics requirements gathering, and data analysis ', 'POSITION TITLE', 'Data Scientist', 'The duties and responsibilities of this role require that the position be physically based in the USMI headquarters office in Raleigh, NC.', 'We know we can’t deliver on our mission unless we deliver for our employees. That’s why we’re committed to creating a work environment that fosters diversity, inclusion, excellence, improvement and connection. We know each employee contributes in their own unique way and we’re dedicated to supporting every one of them to help them reach their full potential.', 'o 40 hours of volunteer time off', '• Develop supervised (regression and classification) and unsupervised (e.g. clustering and segmentation) models', '• Master’s degree or above, formal training in a quantitative research field such as: Statistics, Biostatistics, Econometrics, Operations Research, Computer Science, Demography / Actuarial Science, Mathematics, Predictive Analytics (e.g. random forests, survival analysis, clustering / segmentation, neural networks), Data Science, Quantitative Social Sciences, Epidemiology, Engineering etc. ', '• Experience or background in customer focused fields including mortgage business, marketing, sales, customer research and product management', 'Raleigh, NC', 'o Medical, Dental, Vision, Flexible Spending Account options beginning your first day ', '• Ability to influence decision makers and drive consensus', 'The Data Scientist is part of a highly analytical team that provides business critical intelligence and advice for decision support. In this role, you will collaborate with partners in operations (underwriting, claims), marketing, products and customer experience, pricing, risk and other functions to define problems, identify data, build reports and dashboards, establish predictive and prescriptive models, and deliver optimal solutions across the entire range of Genworth’s line of business and customers. ', '• Communicate and document statistical analyses and methods in a logical and understandable manner for non-analytical business users and executive decision makers. ', '• Partner with IT and Enterprise Data Management Organization (EDMO) teams on the evaluation of data assets and their proper use', 'Genworth Mortgage Insurance is looking for a motivated and talented professional with a background in data and analytics to work on insurance focused analytics problems. This is a dynamic and challenging opportunity to apply the latest tools and methods in Big Data and Data Science to a variety of business problems.', '• Experience in advance analytics. Hands-on experience with logistic regression, time series, forecasting, optimization, and other predictive modeling techniques. ML experience and knowledge of ML platforms, libraries and programming', '• We work on challenging and rewarding projects', '• Ensure accuracy of results and analytic methods. Perform regular validation and collaborations of the analytical models', 'o 12 Paid Holidays', '• Minimum of 4 years business analytics and business support functions experience', '• 3+ years of experience in one or more of the following statistical / analytic languages such as Python, Apache Spark (or PySpark), Hive, Scala, preferably in a cloud computing environment e.g. AWS, Databricks, Azure, Cloudera, Hortonworks, Google Cloud, Anaconda etc.', 'QUALIFICATIONS', 'YOUR ROLE ', '• Fulfill ad-hoc requests timely and efficiently', '• We are undergoing modernization of our data science practices from SAS legacy systems to the latest tools in Amazon Web Services (AWS) where we leverage data hosting and machine learning services. This role requires candidates who embrace change and are willing to continuously learn as data science industry tools and practices change', 'WHY WORK AT GENWORTH', 'o 401K Account with matching contributions ', 'o Paid Family Leave', '• Collaborate with peer analysts to ensure the use of models for optimized decision making', '• Evolve and advance customer behavioral segmentation models, building marketing, sales and product predicative models, analyzing results and movements of segments/clusters and providing business insights to grow the company’s market share and revenue ', 'COMPANY', 'o Tuition Reimbursement and Student Loan Repayment', '• 3+ years of experience in one or more of the following: database query and management tools (SQL, Spark, Hive / HQL etc.) ', '• Provide mentorship and share knowledge with functional and cross-functional peers', '• We give back to the communities where we live ', 'o 20 days of Choice Time Off your first full year', '• Ability to translate business needs into technical requirements', '• Demonstrate strong business acumen and understanding of mortgage insurance concepts', 'ADDITIONAL ', '• Determine requirements, evaluate analytical approaches and take ownership of the processes of creating predictive models to optimize decision making for functional areas', '• We offer competitive benefits including:', '• Develop and perform preliminary exploratory analysis on datasets associated with building advanced ML models. Ability to work with structured and unstructured data']

['', 'Flexible time off & paid holidays', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Experience as an Business Systems Engineer with proven BI solution design and development', 'Parental leave program', 'Develop requirements and system design for integrations and applications that scale and perform with reliabilityPartner with data owners to implement new data sources required to support reporting, analytics, and decision makingBuild and maintain integrations across a diverse array of enterprise systems: Salesforce, Freshdesk, Redshift, AWS, SaaS Optics, and many othersOwn the end to end development of reports and dashboardsHelp shape systems engineering and BI practices to meet the needs of the business', "Why You'll Love It Here!", 'Being part of a great team with solid infrastructure in place.', 'You will partner directly with multiple stakeholders including Finance, Marketing, Customer Success, Sales Operations, and Engineering to architect our key integrations and connect data sources. You will do this by identifying the systems and data needs that will streamline operations and ultimately support the scalability of Knock. If you are energized by the idea of making a direct impact to the effectiveness, efficiency, and a culture of data driven decision making, we want to hear from you!', 'We have been recognized across multiple platforms as a best place to work, including 2021’s 50 Best Places to Work Multifamily®:\xa0https://bit.ly/3mq06z8\xa0and Seattle’s Best Small Companies to Work in 2020 by BuiltIn Seattle:\xa0http://bit.ly/3r1uUKf', 'Partner with data owners to implement new data sources required to support reporting, analytics, and decision making', 'Experience integrating multiple enterprise systems, such as CRM, CXM, ERP, and data warehouses', 'Experience standing up databases and BI reporting tools such as Tableau', 'At Knock we don’t discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, nationality, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. We welcome all types!', 'Experience as an Business Systems Engineer with proven BI solution design and developmentExperience integrating multiple enterprise systems, such as CRM, CXM, ERP, and data warehousesSoftware development or automation experience; especially ETLSQL development experienceKnowledge of cloud platforms such as AWSExperience standing up databases and BI reporting tools such as TableauDemonstrated ability to quickly learn new technologies and skillsAbility to work independently & effectively, who also enjoys collaboration\xa0Demonstrated ability to effectively communicate with stakeholders with varying degrees of technical proficiency', "You'll join a category-creating company that has enthusiastic customers, an ambitious roadmap, and industry leading products.", 'Demonstrated ability to effectively communicate with stakeholders with varying degrees of technical proficiency', 'We’ve developed an industry-defining SaaS platform, an intelligent front office platform providing the productivity and business intelligence tools needed to maximize occupancy, rent growth, and customer satisfaction at every community. Our customers trust us to deliver the consumer experiences and business applications that are essential to their bottom line. The proof is in our 10x revenue growth over the past two years, in addition to our numerous industry awards.', 'You want an opportunity to win, drive change and be in an environment that will optimize for your success.', 'Day - to - Day', 'SQL development experience', "You'll join a category-creating company that has enthusiastic customers, an ambitious roadmap, and industry leading products.You are comfortable taking risks and thinking outside the box.Being part of a great team with solid infrastructure in place.You want an opportunity to win, drive change and be in an environment that will optimize for your success.You embrace our set of core values - determination, excellence, trust, and community.100% medical, dental, and vision coverage for full-time employees. Partial family coverage optional.Flexible time off & paid holidaysParental leave program401k to help you save for the futureStock optionsWe like to do fun things together (Virtual for now!) such as conferences, off site retreats, and happy hours.Whatever mode of transportation you use - we got you covered! (Or remote work from home budget if you are not Seattle based)", 'You are comfortable taking risks and thinking outside the box.', 'Help shape systems engineering and BI practices to meet the needs of the business', 'We are looking for an experienced Business Systems Engineer who will be responsible for integrating critical business systems, resulting in improved process automation, accessible business intelligence data, and better decision making.', '100% medical, dental, and vision coverage for full-time employees. Partial family coverage optional.', 'Develop requirements and system design for integrations and applications that scale and perform with reliability', 'Build and maintain integrations across a diverse array of enterprise systems: Salesforce, Freshdesk, Redshift, AWS, SaaS Optics, and many others', 'You embrace our set of core values - determination, excellence, trust, and community.', 'Ability to work independently & effectively, who also enjoys collaboration\xa0', '401k to help you save for the future', 'We like to do fun things together (Virtual for now!) such as conferences, off site retreats, and happy hours.', 'Knowledge of cloud platforms such as AWS', 'The Role', 'The Company\xa0', 'We started Knock to solve problems we faced ourselves. One of those problems was that the process for renting an apartment hadn’t evolved at the same pace as technology. Our mission was to improve the experience for both apartment renters and managers.\xa0', 'Software development or automation experience; especially ETL', 'Whatever mode of transportation you use - we got you covered! (Or remote work from home budget if you are not Seattle based)', 'To be successful and recognized as a high performer at Knock, you should naturally encompass our core values: Determination, Excellence, Trust and Community. We take these behaviors seriously and expect everyone to bring a positive Knockstar attitude with them to work every day.', 'Own the end to end development of reports and dashboards', 'Our Values', 'In May 2020 we announced we raised a $12m Series B round to continue on the path of growth, led by Madrona Venture Group, with partners from Lead Edge Capital and Seven Peaks Ventures:\xa0https://bit.ly/2WfllsX', 'Stock options', 'Demonstrated ability to quickly learn new technologies and skills', 'At Knock, we have a #oneteam philosophy. A big part of bringing new capabilities to life is to continue to bring in exceptional talent that works together toward a common goal. We’ve been incredibly fortunate to build an amazing team that delivers real value to our customers each and every day. We can’t wait to hear from you!']

job_title: Senior Data Visualization Developer - Remote Opportunity
job_text: ['', 'Takes ownership of dashboards & reports development for the given subject areas', 'This information is posted pursuant to the Colorado Equal Pay for Equal Work Act to provide Colorado applicants with information about what they might be eligible to receive. Individual pay decisions will depend on job-related factors such as experience, education, skill, performance, and geographic location where work will be performed.', 'Uses mastery of tools such as Excel, Power BI, Tableau, Looker, or something similar, to visualize and share data.', 'Experience with data preparation, data cleansing and transformation', " Bachelor's degree in related field or the equivalent through a combination of education and related work experience. ", 'Effectively clean, prep, and analyze data using descriptive statistics and exploratory data analysis.Provides operational support Takes ownership of dashboards & reports development for the given subject areasUses mastery of tools such as Excel, Power BI, Tableau, Looker, or something similar, to visualize and share data.Works closely with business users to gather requirementsGathers feedback and creates recommendations for improving the usability of BI solutions.Articulates clear and trusted recommendations based on analysis.Able to execute against set objectives.\xa0', 'Articulates clear and trusted recommendations based on analysis.', 'What you’ll bring to the team…', 'Provides operational support ', '1 year or more of hands-on Looker development experience including LOOKML', 'Experience with D3.js or similar charting libraries\xa0', 'Successful candidates may be able to participate in one or more incentive compensation or short-term incentive plans, which could generate additional earnings in accordance with the terms of each plan.', 'As the Senior Data Visualization Developer you will use previous experience with a toolset to analyze business problems from internal and external sources to provide insight to decision-makers. Identifies and interprets trends and patterns in datasets to locate influences. Creates specifications for reports and analysis based on business needs and required or available data elements. May directly produce datasets and reports for analysis using system reporting tools.', 'Gathers feedback and creates recommendations for improving the usability of BI solutions.', " Bachelor's degree in related field or the equivalent through a combination of education and related work experience. Minimum 7 years of BI development experience1 year or more of hands-on Looker development experience including LOOKMLMinimum 5 years of reports, dashboard development with MSFT tools and technologiesProficient in SQL with 5-6 years experienceProficient working in agile development mode with use of Trello or JIRA like task management toolsExperience working with data warehouse, data marts, and design concepts Experience with data preparation, data cleansing and transformationExperience with Python Exposure to Design Thinking or similar UX processes and philosophiesExperience with D3.js or similar charting libraries\xa0", 'Minimum 7 years of BI development experience', 'What you’ll bring to the team… ', 'Pay range for this position is $__80,000___ to $__120,000___ ', 'Able to execute against set objectives.\xa0', 'H&R Block offers competitive medical, prescription drug, dental and vision benefits for regular associates and/or their eligible dependents.\xa0Eligible associates can also participate in the H&R Block Retirement Savings Plan (401(k) Plan), Employee Stock Purchase Program, Employee Assistance Program, Tuition Assistance Program, (virtual) fitness center programs, associate discount program,\xa0flexible spending and health savings accounts, and a variety of wellness programs.\xa0Associates also receive Tax Prep benefits, paid time off benefits, Life Insurance,\xa0AD&D coverage, Short Term Disability and Business Travel Accident Insurance coverage.', "What you'll do... :", 'Exposure to Design Thinking or similar UX processes and philosophies', 'Proficient in SQL with 5-6 years experience', 'Minimum 5 years of reports, dashboard development with MSFT tools and technologies', 'Effectively clean, prep, and analyze data using descriptive statistics and exploratory data analysis.', 'Experience working with data warehouse, data marts, and design concepts ', 'Proficient working in agile development mode with use of Trello or JIRA like task management tools', 'Experience with Python ', "What you'll do...", 'Works closely with business users to gather requirements']

This position may require travel in the US and Canada.  U.S. citizens and those authorized to work in the U.S. are encouraged to apply. We are not able to sponsor at this time  As an MLOps Consultant, responsibility may include: AWS Specialization Understand the MLOps requirements Lead MLOps projects You will support and maintain data science models, underlying source code and configuration scripts. Apply MLOps processes for monitoring and automation of various steps of ML model support. Explain the model output to business stakeholders while taking feedback to improve the models. Perform root cause analysis for performance issues with ML Models and implement remedial measures. Analyze large amounts of data, presenting data insights using high impact visualization, Provide regular support/guidance to project teams on MLOps coordination, issue resolution and execution  Preferred  Data Scientist  Qualifications:4 + years of experience in Data Analytics 4 + years of experience in software development life cycle  2 years of experience in Project life cycle activities on development and maintenance projects.  1 year of experience in Python, Java, Scalar, Pyspark  1 year of experience in Relational Modeling, Dimensional Modeling, and Modeling of Unstructured Data  Strong written and oral communication skills  Ability to work in team in diverse/ multiple stakeholder environment  Analytical skills  Experience and desire to work in a Global delivery environment  The job entails sitting as well as working at a computer for extended periods of time. Should be able to communicate by telephone, email or face to face.About UsInfosys is a global leader in next-generation digital services and consulting. We enable clients in 46 countries to navigate their digital transformation.With over three decades of experience in managing the systems and workings of global enterprises, we expertly steer our clients through their digital journey. We also empower the business with agile digital at scale to deliver unprecedented levels of performance and customer delight. ['', 'This role is based in Santa Clara, CA and is not a remote position.', 'Have a strong command in Python', 'Enjoy taking ownership and getting things done - we value curiosity (willingness to figure things out and understand how systems work), passion (strong desire to build the right things and build things right), and entrepreneurial spirit (a bias for action and getting things done).\xa0', 'Experience working on healthcare products', 'Nice to Have', 'Senior Software Engineer - Data', 'This is also a product engineering role. You will be part of a small, close-knit, cross-functional team including product managers, backend engineers, frontend engineers, data scientists and designers on a mission to understand customer needs and build thoughtful solutions that solve hard problems.\xa0', 'Collaborate with PM, Design and Data Science to understand and solve customer problems with elegant solutions.\xa0', 'Responsibilities', 'Collaborate with PM, Design and Data Science to understand and solve customer problems with elegant solutions.\xa0Produce thoughtful design docs and readable, performant, automation testing friendly code.\xa0Take ownership of the code base and proactively leave the code better than it was by continuously improving it.Perform design and code reviews and resolve production issues and ensure that the service is running smoothly at all times.\xa0Make the team stronger by sharing your knowledge via documentation, blogs, tech talks, etc.\xa0', 'Are comfortable with ambiguity - healthcare data can be messy and challenging and requires patience, tenacity, and reverse engineering skill. But the satisfaction when customers love our features is priceless.\xa0', 'Job Description:', '3+ years of professional experience working on production RESTful web services in cloud environments (AWS or GCP)Have a strong command in PythonHave a strong command on SQL and database performanceEnjoy taking ownership and getting things done - we value curiosity (willingness to figure things out and understand how systems work), passion (strong desire to build the right things and build things right), and entrepreneurial spirit (a bias for action and getting things done).\xa0Are comfortable with ambiguity - healthcare data can be messy and challenging and requires patience, tenacity, and reverse engineering skill. But the satisfaction when customers love our features is priceless.\xa0', 'Perform design and code reviews and resolve production issues and ensure that the service is running smoothly at all times.\xa0', 'Experience working with serverless technologies like AWS lambdas, API Gateways and SQSExperience in developing GraphQL APIsExperience working on healthcare products', 'Make the team stronger by sharing your knowledge via documentation, blogs, tech talks, etc.\xa0', 'Produce thoughtful design docs and readable, performant, automation testing friendly code.\xa0', 'Qualifications', 'Experience in developing GraphQL APIs', 'Have a strong command on SQL and database performance', 'They are open to all levels and are open to the title: Software Engineer, Senior Software Engineer, or Principal Software Engineer level based on your experience and strengths. ', 'They are a fast-growing healthcare tech company that develops software that increases patient access to medical care by optimizing how health systems use expensive, constrained resources. More than 300 hospitals, health systems, and cancer centers – including Stanford Health, Duke University Health System, MultiCare Health, UCSF Health, Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center, the University of Texas MD Anderson Cancer Center, UCHealth, OhioHealth, NewYork-Presbyterian, Johns Hopkins Medicine, and others – rely on their products to improve patient access, decrease wait times, and lower the cost of healthcare delivery. ', 'You will be part of a small, close-knit, cross-functional team consisting of data engineers, data scientists, and product managers to solve customer data problems with elegant, well thought out solutions.\xa0', 'Take ownership of the code base and proactively leave the code better than it was by continuously improving it.', 'Experience working with serverless technologies like AWS lambdas, API Gateways and SQS', '3+ years of professional experience working on production RESTful web services in cloud environments (AWS or GCP)', 'They have also raised $110+ million dollars from prominent investors in healthcare, including $40 million from Goldman Sachs. The team includes veteran executives and the brightest minds backed by industry leaders in the healthcare space. CBInsights recently named them among the top 100 AI companies in the world. Healthcare Innovation selected them as the 2019 winner in the Data Analytics category.', 'They are an equal opportunity employer and are committed to providing reasonable accommodations and will work with you to meet your needs. If you are a person with a disability and require assistance during the application process, please don’t hesitate to reach out.']

['', 'Come work with a high caliber team, where everyone is an engineer first and we guide our decisions with data and celebrate our results.\xa0', 'AI Training and Inference is very inefficient today incurring huge costs with real impact on the environment. We live in the Jurassic era of A.I efficiency and Nod.AI believes we can do much better with a solid focus on our Computer Science fundamentals with first principles thinking. ', 'Our A.I Compiler Engineers deliver the best front end for various Machine Learning frameworks like Tensorflow, PyTorch etc and very efficiently parallelize and distribute the workloads onto the Nod Runtime for auto-tuned high performance execution on large clusters and SoCs.\xa0Our ML Systems Engineers effectively deploy compiled A.I models onto a wide range of hardware platforms – from supercomputers with thousands of devices to System-on-Chip designs with hundreds of processing elements (PEs).\xa0', 'As a MLSys Engineer you would be responsible for scaling out the Nod AI Runtime over multiple devices on a single host and across hundreds of machines in a HPC / Datacenter environment.', 'We enable companies to efficiently deploy Machine Learning models without doing the heavy lifting of optimizing the frameworks and models for their hardware and clusters.\xa0', 'We live in the Jurassic era of A.I efficiency']

['', '•\xa0Experience with JBOSS, WildFly or other Java application servers.', '•\xa0Proficient with Java in a SaaS based environment.', 'As a member of a scrum team, you will contribute not only by the creation of software, but by sharing your experience with members of the department through design mentoring, development of software components and peer code reviews.', '•\xa0Work as part of a scrum team to develop new features for patients and practices', 'We are looking for a strong engineer who is self-motivated and is a problem solver. You meet our technical skills and professional expectations below by having experience working within Agile development environments from design all the way through to delivery with minimum senior oversight.', '•\xa0Drive consistency in the approach to the team’s software development', '•\xa0Identify and drive improvements to our software and development processes', '•\xa0Proficient with JEE or Spring frameworks.', '•\xa0Proficient in developing services using REST with JSON.', 'Qualification Requirements:', '•\xa0Experience with Apache Camel, ActiveMQ, Kafka,\xa0ElasticSearch\xa0a plus', '•\xa0Proficient in CCD / CCDA', '•\xa0Minimum\xa04+ years experience developing robust applications with high availability, performance and scalability requirements in an Agile environment.', '\xa0Proficient in CCD / CCDA', 'Responsibilities:', '•\xa0Experience with MongoDB', '•\xa0Experience with Healthcare IT a plus', '•\xa0Experience\xa0in database development using SQL/NoSQL.', '•\xa0Proficient in FHIR', '\xa0', 'Our client has revolutionized the way health data flows between health IT systems and the patients, consumers, and organizations who need access to that data. Our innovative permission-based platform for health record retrieval puts patients in control of their own data; accessed, aggregated, and shared on their terms. Today Greenlight Health offers robust patient-initiated data retrieval across 40+ leading EHR patient portals and more than 700,000 providers. Our healthcare APIs are highly secure, compatible with FHIR and other emerging health IT standards, and easy to integrate.', '•\xa0Experience with ORM technologies such as Hibernate, JPA, or JDBC\xa0Template.', '•\xa0Create and utilize automated unit tests to ensure quality of code', '•\xa0Experience developing micro services highly desired', '•\xa0Work with Product Management and an Experience Design team to develop solutions that delight our customers', '•\xa0Experience with AWS (Amazon Web Service)\xa0a plus', 'You are comfortable to interact with cross functional teams on a regular basis, take individual responsibility for features, work with more senior members on larger efforts, and take part in continuously improving our products and company.', 'You want to help build products that make a difference in the world and are enthusiastic to have the opportunity to help patients to be able to take control of their own health data.\xa0', '•\xa0Participate in peer design and code reviews', '•\xa0Ability to diagnose and resolve issues in complex environments.', "•\xa0Design, develop and maintain well defined APIs that meet client's needs", '•\xa0Design and implement highly scalable and\xa0maintainable solutions', '•\xa0BS or MS in Computer Science or related field.']

['Make legacy code run faster on embedded devices', 'Document and version control the code to allow for easy walk-backs and sharing with other divisions in Bosch, local or international.\xa0', 'Your responsibility would be to develop algorithms that enable the DA and AD applications from such as ACC up to piloted driving. job_title: Senior Developer Technology Engineer, Data Analytics
job_text: ['', 'Ways To Stand Out', 'Work directly with key customers to perform in-depth analysis and optimization of complex data intensive workloads to ensure the best possible performance on current and next-generation GPU architectures.', 'Collaborate with libraries, tools, system software architecture, hardware, and research teams at NVIDIA to influence the design of next-generation programming models, software, and architectures.', 'In-depth expertise with computer architecture fundamentals, especially memory subsystem.', 'Experience with parallel programming, e.g., CUDA, OpenACC, OpenMP, MPI, pthreads, TBB, etc.', 'In this role, you will research and develop techniques to GPU-accelerate applications across data analytics domains, e.g., ETL, ML, graphs, etc., and intersecting with DL.Work directly with key customers to perform in-depth analysis and optimization of complex data intensive workloads to ensure the best possible performance on current and next-generation GPU architectures.Collaborate with libraries, tools, system software architecture, hardware, and research teams at NVIDIA to influence the design of next-generation programming models, software, and architectures.', 'A Bachelors, Masters or PhD in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related computationally focused science degree (or equivalent experience)At least 3+ years of relevant work or research experience.Programming fluency in C/C++ with a deep understanding of algorithms and software design.Experience with parallel programming, e.g., CUDA, OpenACC, OpenMP, MPI, pthreads, TBB, etc.In-depth expertise with computer architecture fundamentals, especially memory subsystem.Good communication and organization skills, with a logical approach to problem solving, and prioritization skills.', 'Programming fluency in C/C++ with a deep understanding of algorithms and software design.', 'Good communication and organization skills, with a logical approach to problem solving, and prioritization skills.', 'Experience with compression, storage systems, networking, and distributed systems.', 'In this role, you will research and develop techniques to GPU-accelerate applications across data analytics domains, e.g., ETL, ML, graphs, etc., and intersecting with DL.', 'A Bachelors, Masters or PhD in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related computationally focused science degree (or equivalent experience)', 'Graduate degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or related engineering discipline.', 'Experience with linear algebra and machine learning applications.', 'We are now looking for a Senior Developer Technology Engineer, Data Analytics:', 'What We Need To See', 'At least 3+ years of relevant work or research experience.', 'What You Will Be Doing', 'Domain expertise in data analytics, e.g., ETL, ML, graph algorithms.', 'Domain expertise in data analytics, e.g., ETL, ML, graph algorithms.Experience with compression, storage systems, networking, and distributed systems.Experience with linear algebra and machine learning applications.Graduate degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or related engineering discipline.']

['Familiar with DevOps processes (Continuous Integration, Automation, etc.)', 'At Slalom, we put people first. Every individual who joins us becomes part of our fabric, weaving their talents and perspectives into the greater whole of who we are. Our local model enables our consultants to get off the road and make a large impact to local clients in their own communities.Fortune 100 Best Companies to Work For 2016-2019Glassdoor Best Places to Work 2016-2019Who You Are?Do you want to build innovative web and mobile applications? Are you a passionate, motivated problem solver who loves tackling new challenges using the latest web, mobile and cloud technologies? Do you love coding, and find yourself keeping up with the newest technology trends? If so, come join Slalom Minneapolis’ Technology Enablement Practice as a Software Engineer!Defining Your SuccessTo be successful in this role, we are looking for consultants with:5+ years of development and/or consulting experience is requiredAbility to program in Java, C#, JavaScript, Objective-C or SwiftProficiency with multiple programming environments and toolsFamiliarity with developing multi-platform softwareDisplay passion for delivering high quality products that meet customer’s needs, the craft of software development and a drive to improve technically.Strong problem-solving and software triage skills with the ability to work multi-functionally in a fast-moving and constantly evolving work environmentKnowledge of agile methodologiesWe would look for you to be comfortable with the following tasks and actions:Be an active member of a growing team; help define and influence team culture & standardsLead development on a wide range of projects for the world’s top companiesWork on solution-based, outcome-oriented projects with a highly skilled teamBuild technical acumen through hands-on experience with the latest technologies and delivery methodologiesExperience with RESTful web services and APIsExperience with common JavaScript libraries (Angular, React, jQuery)Familiar with SQL and NoSQL databases (MongoDB, CouchDB, etc.)Familiar with DevOps processes (Continuous Integration, Automation, etc.)Work in a fast-paced, agile project environment with small, focused teamsThe DetailsPosition located in Twin Cities MetroSlalom operates under a local consulting model and we treat travel as an opt-in only. It is unlikely that travel outside of your local market would be required.The Process:Our process is highly personalized.
