job_title: Software Engineer - Data Engineering and Internal Products
job_text: ['', 'Clever Perks', "We're looking for talented engineers who want to help build Clever into something every household, school, student, and teacher relies on.", 'A Day in the Life', 'We work across the full stack to create products that are robust and delightful for all internal Clever team members to use. We write frontend code in Node.js, TypeScript, and React and use Go for backend. We also use MongoDB, Postgres, DynamoDB,\xa0and many AWS services (AWS Glue, ECS, Step Functions, etc).', 'Empower internal teams by adding new features to Clever’s comprehensive platform for internal tools, used by almost everyone at Clever every dayWork with internal customers such as customer support, customer success, marketing, and other product/engineering teams to understand their needs and develop solutions', 'Unlimited Paid Time Off', 'Understanding of software engineering practices, OOD, design pattern, data structures and algorithms.', "A competitive salary and equity package in a well-funded, high-growth companyUnlimited Paid Time OffTop-notch healthcare, vision, and dental coverage for you and your familyBest-in-class mental healthcare service that supports employees' mental and emotional wellnessUnlimited credits for learning on amazon.com and small, local bookstoresAnnual company retreat and quarterly team eventsAn incredible team of fun, bright coworkers", 'Bringing our internal dashboards in line with our external products using new frontend technologies and enforcing best practices.', 'Strong experience with full-stack development including React, Node.js, HTML, and CSS.', 'A competitive salary and equity package in a well-funded, high-growth company', 'An incredible team of fun, bright coworkers', 'Empower internal teams by adding new features to Clever’s comprehensive platform for internal tools, used by almost everyone at Clever every day', 'You might be a fit for this role if you have:', 'Proactively surfacing opportunities for customer-facing teams\xa0', 'A desire to work in a diverse, highly collaborative team environment.', "Best-in-class mental healthcare service that supports employees' mental and emotional wellness", '2+ years of experience as a Software Engineer.', "Clever is the fastest growing product in K-12 education. Over 500 education software companies and 60% of America's schools rely on Clever to put the best learning tools in the hands of tens of millions of students every day. Clever's job is to make this task incredibly simple, despite the complex legacies of the school system.", 'Unlimited credits for learning on amazon.com and small, local bookstores', 'Troubleshooting tools to help customer support representatives quickly diagnose and solve issues.', 'Excellent communication skills.', 'Work with internal customers such as customer support, customer success, marketing, and other product/engineering teams to understand their needs and develop solutions', 'Customized views to allow internal customers to focus on the information that helps them excel at their job.', 'Customized views to allow internal customers to focus on the information that helps them excel at their job.Troubleshooting tools to help customer support representatives quickly diagnose and solve issues.Enabling internal users to subscribe to notifications for product events they care aboutProactively surfacing opportunities for customer-facing teams\xa0Bringing our internal dashboards in line with our external products using new frontend technologies and enforcing best practices.', 'Because the DEIP team is also responsible for the company’s internal data analytics, you’ll also get the opportunity to work with data technologies such as both SQL and NoSQL, Spark, Redshift, and Snowflake.\xa0', 'Annual company retreat and quarterly team events', 'Things We’re Looking For', 'Enabling internal users to subscribe to notifications for product events they care about', '2+ years of experience as a Software Engineer.Strong experience with full-stack development including React, Node.js, HTML, and CSS.Understanding of software engineering practices, OOD, design pattern, data structures and algorithms.Excellent communication skills.A desire to work in a diverse, highly collaborative team environment.Experience with Go, Java, C++ or other backend programming languages is a big plus.A Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience.', 'Experience with Go, Java, C++ or other backend programming languages is a big plus.', 'A Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience.', 'As an engineer on the team, you’ll enable and empower internal teams by adding new features to Clever’s comprehensive web application platform for internal tools. By working with internal customers such as customer support, customer success, product development, and other engineering teams. Part of your job will be to:\xa0', 'On the Data Engineering and Internal Products team, our mission is to give Cleverites superpowers! We build internal tools to improve efficiency and unlock insights for every team at Clever.', 'You’ll design and implement new product features such as:', 'Top-notch healthcare, vision, and dental coverage for you and your family', 'The Opportunity']

['', 'To conform to U.S. Government space technology export regulations, applicant must be a U.S. citizen, lawful permanent resident of the U.S., protected individual as defined by 8 U.S.C. 1324b(a)(3), or eligible to obtain the required authorizations from the U.S. Department of State. ', 'High-performance computing experience', 'Experience with software verification and validation', 'Formed in 2019, USNC-Tech is an independently operated and managed subsidiary of Ultra Safe Nuclear Corporation. We are based in Seattle, WA with a waterfront office on Salmon Bay.\xa0We are a small team and require all employees to be multi-disciplined and open to tackling a variety of tasks. A professional, positive, and pleasant attitude is a must.\xa0', 'Ability to write formal documentation\xa0', 'Experience in automation of software\xa0', 'Experience with nuclear engineering software', 'USNC-Tech is a nuclear technology company that specializes in the design of compact nuclear energy systems for space and terrestrial uses. Our mission is to enable the settlement of outer space and meet humanity’s clean energy needs through developing commercial nuclear technologies.\xa0', 'Build-in data methods to support future meta-design activities\xa0', 'Develop software to efficiently couple simulation tools to allow for efficient analyses of a fleet of nuclear reactors - through their lifetime', 'Experience in integrating various software/simulation tools', 'This position’s primary focus will be developing, enhancing, and coupling nuclear reactor analysis software to aid in the design and licensing of USNC’s Micro-Modular Reactor (MMR) technology as well as USNC-Tech’s space reactors.', 'Develop software to efficiently couple simulation tools to allow for efficient analyses of a fleet of nuclear reactors - through their lifetimeEnhance software to provide better user experiences via documentation and testingBuild-in data methods to support future meta-design activities\xa0', '\xa0', 'Domain level knowledge in Neutronic-Deterministic, Neutronic-Stochastic, Thermal-1D Nodal, Thermal-FEA, Thermal-CFD, Structural-FEA, Nuclear Accident/Plume Modelling, or Fuel Performance Modelling', 'Preferred Additional Skills and Experience:', 'Strong programming experience with Python (or equivalent), particularly in data management/processing and object-oriented design', 'Export Control Requirements:', 'Qualifications:', 'Experience with software design practices and tools like git, code-review, and good documentation practices', 'B.S. (or higher) in software engineering, nuclear engineering with a software focus, or another engineering related field', 'USNC-Tech is an Equal Opportunity Employer; employment with USNC-Tech is governed on the basis of merit, competence, and qualifications and will not be influenced in any manner by race, color, religion, gender, national origin/ethnicity, veteran status, disability status, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, mental or physical disability, or any other legally-protected status.', 'Optimization methods familiarity', 'Strong programming experience with Python (or equivalent), particularly in data management/processing and object-oriented designB.S. (or higher) in software engineering, nuclear engineering with a software focus, or another engineering related fieldExperience in integrating various software/simulation toolsExperience in automation of software\xa0Working knowledge of numerical methods\xa0Experience with software design practices and tools like git, code-review, and good documentation practices', 'Working knowledge of numerical methods\xa0', 'Enhance software to provide better user experiences via documentation and testing', 'Main Responsibilities:', 'Optimization methods familiarityAbility to write formal documentation\xa0High-performance computing experienceExperience with nuclear engineering softwareDomain level knowledge in Neutronic-Deterministic, Neutronic-Stochastic, Thermal-1D Nodal, Thermal-FEA, Thermal-CFD, Structural-FEA, Nuclear Accident/Plume Modelling, or Fuel Performance ModellingExperience with software verification and validation']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Distributed Systems, C++ Data Path
job_text: ['', 'Cohesity\xa0Data Management Simplified:\xa0One Platform, One UI', 'Replication and disaster recovery', 'You have worked on and understand any of:', 'Experience with debugging, diagnosing, and trouble-shooting complex, production software.', 'Proven skills to solve complex problems.', 'Cohesity', 'For information on personal data processing, please see our\xa0Privacy Policy.', 'Privacy Policy.', 'Cohesity Data Platform', 'BS/MS/PhD in Computer Science with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms, and software design', 'Expert level knowledge in identifying performance bottlenecks and performance optimization', 'You have worked on and understand large scale, highly available distributed systems', 'NAS protocols such as SMB, CIFS, NFS or S3', 'As part of this core development team, you will design and build massively distributed systems at web-scale. You will be building the core backend of the\xa0Cohesity Data Platform\xa0and\xa0Cohesity SpanFS\xa0(limitless Filesystem)', 'Cohesity\xa0eliminates mass data fragmentation with one web-scale\xa0data management platform that radically simplifies the way companies protect, control and extract value from their data. This software-defined platform spans across Clouds and data centers, can be managed from a single GUI, and enables independent apps to run in the same environment.\xa0', 'Cohesity SpanFS', 'You have worked on large scale engineering challenges.\xa0', 'Cohesity\xa0SpanFS\xa0is\xa0the only file system that combines NFS, SMB and S3 interfaces, global deduplication, and unlimited snaps and clones, on a web-scale platform. No more compromising between enterprise and cloud stacks!', 'There will be a large variety of features to work on including:\xa0hyper-convergence, distributed data path, distributed filesystem, data across thousands of nodes, object storage, cloud services, asynchronous programming, performance optimization, software-defined infrastructure, consensus protocols,\xa0massively parallel and distributed data sets, infinite scalability, snapshots, resiliency, deduplication, compression,\xa0replication, multiple protocols, fault-tolerance, infrastructure and more that we cannot disclose yet.', 'Data Privacy Notice for Job Candidates:', 'Min 7+ years of back-end software development experience', 'Familiarity in distributed filesystems, object storage is a huge plus', 'Storage, filers, or file systems', 'Ability to drive tasks to completion and take ownership of projects', 'Experience in building strong, successful technical teams and coaching and mentoring individuals along their career paths', 'Cohesity Data Platform\xa0is a limitless scale out system.\xa0It is the industry’s only hyperconverged platform designed to consolidate ALL secondary storage and data services built on web-scale distributed architecture.\xa0\xa0', 'What we are looking for:', 'About our Team', 'Min 7+ years of back-end software development experienceBS/MS/PhD in Computer Science with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms, and software designYou have worked on and understand large scale, highly available distributed systemsYou have worked on large scale engineering challenges.\xa0Understanding of multithreading, concurrency, and parallel processingExpert level programming and debugging skills in C or C++ or Go or JavaStrong understanding of system performance and scalingYou have worked on and understand any of:Storage, filers, or file systemsNAS protocols such as SMB, CIFS, NFS or S3Replication and disaster recoveryFamiliarity in distributed filesystems, object storage is a huge plusProven skills to solve complex problems.Experience with debugging, diagnosing, and trouble-shooting complex, production software.Ability to drive tasks to completion and take ownership of projectsAbility to work in a fast paced and agile development environmentPossess excellent communication and sharp analytical abilitiesAbility to give technical feedback and drive quality via code reviewsExpert level knowledge in identifying performance bottlenecks and performance optimizationAbility to represent operational issues to senior leadership and dive deep into the technical details when requiredExperience in building strong, successful technical teams and coaching and mentoring individuals along their career paths', 'Understanding of multithreading, concurrency, and parallel processing', 'Ability to represent operational issues to senior leadership and dive deep into the technical details when required', 'Openings are for senior level experienced Engineers!', 'This is for experienced and senior level candidates only. We are looking for\xa0Engineers/Leads who bring the experience of building LARGE distributed systems and leading projects.\xa0', 'We are looking for exceptional Engineers/Leads who bring the experience of building LARGE distributed systems and solving complex problems.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Expert level programming and debugging skills in C or C++ or Go or Java', 'Ability to give technical feedback and drive quality via code reviews', 'Strong understanding of system performance and scaling', 'eliminates mass data fragmentation with one web-scale\xa0data management platform that radically simplifies the way companies protect, control and extract value from their data. This software-defined platform spans across Clouds and data centers, can be managed from a single GUI, and enables independent apps to run in the same environment.\xa0', 'Ability to work in a fast paced and agile development environment', 'Possess excellent communication and sharp analytical abilities']

['', 'Who are we looking for?', 'Helm is a team', 'key role in creating and advancing the Helm software applications eco-system in a fast-paced, agile environment', 'Helm is seeking a Senior level Software Engineer to play a key role in creating and advancing the Helm software applications eco-system in a fast-paced, agile environment. This individual will be responsible for developing extensible enterprise software using cutting edge technology. One must be excited and encouraged to mentor other developers in the use of automated analysis, testing, continuous integration, and continuous deployment tools.', 'Who Is Helm?', 'Senior ', 'Helm is not a company of individuals. Helm is a team, composed of talented people dedicated to helping brand loyalty strengthen between our clients and their customers. No matter what responsibilities an individual has, each one is supported by and relies upon the strengths of everyone on the team. Through our collective dedication, diligence, professionalism, integrity, grit, and imagination, we help the worlds most recognized brands fit into the everyday lives of their employees, consumers, and franchisees - to build and strengthen affinity. Each member of the Helm team understands and is committed to our philosophy, and is empowered to continually discover new and innovative ways to achieve our mission and vision.', 'Why work for us?', 'collective dedication, diligence, professionalism, integrity, grit, and imagination, we help the worlds most recognized brands fit into the everyday lives of their employees, consumers, and franchisees - to build and strengthen affinity.', 'PM20', 'We offer a culture centered around accountability, integrity, and results; paired with great benefits and competitive salary. Benefits include Health, Dental, and Vision coverage, 401 (k) with company match, PTO, flexible hours and more.', ' excited and encouraged to mentor']

job_text: ['', 'Demonstrated ability to facilitate and coordinate complex data analysis and development activities across teams in agile sprints with minimal direction ', 'Strong understanding of high-performance algorithms and statistics ', 'Bachelor’s Degree Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics or a related quantitative discipline 5+ years of experience in data science or analytics ', 'Excellent analytical skills with an engineering, algorithmic mind to design tools, pipelines and systems to handle large-scale, real-time ML analysis, whether in batch or streaming. ', 'Job Description</strongMcD Tech Labs is the recently established Silicon Valley based technology development group within McDonald’s Corporation. Our mission is to deliver advanced technology solutions that address real-world, data-driven needs in the McDonald’s Restaurant environment. We are focused on using state-of-the-art Machine Learning, AI, and related technologies along with McDonald’s unparalleled scale to completely transform the customer experience!We are currently looking for talented data scientists to join our performance analytics team at McD Tech Labs. This team design and develop pipelines, reports, dashboards and framework that monitor and analyze performance of the AI Drive Thru Voice Agents.\u202f Providing insights of the product performance in real time in diverse regions and stores worldwide, the team aggregate, curate and distill data from various hubs and feeds actionable data to various data and engineering teams, business, operations and the greater McD ecosystem. Such insight and data contribute and complete a key, necessary part of the AI/ML product development lifecycle.The ideal candidate will have previous experience designing and delivering analytics for large-scale ML products, and enjoys working in an agile, fast-growing environment.ResponsibilitiesDefine and develop data schema, ETL, metrics and reports for production performance analytics Collaborate with stakeholders and partners within Tech Labs and across McD ecosystem to identify, iterate and evolve rigor and maturity of data sources, quality and signals to distill and present consolidated view of product performance across platform and products Employ advanced statistical modeling to analyze large data sets, create dashboards and derive insights to guide key business, product and engineering decisions Collaborate with engineering teams to ensure that data infrastructure and systems are performant, scalable, reliable and secure Enable big data and batch/real-time analytical solutions that leverage state-of-the-art data and ML technologies Qualifications</strongBachelor’s Degree Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics or a related quantitative discipline 5+ years of experience in data science or analytics 3+ years of Python and SQL experience working with big data Strong understanding of high-performance algorithms and statistics Expert knowledge of data modeling, queries and understanding of different data structures Excellent analytical skills with an engineering, algorithmic mind to design tools, pipelines and systems to handle large-scale, real-time ML analysis, whether in batch or streaming. Demonstrated ability to facilitate and coordinate complex data analysis and development activities across teams in agile sprints with minimal direction Additional Information</strongAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.', 'Define and develop data schema, ETL, metrics and reports for production performance analytics ', 'Collaborate with engineering teams to ensure that data infrastructure and systems are performant, scalable, reliable and secure ', 'Collaborate with engineering teams to ensure that data infrastructure and systems are performant, scalable, reliable and secure Enable big data and batch/real-time analytical solutions that leverage state-of-the-art data and ML technologies ', 'Responsibilities', 'Employ advanced statistical modeling to analyze large data sets, create dashboards and derive insights to guide key business, product and engineering decisions ', '3+ years of Python and SQL experience working with big data ', '5+ years of experience in data science or analytics ', 'Collaborate with stakeholders and partners within Tech Labs and across McD ecosystem to identify, iterate and evolve rigor and maturity of data sources, quality and signals to distill and present consolidated view of product performance across platform and products ', 'Qualifications</strongBachelor’s Degree Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics or a related quantitative discipline 5+ years of experience in data science or analytics 3+ years of Python and SQL experience working with big data Strong understanding of high-performance algorithms and statistics Expert knowledge of data modeling, queries and understanding of different data structures Excellent analytical skills with an engineering, algorithmic mind to design tools, pipelines and systems to handle large-scale, real-time ML analysis, whether in batch or streaming. Demonstrated ability to facilitate and coordinate complex data analysis and development activities across teams in agile sprints with minimal direction Additional Information</strongAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.', 'Additional Information</strongAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.', 'Company Description', 'Expert knowledge of data modeling, queries and understanding of different data structures ', 'Define and develop data schema, ETL, metrics and reports for production performance analytics Collaborate with stakeholders and partners within Tech Labs and across McD ecosystem to identify, iterate and evolve rigor and maturity of data sources, quality and signals to distill and present consolidated view of product performance across platform and products Employ advanced statistical modeling to analyze large data sets, create dashboards and derive insights to guide key business, product and engineering decisions ', '3+ years of Python and SQL experience working with big data Strong understanding of high-performance algorithms and statistics Expert knowledge of data modeling, queries and understanding of different data structures Excellent analytical skills with an engineering, algorithmic mind to design tools, pipelines and systems to handle large-scale, real-time ML analysis, whether in batch or streaming. Demonstrated ability to facilitate and coordinate complex data analysis and development activities across teams in agile sprints with minimal direction ', 'Bachelor’s Degree Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics or a related quantitative discipline ', 'Enable big data and batch/real-time analytical solutions that leverage state-of-the-art data and ML technologies ']

More than 100 health systems and 300 hospitals – including 5 of the 10 largest systems, 12 of US News and World Report’s top 20 hospitals, 70% of all National Comprehensive Cancer Network institutions, and 55% of all National Cancer Institute locations – rely on the company’s iQueue cloud-based platform to increase patient access, decrease wait times, and reduce healthcare delivery costs. The HIPAA-compliant, non-invasive cloud-based SaaS platform – iQueue for Infusion Centers, iQueue for Operating Rooms, and iQueue for Inpatient Beds – coexists with current EHR systems and integrates seamlessly with existing scheduling and operational workflows.\xa0', 'Make the team stronger by sharing your knowledge via documentation, blogs, tech talks, etc', 'Are comfortable with ambiguity - healthcare data can be messy and challenging and requires patience, tenacity, and reverse engineering skill. ['', 'Has developed SNMP client and/or agent software', "We've modernized the way cities control traffic signals to make traffic move faster – and not just through congested areas but across entire cities. We use a cloud-based approach that combines asset management with machine learning to continuously predict and control the optimal phase and timing of traffic signals to create a platform for autonomous vehicles, freight, and cities to better manage the current transportation resources.\xa0", ' ', 'Highly organized, with problem resolution and analytical skills', 'The mission of this role is to build the best possible edge device. Maestro is LYT’s sole communication device with signal controllers. This device functions as a network gateway and an edge computer. For the LYT platform to communicate with city traffic lights, the cloud software connects to Maestro, which is connected to the city traffic light network.\xa0', 'Has developed software that uses Google Protobuf and its compiler', 'Testing experience; can create, document, and run unit tests', 'Possession of high-level understanding of common cloud system infrastructure components and deployment pipelines', 'Role:', 'Deploy edge device on-site at customer location while obeying all local and state-mandated COVID-19 safety protocols', 'Related Skills Experience', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Previous experience in working in a startup or demonstrated ability to thrive in fast-paced, often unpredictable environments\xa05+ years of development experience working in information technology projects that ship commercial software productsPrevious experience working on enterprise software products that have shipped/deployed successfully in the market and with a minimum of thousands\xa0of end-users', 'Responsibilities:', 'Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Computer System Engineering, or Electrical Engineering\xa0', 'Escalates issues in a timely fashion if faced with obstacles', '\xa0', 'Excellent time management skills with the ability to meet deadlines', 'Previous experience working on enterprise software products that have shipped/deployed successfully in the market and with a minimum of thousands\xa0of end-users', 'Education:', 'Pay $115,000 to $130,000 range plus equity / benefits\xa0', 'This is an 80% remote position with occasional on-site hardware development and deployment.', '5+ years of development experience working in information technology projects that ship commercial software products', 'Has developed SNMP client and/or agent softwareHas developed software that uses Google Protobuf and its compilerHas a strong foundation in memory management, networking, asynchronous and multithreaded systemsExperience running and deploying containerized environmentsTesting experience; can create, document, and run unit testsPossession of high-level understanding of common cloud system infrastructure components and deployment pipelinesEnthusiastic about getting your hands dirty with all levels of the tech stack as needed', 'Collaborate with the platform team on implementing and improving the system’s internal message protocols', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills', 'Proficiency with C, C++, Ubuntu, gcc, and SNMP, TCP, and UDP networking protocols\xa0Outstanding demonstrated proficiency with encryption and end-to-end securityProficiency with digital tools to communicate with the team and report progress (Slack, Zoom, Asana, etc.)Ability to collaborate and communicate with team members to solve a problemEscalates issues in a timely fashion if faced with obstaclesHighly organized, with problem resolution and analytical skillsExcellent time management skills with the ability to meet deadlinesExcellent verbal and written communication skills', 'Proficiency with C, C++, Ubuntu, gcc, and SNMP, TCP, and UDP networking protocols\xa0', 'Compensation:', 'Develop multithreaded software for edge device that can communicate with thousands of connected devices simultaneously\xa0Collaborate with the platform team on implementing and improving the system’s internal message protocolsDevelop the logic and code to handle and respond to messages received from the cloud softwareDeploy edge device on-site at customer location while obeying all local and state-mandated COVID-19 safety protocols', 'Proficiency with digital tools to communicate with the team and report progress (Slack, Zoom, Asana, etc.)', 'We’re looking for highly motivated people who are just as passionate as we are about ending traffic in our communities and making them livable for everyone.\xa0', 'It’s no secret that drivers of cars, buses, and trucks waste an enormous amount of time, fuel, and patience sitting in traffic and idling at red lights. Using advanced Artificial Intelligence (AI) and extensive Machine Learning (ML), LYT is building the world’s first truly automated traffic management platform to optimize existing transportation infrastructure, making people’s commutes shorter and the roads safer.', 'Requirements:', 'Has a strong foundation in memory management, networking, asynchronous and multithreaded systems', 'Ability to collaborate and communicate with team members to solve a problem', 'Enthusiastic about getting your hands dirty with all levels of the tech stack as needed', 'Develop multithreaded software for edge device that can communicate with thousands of connected devices simultaneously\xa0', 'Outstanding demonstrated proficiency with encryption and end-to-end security', 'Develop the logic and code to handle and respond to messages received from the cloud software', ' Related Career Experience', 'Previous experience in working in a startup or demonstrated ability to thrive in fast-paced, often unpredictable environments\xa0', 'Experience running and deploying containerized environments']

['OUR STRATEGY', 'Strong listener.', 'Creative.', '\u200b\u200b', 'Speed: We work fast.', 'Humility: We use our energy to serve others; we are lifelong learners.', 'ABOUT LEGALSIFTER', 'To bring affordable legal services to the world by empowering people with artificial intelligence.\xa0', 'Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve software in an agile environment.', 'We sell our products directly to companies and law firms that are interested in improving their efficiencies, lowering their risk, and improving the quality in their contract processes. We also work with law firms to combine their legal advice with our artificial intelligence to create co-branded contract review software that law firm clients buy directly from the law firm. Law firms increase revenues, expand margins, and make their clients happier with more affordable legal products. We also work with contract lifecycle management software companies to provide contract librarian services to their clients who are dissatisfied because they cannot organize their contracts.', 'Balance: We work flexibly to keep promises to teammates, shareholders, clients, friends, and family.', "Demonstrable experience modelling our core values in career to date.Provide ongoing maintenance, support and enhancements in existing systems and platforms.Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve software in an agile environment.Manage individual project priorities, deadlines and deliverables.Strong listener.Creative.BS degree in Computer Science, similar technical field of study, or equivalent practical experience; Master's, PhD degree, or further education / equivalent experience in engineering computer science or another technical related field is preferredSoftware development experience in one or more general purpose programming languages including, but not limited to: Java, C/C++, C#, Objective C, Python, or JavaScript.Preferred experience with deploying a global application using cloud technologies at scale. AWS and Docker experience preferred.Clear desire to go on the rollercoaster ride of their working life.", 'Contracts are the most important document in global commerce. They are also universally a pain. They slow down commerce. People cannot afford to send them to attorneys, because they are too expensive and too slow for the average transaction. Attorneys cannot afford to review them faster or cheaper because they have not had the technology that allows them to deliver contract reviews at scale. Moreover, once contracts are signed, the world cannot keep track of them. It buys databases, and then struggles to keep them organized. Everyone builds a library, but the books are in a mess on the floor.', '\xa0', 'LegalSifter makes contracts easier. We have two primary products:', 'LegalSifter:\xa0Artificial intelligence software that reads a contract and gives advice before a client signs, reducing risk, lowering cost, and saving time.', 'ABOUT THE JOB', 'Intelligence: We operate with aligned visions, strategies, plans, and budgets.', 'Software development experience in one or more general purpose programming languages including, but not limited to: Java, C/C++, C#, Objective C, Python, or JavaScript.', 'Manage individual project priorities, deadlines and deliverables.', 'Clear desire to go on the rollercoaster ride of their working life.', 'Preferred experience with deploying a global application using cloud technologies at scale. AWS and Docker experience preferred.', 'OUR CORE VALUES', 'LegalSifter is growing quickly, and we need someone to join or team as a senior software engineer on our software engineering team, working collaboratively with our Data Science team. We have a team of top-notch software engineers. We are looking for someone to help us consistently deliver the kind of world-beating product outcomes that we all signed up for when we joined this venture. Success in this role will require technical excellence as follows:', "BS degree in Computer Science, similar technical field of study, or equivalent practical experience; Master's, PhD degree, or further education / equivalent experience in engineering computer science or another technical related field is preferred", 'LegalSifter is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status.', 'Boldness: We are transparent, courageous, and unafraid to make mistakes.', 'Speed: We work fast.Security: We are vigilant and committed to maintaining the privacy of client data.Humility: We use our energy to serve others; we are lifelong learners.Intelligence: We operate with aligned visions, strategies, plans, and budgets.Boldness: We are transparent, courageous, and unafraid to make mistakes.Balance: We work flexibly to keep promises to teammates, shareholders, clients, friends, and family.', 'Sifter Concierge:\xa0A contract librarian service that organizes contracts for clients using artificial intelligence software, paralegals, and attorneys.', 'Provide ongoing maintenance, support and enhancements in existing systems and platforms.', 'Security: We are vigilant and committed to maintaining the privacy of client data.', 'SKILLS', 'Demonstrable experience modelling our core values in career to date.', '\u200b', 'We build simple, affordable artificial intelligence products embedded with expertise. We are doing this to make global legal support affordable. We want to empower people with artificial intelligence, not replace them.\xa0', 'OUR MISSION']

Experience in performing ETL, analyzing and presenting data results to investors, and autonomous research processes. Self-starter, entrepreneurial, and self-motivated personality', 'The position requires both a strong quantitative/technical skill set in additional to an understanding/familiarity with the fundamental investment process as well (equities is preferred, but asset class experience is open). ', 'Self-starter, entrepreneurial, and self-motivated personality', 'Experience in performing ETL, analyzing and presenting data results to investors, and autonomous research processes. ']

['', 'Python, Django, SQL, testing tools (e.g. pytest)JavaScript, TypeScript, React, module bundlers (e.g. Webpack), testing tools (e.g. Cypress, Jest), CSS, HTMLLinux, OS XAWS ECS, RDS, Security Groups, IAM, Lambda; Hashicorp Terraform and Vault', 'You’ll identify big opportunities to improve technology and products, blazing trails through ambiguity.', 'You’ll work as part of a team, not in a silo.', 'You’ll design APIs and service architectures that multiply the effectiveness of internal and external developers serving millions of patients.', 'Knowledge of database fundamentals like indexing, SQL queries, schema migrations, and managing backups.', 'Experience managing production services and designing smooth deployment processes, ideally in AWS.', 'Experience with API design that lets us build composable APIs and libraries to solve many different needs.', 'You’ll put data science magic (like predictive analytics and dynamic modeling) into thier users’ hands through interactive features in collaboration with the Data Engineering & Data Science teams.', 'JavaScript, TypeScript, React, module bundlers (e.g. Webpack), testing tools (e.g. Cypress, Jest), CSS, HTML', 'Our San Francisco, CA based client is seeking a Backend Software Engineer to join their growing Engineering Team as a Full-Time Employee. Their mission is to make high-quality healthcare affordable for everyone. They partners with healthcare payers, including government agencies, health plans, and employers. They build technology to enable users to understand healthcare data while ensuring its integrity, security and privacy. The Backend Engineering team is responsible for building the APIs, database schemas and business logic to power their apps.', 'REQUIREMENTS:', 'Backend Software Engineer', 'Backend Engineering builds the backbone of every product their users interact with. They measure their products’ success by how much they improve care and lower costs. As an engineering-led culture, you will be at the vanguard of making healthcare work for all Americans. Today, you’ll be helping hospitals improve quality of care, enabling health plans to pay for quality-of-care not quantity-of-care, and matching patients to optimal doctors. Tomorrow, you’ll be creating even bigger and better products to shape this industry.', 'Experience building production-hardened web services, with consideration for security, performance, scalability, reliability, and repeatability. Familiarity with application server frameworks like Django.Experience with API design that lets us build composable APIs and libraries to solve many different needs.Experience rapidly prototyping new product concepts, especially for enterprise clients.Understanding of automated testing concepts in web apps and the ability to consistently apply them.Knowledge of database fundamentals like indexing, SQL queries, schema migrations, and managing backups.Experience managing production services and designing smooth deployment processes, ideally in AWS.', 'Understanding of automated testing concepts in web apps and the ability to consistently apply them.', 'You’ll build products that change the dynamics and incentives of the healthcare industry, changing a zero-sum game of competition between payers and providers into patient-centered collaboration.', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'AWS ECS, RDS, Security Groups, IAM, Lambda; Hashicorp Terraform and Vault', 'Experience rapidly prototyping new product concepts, especially for enterprise clients.', 'Python, Django, SQL, testing tools (e.g. pytest)', 'TECHNOLOGIES USED: ', 'Experience building production-hardened web services, with consideration for security, performance, scalability, reliability, and repeatability. Familiarity with application server frameworks like Django.', 'You’ll mentor more junior engineers and, in turn, learn from more senior engineers.', 'You’ll build products that change the dynamics and incentives of the healthcare industry, changing a zero-sum game of competition between payers and providers into patient-centered collaboration.You’ll put data science magic (like predictive analytics and dynamic modeling) into thier users’ hands through interactive features in collaboration with the Data Engineering & Data Science teams.You’ll design APIs and service architectures that multiply the effectiveness of internal and external developers serving millions of patients.You’ll manage their high stakes production environment, ensuring high availability/low latency and protecting sensitive data with rigorous security.You’ll identify big opportunities to improve technology and products, blazing trails through ambiguity.You’ll mentor more junior engineers and, in turn, learn from more senior engineers.You’ll work as part of a team, not in a silo.', 'As a backend engineering team, they need a wide array of skills as a whole. No single engineer needs to cover every single dimension, so don’t take this as a literal requirements checklist.', 'Linux, OS X', 'You’ll manage their high stakes production environment, ensuring high availability/low latency and protecting sensitive data with rigorous security.', 'San Francisco, CA based']

['', 'We are seeking an experienced Software Engineer to join our growing engineering team. The successful candidate will be responsible for designing, developing and implementing a software platform that will provide control solutions for complex state of the art equipment with multiple lasers, opto-electronics and motion hardware components.\xa0 The ideal applicant should be able to thrive in a highly collaborative workplace; actively engaging in the development process for the full platform, as well as the software.\xa0 This is an excellent career opportunity for a professional with a deep software design background, and the ability to code and deliver a complete working software solution.', 'Joining forces with us means becoming part of an incredibly talented, inventive and passionate multi-disciplinary team working on a massive world-changing mission.\xa0 You will have the opportunity to help define the company from its earliest days.\xa0 You’ll be challenged to learn and grow as a builder and a leader as the company itself grows rapidly.\xa0 And you will receive significant equity compensation - you’ll truly be a company owner and benefit financially from our overall success.', 'Provide technical leadership in the software domain for other team members and ensure software quality', 'What you’ll do:\xa0', 'What you’ll do:', 'Experience developing embedded control software; and for major bonus points: experience with embedded control software configuration management', 'Professional experience in creating robust and scalable software systems', 'Evaluate and recommend software tools, technologies and processes to ensure the highest quality', 'Experience in communication protocols, motion control, sensors, and data acquisition', 'Drive and/or support other projects as needed', 'Excellent skills in debugging multi-threaded and distributed applications by using debugging tools', 'About the role:\xa0', '\xa0', "Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent in an engineering and science discipline with rigorous software experience\xa012+ years of professional experience designing and building software applications for controlling equipment with multiple hardware componentsHigh proficiency with object-oriented programming languagesProfessional experience in creating robust and scalable software systemsExperience in communication protocols, motion control, sensors, and data acquisitionExcellent skills in debugging multi-threaded and distributed applications by using debugging tools", 'What you’ll need:', 'Atomic Machines is a well funded early-stage technology startup located in Berkeley, CA. We have developed a novel direct-write laser micromachining MEMS fabrication process that enables ultra-low-cost manufacturing, rapid prototyping, and volume fabrication using a wide variety of materials. This, in turn, will transform the MEMS industry by enabling a vast array of new device types with the ability to go from concept to prototype and from prototype to scale manufacturing in real-time.\xa0 We are utilizing our platform to develop truly unique MEMS devices and will ultimately open it to others.\xa0 With the above as our starting point, we intend to continually push the boundaries of manufacturing capability with the long-term mission of ushering in the era of atomically precise manufacturing.', '12+ years of professional experience designing and building software applications for controlling equipment with multiple hardware components', "Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent in an engineering and science discipline with rigorous software experience\xa0", 'Knowledge of industrial factory automation standards and technologies (e.g. SCADA, SEMI, MES, etc.)', 'Design, develop and execute software solutions to deliver a manufacturing platform that truly advances the state of the artProvide architecture and technical leadership for the software component of the platform. \xa0 You will write much of the initial code yourself; but you must be ready and able to grow into leading the software team as the platform and business grows.Evaluate and recommend software tools, technologies and processes to ensure the highest qualityTranslate system requirements into workable software specsDevelop and test code to achieve these specsTroubleshoot code level problems quickly and efficientlyProvide technical leadership in the software domain for other team members and ensure software qualityResponsible for all aspects of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), including enforcement of good software development process and disciplineDrive and/or support other projects as needed', 'Provide architecture and technical leadership for the software component of the platform. \xa0 You will write much of the initial code yourself; but you must be ready and able to grow into leading the software team as the platform and business grows.', 'Design, develop and execute software solutions to deliver a manufacturing platform that truly advances the state of the art', 'Bonus points for:\xa0', 'Experience in high precision automation which might include motion control of staging, lasers, and cameras for camera directed precision motion and/or high resolution inspection', 'High proficiency with object-oriented programming languages', 'Develop and test code to achieve these specs', 'Responsible for all aspects of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), including enforcement of good software development process and discipline', 'Experience in high precision automation which might include motion control of staging, lasers, and cameras for camera directed precision motion and/or high resolution inspectionExperience developing embedded control software; and for major bonus points: experience with embedded control software configuration managementKnowledge of industrial factory automation standards and technologies (e.g. SCADA, SEMI, MES, etc.)', 'Translate system requirements into workable software specs', 'About the role:', 'Troubleshoot code level problems quickly and efficiently']

['', 'Overview:', 'You’ll need 7+ years of experience, a deep understanding of Microsoft technologies, Angular, Node.js, Postgress, SQL Server, .NET Framework and Core as well as C#. Knowledge of SAS, APIs and public cloud technologies is preferable. Knowledge of Docker, Kafka, ELK Stack are also highly desired. A working knowledge of HIPAA regulations and Soc2/HiTrust security would be a plus. The ideal candidate is a quick leaner, strong communicator and capable of making design and architecture contributions with minimal oversight. Most importantly candidates must feel comfortable working in a small group environment where their contributions are critical to the overall success of the project.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent experience/formal training in object-oriented programming languages for Microsoft systems', 'Proficient understanding of database Postgress,\xa0MSSQL, including T-SQL, Stored Procedures, etc', 'Commercial development experience using C# and .NET framework', 'Self-motivated with the ability to work both independently and with the team', 'Effectively document and communicate assigned work and progress', 'Salesforce admin or developer experience is a plus', 'Note', 'Development of unit tests, testing and debugging', 'Strong skills in problem solving and debugging', 'Commercial leverage of Node.js API’s and Angular in a public cloud environment', 'About Interlace Health', 'Responsibilities:', 'Work on one or more projects of moderate to advanced complexityApply broad range of technical expertise from Presentation tier design and development through to business and data tier design and developmentEffectively document and communicate assigned work and progressDevelopment of unit tests, testing and debuggingRemain current on software technologies through continued education classes and self-learning to ensure maximum functionality and efficiency', 'Apply broad range of technical expertise from Presentation tier design and development through to business and data tier design and development', 'Interlace Health lives at the intersection of the relationships, environments, and experiences at the heart of modern health care. By enabling seamless data capture and information exchange among providers, staff, and patients, Interlace Health solves many of health care’s central challenges through process transformation. The result for its clients is reduced costs, increased collections, uplifted patient experiences, improved operational efficiency, and enhanced support of an organization’s integration strategy.', 'Excellent understanding of general programming concept', 'Work on one or more projects of moderate to advanced complexity', 'Have experience with Object-Oriented Design (OOD) in .NET development', 'Qualifications:', 'Education:', 'This is an opportunity to get into a dynamic market, building a myriad of healthcare products that help providers manage the flow of forms and documentation across the care continuum.\xa0While our core technology stack is MS-based, we build on mobile platforms and application clouds such as Salesforce and the SF family of offerings, with plans for public cloud deployments.', 'Interlace Health is seeking an advanced angular, node.js, .NET developer with commercial cloud experience to join a dynamic and fast paced development team in St. Louis, MO or as a telecommuter in the metro Kansas City or Nashville areas. Healthcare is one of the hottest markets to be in and as one of the top 30 HIT vendors in the space, Interlace Health is a great place to work.\xa0We have the experience, market-leading position, and financial strength of a 25-year-old with the attitude and environment of a startup!', 'Commercial leverage of Node.js API’s and Angular in a public cloud environmentProficient understanding of database Postgress,\xa0MSSQL, including T-SQL, Stored Procedures, etcCommercial development experience using C# and .NET frameworkSelf-motivated with the ability to work both independently and with the teamStrong skills in problem solving and debuggingExcellent understanding of general programming conceptHave experience with Object-Oriented Design (OOD) in .NET developmentFront-end web development experience with CSS, JavaScript, and related libraries/toolkitsExperience with Agile methodologies is preferredSalesforce admin or developer experience is a plusBased in St. Louis, MO, Nashville, TN or Kansas City area', "Interlace Health offers its employees the best of a small company atmosphere combined with the excitement of being a leader in the healthcare technology industry. Interlace Health’s core values are centered around driving the success of our clients and the happiness of our employees. Our employees are smart, motivated and diverse. We thrive in a company culture that, above all else, encourages new ideas, teamwork, and customer success.\xa0If you share these qualities and enjoy an entrepreneurial environment, we hope you'll apply today!", 'Remain current on software technologies through continued education classes and self-learning to ensure maximum functionality and efficiency', 'Based in St. Louis, MO, Nashville, TN or Kansas City area', 'Company Culture', 'Experience with Agile methodologies is preferred', 'Front-end web development experience with CSS, JavaScript, and related libraries/toolkits', 'Note: The statements herein are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed but are not to be seen as a complete list of responsibilities, duties, and skills required and personnel so classified. Also, they do not establish a contract for employment and are subject to change at the discretion of the employer.']

We believe in continuous product delivery, continuous product planning and design, continuous regular sleep schedules, continuous regular vacation, and continuous fun if you’re passionate about your craft.', 'Experience designing and operating software in a Cloud Provider such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.', 'We believe that product delivery professionals including product managers, product designers and engineers differ from one another by at least a factor of 10. At DISCO, we only hire the top 1%, pay them well, and with equity, everyone has effectively been getting a raise each and every day. Given our product first mindset, product professionals are very much stars of the show. Our logo, the circle and square, represents the best lawyers and the best product professionals in the world.', 'Domain and data modeling that provides efficiency, scalability, and flexibility.', ' We were the first movers to a cloud-based platform that has caused mass disruption within our market. Our CEO is a true market visionary. He graduated with a computer science degree at the age of 15 and followed with a JD from Harvard Law School at the age of 19. His unparalleled insights into the fundamental issues in legal and the potential of technology and artificial intelligence to change our market at its core provide the guiding light for DISCO’s long-term strategy. We believe that product delivery professionals including product managers, product designers and engineers differ from one another by at least a factor of 10. At DISCO, we only hire the top 1%, pay them well, and with equity, everyone has effectively been getting a raise each and every day. Given our product first mindset, product professionals are very much stars of the show. Our logo, the circle and square, represents the best lawyers and the best product professionals in the world. We measure product delivery velocity by dollars of revenue per line of code, vs simply lines of code. This drives a very thoughtful and deliberate product design and development process that ensures we’re going to make money when we ship products. We hire many more product managers and designers per engineer than most companies to ensure that our engineers have a disambiguated product intent when they are building. As a rule, we don’t commit to external product delivery dates as we believe that unnecessarily constrains our creativity from both a product and technology point of view. At DISCO respect isn’t earned at DISCO it is assumed. Good humans inherently treat everyone respectfully. This is a very important concept at DISCO. Given the high caliber of talent, the cutting-edge cloud-based technology stack, and thoughtful and novel product and design approach, you’ll find yourself learning at a rate you’ve not likely experienced in your career. Given that we only hire professionals that are passionate about their craft, you’ll truly enjoy building a great software product and get in the best “career shape” of your life. Over the next 4 years, we’ll be growing our product delivery organization. There will be incredible growth opportunities along the way. We use the “2 Pizza Team” organization design where small autonomous teams own a piece of a product or platform and ship software at rates comparable to a very lean and scrappy startup. We achieve consistency across these teams in the areas of design, product-wide use cases and technical concerns through a strategically focused set of overlay functions. Finally, while we’re an incredibly fast-growing organization, as a rule, we do not work crazy long hours. We believe in continuous product delivery, continuous product planning and design, continuous regular sleep schedules, continuous regular vacation, and continuous fun if you’re passionate about your craft. Bring trade to everyone in the world. S.) in Computer Science, Technology, or 4 years in Software Engineering8+ years’ experience in Information Technology and solution deliveryExperience working with SAAS based solution delivery organization (preferred)Advanced proficiency in the following:C#.Net Framework.NET CoreSQLGitUnit TestingRESTful web servicesMessaging & queuingFront-end framework such as React, Angular, or Vue.", "As a Lead Software Developer, you will play an important role in the success of our development teams. Reporting to the Director of Engineering, you'll be a coding leader for an organization that's been delivering life-saving educational materials to patients both before and after clinical and hospital visits. As part of a friendly, collaborative, talented team, you'll help code important efforts on our core platforms, including extending our EHR integration capabilities, providing technical leadership on new strategic initiatives, and crafting strategies for getting the right content to the right users at the right time.", 'Advanced proficiency in the following:', 'Collaborate closely with fellow developers, architects, product owners, and other stakeholders in crafting optimal solutions to product goals.', 'Develop solutions that add value and efficiency across systems with minimal technical debt.Collaborate closely with fellow developers, architects, product owners, and other stakeholders in crafting optimal solutions to product goals.Deliver code with a Test First mentality and a heavy focus on quality at the code level.Stay informed on technology trends and product roadmaps to inform and guide your peers and more junior members of your team.Support development of cross-functional business processes.Work with other Engineers to ensure best-practices, cross-team collaboration, and continuity of process.Help foster a culture of collaboration with engineering teams in Asia, Latin America, and around the United States.', 'Unit Testing', 'SQL', 'Front-end framework such as React, Angular, or Vue.', 'You will collaborate with product, design, technology, and data science colleagues to create new applications and improve existing applications. You will help develop product prototypes, and create technical documentation relating to application development. You will review PR’s for your team, assist architects in evaluating application technologies, and make recommendations for best practices based on the situation, team, and product needs. You will mentor and train more junior team members in areas of software development. You will balance and teach others on the needs of code maintainability, performance, and functionality. You will contribute to our codebase with enthusiasm.']

job_title: Lead/ Sr. Data Scientist (Python, Tensorflow, NLP)
job_text: ['', 'This MIT spinout is currently seeking a\xa0Lead/Sr. Data Scientist (Python, Tensorflow, NLP) to\xa0join an innovative company bringing automation and optimization services to new heights. This company is\xa0applying cutting edge advances in the fields of operations research and machine learning to solve real-world challenges that will transform navigation for the future.\xa0', 'A culture rooted in diversity that offers our employees the opportunity to work with some of the best scientists, engineers, and coders from around the globe', 'We can offer our\xa0Senior Compiler Engineer / Software Engineer:', 'Lead/ Sr. Data Scientist (Python, Tensorflow, NLP)\xa0', 'A chance to develop the next generation of technology\xa0A culture rooted in diversity that offers our employees the opportunity to work with some of the best scientists, engineers, and coders from around the globeExpansive benefits coupled with the promise of exciting technical innovation', '.\xa0', 'A chance to develop the next generation of technology\xa0', 'Expansive benefits coupled with the promise of exciting technical innovation', 'Based in the Greater Boston area, Lead/Sr. Data Scientist (Python, Tensorflow, NLP) in this company,\xa0You will have the chance to solve complex problems and see your solutions come to life in different industries through the use of a ML microservice platform that utilizes NLP.', 'Key Skills:\xa0Data Scientist, Data Science, Python, Tensorflow, Pytorch, OCR, NLP, Natural Language Processing, Mahine Learning, Machine Learning Algorithms, Deep Learning, Deep Learning Models, C++, Engineer, Design, Computer Vision, Microservices', 'Our ideal Data Scientist would have a background in researching Machine Learning algorithms and implementing different deep learning architectures. A passion for writing code would be preferred and the ability to design and apply NLP algorithms to create a better understanding.\xa0']

['', 'Location:', '15+ years of professional software engineering experience, of which at least 4 were devoted to web services.4+ years of experience in microservice cloud-based systemsExperience performing data analysis and translating the results into business recommendations and requirements.Experience in working with data-driven applications at massive scale.Superbe coding abilities in Java, Scala, Golang or any other modern programming language combined with deep knowledge in object-oriented design and microservices architectureExperience with Cloud Architecture (AWS preferred), Containers, and Kubernetes.BS or MS in Computer Science, Computer/Software Engineering, Information Systems/Technology, Information Science, or equivalent experienceMust be eligible to work in the United StatesHelpful, but not required:Experience with anomaly detection, bot detection, machine learning, pattern recognition, and/or data mining.Experience writing asynchronous services in Java.Experience with GraphQL, Machine Learning/Artificial Intelligence, React Native, Node.JS.\xa0Knowledge of Gradle, Terraform, JMeter, Docker, Kubernetes, and other leading-edge technologies.\xa0', 'Maintain a high operational excellence with a dedication to reliable, maintainable, exceptional products for OfferUp customers.', 'Experience with GraphQL, Machine Learning/Artificial Intelligence, React Native, Node.JS.\xa0', '90M+ DownloadsTop 5 Shopping app in App Store and Google Play Store for three years15+ percent of adults in key markets like Los Angeles, Seattle, Miami and Las Vegas use OfferUp every month', 'In March 2020, OfferUp acquired LetGo, making the combined company the largest mobile marketplace in the U.S.\xa0', 'Helpful, but not required:', 'OfferUp is changing the way people buy and sell locally and we’ve built a dynamic team to do it. To learn more about what it’s like to work at OfferUp, check out our blog: https://blog.offerup.com/tagged/culture', 'OfferUp is dedicated to building the simplest and most trustworthy way for people to buy and sell in their communities. Every year, millions of people use OfferUp to buy and sell locally, resulting in billions of dollars of local commerce. As the largest mobile marketplace for local buyers and sellers in the U.S., our iOS and Android app has been in the top five most popular shopping apps lists for more than three years. Join us as we build the marketplace of the future and reinvent local commerce by helping consumers uncover value through simplicity and trust.\xa0', 'Experience with anomaly detection, bot detection, machine learning, pattern recognition, and/or data mining.', 'You’ll thrive in this role if you have:', 'Superbe coding abilities in Java, Scala, Golang or any other modern programming language combined with deep knowledge in object-oriented design and microservices architecture', 'Must be eligible to work in the United States', 'At a Glance', 'Knowledge of Gradle, Terraform, JMeter, Docker, Kubernetes, and other leading-edge technologies.\xa0', 'Due to the current pandemic, OfferUp offices are closed in Bellevue, Wa, and Miami, FL, and employees are working remotely until June 30, 2021. Once OfferUp deems it safe to open the offices, employees will have an option to continue to work remotely or in-office. All employees must reside in Washington, Florida, North Carolina, Nevada, Texas, Tennessee, whether working remotely full time or in an OfferUp Office location.', 'Experience performing data analysis and translating the results into business recommendations and requirements.', 'Lead a collaborative team to define the long term technology vision at OfferUp.', 'Use creativity and skills in combination with your leadership to innovate elegant solutions for problems at every level of our tech stack.\xa0', 'Iterate quickly and ship code frequently.', 'OfferUp expressly prohibits any form of workplace harassment based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, genetic information, disability, or veteran status. Improper interference with the ability of OfferUp’s employees to perform their job duties may result in discipline up to and including discharge.', '15+ percent of adults in key markets like Los Angeles, Seattle, Miami and Las Vegas use OfferUp every month', 'Here’s more of what you will get to do:', 'Top 5 Shopping app in App Store and Google Play Store for three years', '90M+ Downloads', 'Oversee the design, architecture and implementation of all new systems, with a strong focus of delivery to our customers.', 'Experience writing asynchronous services in Java.', '15+ years of professional software engineering experience, of which at least 4 were devoted to web services.', 'OfferUp provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, OfferUp complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, and training.', 'Experience in working with data-driven applications at massive scale.', 'Set best practices influencing not only the team, but the entire OfferUp Engineering Organization.', '\ufeff', 'Oversee the design, architecture and implementation of all new systems, with a strong focus of delivery to our customers.Use creativity and skills in combination with your leadership to innovate elegant solutions for problems at every level of our tech stack.\xa0Iterate quickly and ship code frequently.Lead a collaborative team to define the long term technology vision at OfferUp.Set best practices influencing not only the team, but the entire OfferUp Engineering Organization.Research and champion adoption and use of new technologies within OfferUp.Maintain a high operational excellence with a dedication to reliable, maintainable, exceptional products for OfferUp customers.', '4+ years of experience in microservice cloud-based systems', 'Research and champion adoption and use of new technologies within OfferUp.', 'BS or MS in Computer Science, Computer/Software Engineering, Information Systems/Technology, Information Science, or equivalent experience', 'About the role:', "As Principal Software Engineer for OfferUp you will report directly to the VP of Engineering to lead and influence teams across our entire technology ecosystem. This will be the most Senior Engineer and the first Principal Engineer for OfferUp. You'll therefore be a key influencer for the future of the role at OfferUp by establishing the standards of the practice. With your vision, passion, and enormous skill, you will set the course for OfferUp Engineering to continuously evolve technically in support of business at a massive scale. Along with being impactful technically you will also lead and mentor Staff and Senior Engineers across all OfferUp Engineering teams.\xa0", 'Experience with Cloud Architecture (AWS preferred), Containers, and Kubernetes.']

['', '\xa0Senior Software Engineer, Machine Learning', 'Constantly advocate for ML excellence', 'BS degree in Computer Science or related quantitative field', 'BS degree in Computer Science or related quantitative field3+ years of experience as a Software Engineer3+ years of experience\xa0deploying and maintaining ML solutions in productionExperience in one or more of the following areas: machine learning, recommendation systems, optimization algorithms or time series forecasting modelsProven ability to translate insights into business recommendationsProven ability to configure the right ML problem for a given business needExpert with scripting languages such as Python and with SQLExperience of demonstrating technical leadership working with teams, owning projects, defining and setting technical direction for projects.Ability to learn new things quickly, maintain a high bar for quality and be pragmatic.The desire to take a high level of ownership of the things you work on.Familiarity with AWS', 'Expert with scripting languages such as Python and with SQL', 'We’re building a best-in-class advertising platform for brands and advertisers to take full advantage of the massive reach on television and its potential to drive significant digital performance. As a\xa0Senior Software Engineer, Machine Learning, you will sit at the core of a platform that is redefining how television advertising is conceived and operationalized. You will be working on the tech stack behind the engine driving\xa0decision-making and execution for top marketers,\xa0and will be\xa0operating at the boundary between our Science and Engineering teams. We are looking for strong individuals who are comfortable learning new systems and working with both technical and non-technical members of the team. This is an opportunity to join a team of passionate data scientists, engineers, product managers and designers who are obsessed with building the most advanced advertising platform in the market.\xa0', 'Proven ability to translate insights into business recommendations', 'Familiarity with AWS', 'Own the full ML lifecycle for existing and new data science projects', 'Work with other engineers to define ML engineering projects that would enable ease of implementation and maintenance\xa0of science models/algos', 'Does this sound like you?\xa0Let’s chat!', 'Set roadmap expectations and diligently execute against them', 'Experience in one or more of the following areas: machine learning, recommendation systems, optimization algorithms or time series forecasting models', 'The Opportunity\xa0', 'Work with scientists to design, develop, and deploy scalable ML/AI algorithms addressing\xa0\xa0the problems Simulmedia is trying to solve\xa0', '3+ years of experience as a Software Engineer', 'MS or PhD degree in Computer Science or related quantitative field\xa0', 'Work with scientists to design, develop, and deploy scalable ML/AI algorithms addressing\xa0\xa0the problems Simulmedia is trying to solve\xa0Work with other engineers to define ML engineering projects that would enable ease of implementation and maintenance\xa0of science models/algosSet roadmap expectations and diligently execute against themOwn the full ML lifecycle for existing and new data science projectsCode deliverables in tandem with the engineering teamConstantly advocate for ML excellence', '\xa0', 'Proven ability to configure the right ML problem for a given business need', 'Simulmedia is a New York-based video ad platform that enables predictable, scalable customer growth. Powered by the company’s patented software platform, Simulmedia empowers marketers to rapidly receive audience and TV campaign insights and activate those insights via plans that quickly and cost efficiently reach more targeted customers on 130+ national TV networks with guaranteed delivery.', 'What we look for...', 'The desire to take a high level of ownership of the things you work on.', 'Experience of demonstrating technical leadership working with teams, owning projects, defining and setting technical direction for projects.', 'Proficiency in Ruby', 'Ability to learn new things quickly, maintain a high bar for quality and be pragmatic.', 'Simulmedia is changing the game for video advertising -- linear TV, check; OTT, check; console and PC gaming, check. We integrate the unparalleled reach of TV with the data-driven targeting of digital, empowering both performance and brand marketers to take direct control of their video media buying and drive greater business impact with every ad dollar spent. We do this by giving them the ability to easily plan, buy, and optimize video advertising across multiple media channels through an automated online video buying platform.', 'MS or PhD degree in Computer Science or related quantitative field\xa05+ years of machine learning related work or researchProficiency in Ruby', '5+ years of machine learning related work or research', 'Bonus points for...', 'What is Simulmedia?', 'The Simulmedia Experience', 'We take tremendous pride in maintaining a high bar for employees and fostering a strong team environment. While we work hard every day, we also believe in relaxing together with lots of team activities. We have an unlimited vacation policy, tuition reimbursement, and no employee financial contribution for medical, dental, and vision benefits. We offer competitive salaries, stock options, and an annual bonus based on performance. Did we mention a very cool open-space office environment that fosters teamwork? And last but not least, we provide a free Citibike membership to all employees!', 'As a Senior Software Engineer, Machine Learning, you will…', '3+ years of experience\xa0deploying and maintaining ML solutions in production', 'Code deliverables in tandem with the engineering team']

['', 'Contribute to the game client and platform by collaborating with your team as well as players across the globe to provide memorable experiences to our players.', 'Excellent debugging and optimization skills', 'Responsibilities', 'Self-directed, taking the initiative to drive progress.', 'Strong communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills.', 'Experience with Unreal Engine', 'Ability to quickly prototype and iterate in collaboration with others.', 'A stealth game studio startup just acquired by an International communications giant is opening shop in Playa Vista, Los Angeles, and is planning on a few new AAA titles for multiple platforms. We are looking for a strategic Backend Engineer to lead the vision for the Online Services Infrastructure. The Company offers a competitive salary and potentially unlimited resources.', 'Develop and maintain new and existing tools', 'Actively contribute to the growth of a new start-up studio. Lead by example, including demonstrating a willingness to give and receive feedback, collaborate with others to share techniques, ideas, and contribute to a positive working environment.', 'In-depth understanding of modern design patterns and paradigms, especially around API contracts, backend services that are reliable and scalable', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Write clear, maintainable, portable code that adheres to a well-documented coding standard', 'Define the vision and shape the strategy of infrastructure services.', 'Experience developing and sustaining live games and services', 'Requirements', 'Design, Build and Integrate with multiple types of service APIs that are used to handle a range of services']

['', 'Ultra is seeking a talented, highly motivated Machine Learning Engineer with five to eight years of experience to join the Product Innovation teams supporting AI/ML research projects working for a Senior Data Scientist. build mission critical AI/ML applications.', 'Desired Skills:', 'Experience incorporating modern data streaming architectures such as Apache Storm towards building ML/AI products.', 'Deep CircleCI.', 'Build and integrate data streaming services with the ML application containers using modern streaming architectures such as Apache Storm.', '4+ years of experience with Machine Learning/Data Science application development/deployment', 'Build and deploy Docker containers for seamless integration, scaling and deployment of ML applications.', 'Understand Deep Learning architectures and frameworks such as Pytorch and TensorFlow.', '\xa0', 'Reasonable accommodation statement: If you need an accommodation for any part of the application process, please as Pandas, Numpy, Scikitlearn and Scipy packages.', 'Adopt CI/CD development practices towards continuous integration and delivery.', 'Engage and collaborate with internal and external partner teams to advance ML/AI application development and productionization.\xa0\xa0', 'Ability to obtain a US Government security clearance.\xa0Security clearances are granted to U.S. citizens.', 'Deep
