'Ultra specialises in providing application-engineered bespoke solutions. We focus on our customers’ mission critical and intelligent systems in the defence, security, critical detection & control markets.\xa0Our capabilities and technologies can be found on many of the world’s long-term military programmes.\xa0We employ over 4,500 employees across the globe and are listed on the London Stock Exchange. Ultra operates mainly as a Tier 3 (sub-system) and occasionally a Tier 2 systems provider, in the Maritime, C3 (Communications, Command and Control) and Cyber, military and commercial aerospace, nuclear and industrial sensors markets. We use both research and development, to provide innovative, mission specific bespoke technological solutions to our customer’s most complex problems. Learn more by visiting our website:\xa0https://www.ultra.group/', 'Knowledge of Version Control\xa0system such as Git or Subversion', 'Experience with visualization tools and techniques (e.g., Periscope, Business Objects, D3, ggplot, Tableau, SAS Visual Analytics, PowerBI).\xa0', 'Adopt agile methodologies to accelerate delivery by identifying and removing process barriers through continuous collaboration with key stakeholders.', 'Experience working with relational databases such as Postgres, Oracle and non-relational databases such as MongoDB etc.', 'Apply state of the art Machine Learning/Data Science frameworks (Python data science stack, DL frameworks such as Pytorch, TensorFlow) to build mission critical AI/ML applications.', 'Bachelor’s degree in\xa0Computer clearance.\xa0Security clearances are granted to U.S. citizens.', 'Experience with big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, NoSQL, HIVE, HDFS, HBase, MapReduce, Spark, Kafka, Sqoop).\xa0', 'We offer medical, dental, vision, life, and disability insurance, health savings accounts, paid time off, and a 401(k) plan with a Company match.', 'Leverage micro-services principles and architecture to build ML and data pipelines to minimize dependency fallouts and agile development.', 'Required Skills:', 'Bachelor’s degree in\xa0Computer Science, Data Science or Mathematics/Statistics', 'Apply state of the art Machine Learning/Data Science frameworks (Python data science stack, DL frameworks such as Pytorch, TensorFlow) to build mission critical AI/ML applications.Understand general ML/DS algorithm pipelines and ability to create/advance the current implementations.Build and deploy Docker containers for seamless integration, scaling and deployment of ML applications.Build data collection plans, test scenarios in practical environments to enable machine learning experimentation.Build and integrate data streaming services with the ML application containers using modern streaming architectures such as Apache Storm.Engage and collaborate with internal and external partner teams to advance ML/AI application development and productionization.\xa0\xa0Leverage micro-services principles and architecture to build ML and data pipelines to minimize dependency fallouts and agile development.Adopt agile methodologies to accelerate delivery by identifying and removing process barriers through continuous collaboration with key stakeholders.Adopt CI/CD development practices towards continuous integration and delivery.', 'Knowledge of Agile/Scrum development methodology\xa0', 'This contractor and subcontractor shall abide by the requirements of 41 CFR 60–1.4(a), 60–300.5(a) and 60–741.5(a). These regulations prohibit discrimination against qualified individuals based on their status as protected veterans or individuals with disabilities, and prohibit discrimination against all individuals based on their race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, and for inquiring about, discussing or disclosing compensation. Moreover, these regulations require that covered prime contractors and subcontractors take affirmative action to employ and advance in employment individuals without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status.']

['', 'You have experience with Policy Administration Systems ', 'Works ahead to proactively elicit requirements for future user stories', 'Provides production support and coordinates solutions and remediation of customer impacts, as assigned. ', 'Understand business priorities to effectively coordinate multiple streams of work at one time', ' Additional Details ', 'Performs user acceptance testing on new features and validates new operational procedures', 'Coordinate rollouts of features across projects and product lines, including user acceptance testing and validation', 'Proven experience in analyst roles ', 'Creates user acceptance criteria for developers and QA to reflect all business requirements and scenarios for assigned work', "3-5+ years minimum experience in the insurance industry, minimum 2 of those years in an analyst roleBachelor's degree in Technology, Engineering, Business/Economics, Science or Mathematics or similar fields Proven experience in analyst roles US P&C Insurance industry experience required - auto, home, life, other", 'Create and maintain detailed documentation on products and processes using a wide variety of technical tools that are constantly evolving', "Bachelor's degree in Technology, Engineering, Business/Economics, Science or Mathematics or similar fields ", 'Salary: We pay top-of-market salaries for most positions, factoring in experience, talent and location. We do not offer equity.Benefits: Medical, dental, vision, 401(k), wellness reimbursement, four weeks of PTO, six weeks of parental leave (12 weeks for parents who give birth), and great work-life balance. Our office building offers on-site shower and bike stalls, and panoramic views of San Francisco. Location: Due to COVID-19 our teams are all working remotely through July 5, 2021. We provide an in-home office set-up including laptop, monitor, ergonomic desk, chair and other items as needed. Post COVID-19: San Francisco, CA near Montgomery BART Station. Phoenix AZ location possible for the right candidate. ', 'Salary: We pay top-of-market salaries for most positions, factoring in experience, talent and location. We do not offer equity.', "You’re solutions focusedYou're a clear communicator who can have crucial conversations when necessary You're able to work effectively with a high degree of independence and flexibilityYou have a solid understanding of project management - managing risks, understanding dependencies and planning ahead is in your DNAYou have excellent analytical skillsYou execute superior stakeholder management and relationship building skills You are familiar with agile project management methodologyYou have experience with Policy Administration Systems ", 'Provide oversight and input into the definition, planning and implementation of insurance projects and features. ['• Technology Engineering & Project Planning/Management', '', '• Executes day-to-day maintenance tasks, software/platform/configuration updates, and resolves live-site issues.', 'Open to sponsorship\xa0\xa0', 'Candidate must have a 4 year degree.\xa0', 'The team is also responsible for systems architecture, platform configuration management, capacity management, site reliability, application support, monitoring, and incident response.', 'Senior Salesforce System Engineer', 'Responsible for the core engineering, systems architecture, and technical operations of the company’s Salesforce platforms. The team is responsible for the design, build and development of large scale, resilient solutions and systems that encompass all our products and services.', 'Bravotech a leader in IT Staffing and Staff Augmentation is seeking a perm Salesforce System Engineer for a premier client in VA. The ideal candidate will have 10+ years experience and will have the ability to work 100% Remote.      ', '100% remote', 'Responsible for planning and executing the integration of Internet based products and services for the company into a complex data center and cloud environment in an efficient, secure, scalable, reliable and cost-effective manner.', '• 3-5+ years of operating complex, large-scale enterprise external facing applications or web sites', 'Must have the following technical skills: Salesforce, Salesforce DevOps, Ruby, Python scripting, Powershell, Apex Coding, SF Best practices  ', '• Coordinates with various teams to provision and facilitate delivery of systems and applications', '• Ensures the use of performance data and historical metrics to effectively plan for growth, upgrades, migrations and optimization', '\xa0', '• Provides and maintains documentation of systems architecture, troubleshooting and support guidelines, system metrics, project information and plans, and training information for both Systems Engineering and Operations staff', '• Experience working in a high capacity, highly scalable mission-critical web serving environment']

['', 'Collaborate with designers to ensure we deliver the optimal user experience.', 'Lead the technical delivery of the initiative from design to deployment.', 'Senior Software Engineer is responsible for building the software that enables our digital care management platform, while mentoring junior engineers on the team. They accomplish this by working closely with other engineers, product managers, designers and data scientists. The Senior Software Engineer sits within the Engineering department and reports to a Manager of Software Engineering. Success in this role is demonstrated by translating business requirements that have an impact on patient care into high quality solutions coded with security and privacy best practices in mind.\xa0', 'Areas of Responsibility:', 'Work with our customer support team to debug and fix bugs affecting our users.', 'Lead initiatives (10%)', 'Scope out complexity of future work (10%)', 'Participate in on-call rotations to make sure our systems have exemplar uptime and reliability.Work with our customer support team to debug and fix bugs affecting our users.', 'Values the difference between good code and correct code, and cares about test-driven development without dogma.', 'The Care management team uses technology to improve care manager adoption and deploy complex care teams. The team is seeking a passionate and a curious engineer who has the ability to collaborate across teams, and can display humility and tenacity in their day to day tasks. The candidate will get an opportunity to work in healthcare technology and see how we improve care management.', 'Write automated tests to ensure code is of the highest quality.', 'Makes good trade-offs for core design and API decisions — knows when to stick to convention, but also when to break it.', 'Translate user stories into software solutions (50%)', 'Education, Experience, & Skills Required:', 'Work closely with product managers and scrum masters to understand the business problems.Collaborate with designers to ensure we deliver the optimal user experience.Validate design approach with other senior engineers.Write automated tests to ensure code is of the highest quality.', 'Participate in on-call rotations to make sure our systems have exemplar uptime and reliability.', 'Work closely with software engineers to guide their technical and career growth.', 'Work with product managers and scrum masters to develop proof of concepts and estimates for future work.\xa0', 'Excellent communicator, comfortable explaining technical problems and plans in person and in writing.', 'This posting is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee and any percentages listed are approximate. Duties, responsibilities and activities may change or new ones may be assigned at any time with or without notice.', 'Works effectively in fast-paced, agile startup environment, and finds fulfillment delivering innovative solutions.', 'Passionate about leveraging their technical skills to help improve patient care.', 'Validate design approach with other senior engineers.', 'At least 3 years development experience building SaaS or cloud-based commercial software products.', 'A B.S. or M.S. degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a closely related field of study.At least 3 years development experience building SaaS or cloud-based commercial software products.Experienced with backend frameworks such as Spring or Ruby on Rails .Proficient with a modern scripting language such as Python.Makes good trade-offs for core design and API decisions — knows when to stick to convention, but also when to break it.Excellent communicator, comfortable explaining technical problems and plans in person and in writing.Values the difference between good code and correct code, and cares about test-driven development without dogma.Demonstrable history of technical mentorship.\xa0Experience leading complex initiatives from technical design to delivery.\xa0Thrives on diverse technical challenges — our system integrates a wide variety of healthcare and other technologies.Passionate about leveraging their technical skills to help improve patient care.Works effectively in fast-paced, agile startup environment, and finds fulfillment delivering innovative solutions.', 'Experienced with backend frameworks such as Spring or Ruby on Rails .Proficient with a modern scripting language such as Python.', 'Wellframe was founded to counter a pressing industry problem: the healthcare system has struggled to find ways to support people in between care settings, at scale. We believe health plans are in the best position to advocate for their members as they navigate their health and care, but know that technology alone can’t help us achieve this ambition. That’s why our team of physicians, clinicians, public health experts, data scientists, engineers, and healthcare industry experts ensure our patented technology works in service of the person-to-person connections that make healthcare work best.', 'Work with product managers and scrum masters to lead the definition and decomposition of big initiatives.Lead the technical delivery of the initiative from design to deployment.', 'Work with product managers and scrum masters to lead the definition and decomposition of big initiatives.', 'Work closely with product managers and scrum masters to understand the business problems.', 'Demonstrable history of technical mentorship.\xa0Experience leading complex initiatives from technical design to delivery.\xa0Thrives on diverse technical challenges — our system integrates a wide variety of healthcare and other technologies.', 'Wellframe, Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by local, state, or federal laws, rules, or regulations.', 'Debug and fix production issues (20%)', 'A B.S. or M.S. degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a closely related field of study.', 'Mentor Software Engineers (10%)', 'At Wellframe, we reimagine healthcare relationships through a new approach that uses high-tech to deliver the high-touch support people need, when and where they need it. We call it Digital Health Management. Our comprehensive suite of Digital Health Management solutions for care management, advocacy, and navigation help organizations forge more meaningful connections with members, across their healthcare journey.\xa0']

['', 'Experience using AWS cloud services', '5+ years of experience building large-scale data pipelinesExperience writing production-level code with Python and/or node.jsStrong SQL knowledgeExperience using AWS cloud servicesDevelopment experience in Apache SparkFamiliarity with workflow orchestration frameworks (ex: Airflow)Self-starter: able to adapt to emerging challenges and execute under ambiguity', 'Development experience in Apache Spark', 'Voyage is delivering on the promise of self-driving cars.', 'Experience writing production-level code with Python and/or node.js', 'Responsibilities:', 'Work with stakeholders across various teams to identify, design, and implement additional features and improvements to fulfill their data needs', 'Self-starter: able to adapt to emerging challenges and execute under ambiguity', 'Build analytics tools for surfacing actionable insights into our vehicle performance', 'Ownership of all things dataDevelop and expand our vehicle data pipeline that processes terabytes of data per dayWork on infrastructure for surfacing and processing training data for machine learning purposesBuild analytics tools for surfacing actionable insights into our vehicle performanceDevelop and expand our capabilities to search and access our vehicle dataWork with stakeholders across various teams to identify, design, and implement additional features and improvements to fulfill their data needsBe a "data advocate" across the company and helping various teams understand the data that is available and how to effectively access it', "Voyage has built the technology and services to bring autonomous transportation to those who need it most, beginning in retirement communities. Whether residents face mobility restrictions or just want to take a ride, Voyage takes pride in getting all our passengers to their destination safely, efficiently, and affordably. Our journey begins in calmer communities, but we won't stop until anyone, anywhere can summon a Voyage.", 'Familiarity with workflow orchestration frameworks (ex: Airflow)', 'Autonomous vehicles collect large amounts of data on a daily basis. The biggest challenge is making it easily accessible across various functions, such as analytics for tracking vehicle performance, queryable sensor data for engineers, training data for machine learning, etc. Your primary responsibility will be to own the data processing pipeline to allow us to ingest, process, and expose the large amounts of data that we’re collecting.', 'Be a "data advocate" across the company and helping various teams understand the data that is available and how to effectively access it', 'Ownership of all things data', 'Requirements:', 'Strong SQL knowledge', 'Develop and expand our vehicle data pipeline that processes terabytes of data per day', 'Work on infrastructure for surfacing and processing training data for machine learning purposes', '5+ years of experience building large-scale data pipelines', 'Develop and expand our capabilities to search and access our vehicle data']

[' Write code at all tiers from middle tier to frontend. Troubleshoot, analyze and debug application issues. Optimizing and refactoring existing code to increase responsiveness, performance, and maintainability. Ensures that the architectures and standards are being followed, by Influencing and participating in code reviews and quality assurance processes. Adhere to and enforce ODS policies and procedures. Adhere to and enforce coding standards and best practices. Create and maintain conceptual, logical, and physical application architectures. Innovate and share findings with other Seniors and Leads. Implement new architectural changes for client systems. job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Data Acquisition Team
job_text: ['', 'Willing to jump in to areas other than pure software development, ie: creating architectures that are easily monitored from a devops perspective', 'Nourish and amplify\xa0great coding principles and\xa0practices', 'Be a vibrant and enthusiastic contributor to multiple development and support teams across our organization', '5+ years of professional enterprise\xa0software development experience.\xa0', 'AWS experience with common services (EKS, Dynamo, etc)Familiar with Scrum and Agile methodologiesWilling to jump in to areas other than pure software development, ie: creating architectures that are easily monitored from a devops perspective', 'We are seeking a collaborative, curious, progressive,\xa0and enthusiastic Software Engineering lead to work on all aspects of our containerized\xa0data integration software, including the backend services, APIs, CI/CD Pipeline,\xa0UIs, and everything else.\xa0We use AWS and k8s\xa0heavily, write most of our code in typescript and go, run almost exclusively on linux, and\xa0use a variety of backend queueing systems and databases. We deploy at least\xa0every two weeks (often more frequently) using a light and unobtrusive scrum process with great Product Owners and motivated team members.', 'What you’ll do:', 'Work with teammates to pair program and review/test code\xa0', 'AWS experience with common services (EKS, Dynamo, etc)', 'Lead the technical evolution of a major piece of our platform', 'Fast learner; eager to work with new technologies.\xa0', 'Clarabridge’s\xa0customer experience management platform helps hundreds of the world’s leading brands understand and improve the customer journey. With over 310 employees and offices in Reston, London, San Francisco, Barcelona, Ghent, and Singapore,\xa0Clarabridge\xa0is an internationally recognized leader in the Customer Experience Management industry. Our culture is people-focused, results-oriented, and customer-obsessed.\xa0', 'Familiar with Scrum and Agile methodologies', 'Able to adequately balance speed of delivery against quality of solution based on requirements.', 'Design, write, test, and deploy production-grade code using Node, typescript, go, k8s,\xa0jenkins, mongo, github, etc', '\xa0', 'About you:', '5+ years of professional enterprise\xa0software development experience.\xa0Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science\xa0Experience with node, linux, and k8s\xa0Fast learner; eager to work with new technologies.\xa0Able to adequately balance speed of delivery against quality of solution based on requirements.', 'Troubleshoot and provide solutions to product issues', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science\xa0', 'Act in a DevOps fashion to deploy, monitor, and scale our software', 'Preferred', "The team you’d be joining is the Data Acquisition team, which is responsible for loading data from any and all disparate data sources into one unified hub for analysis.\xa0Lots of challenges around massive scaling, observability, blue/green deployment, code efficiency, etc - it's a lot of fun for the right person!", 'Improve both our software and our development process as you go\xa0', 'Lead the technical evolution of a major piece of our platformDesign, write, test, and deploy production-grade code using Node, typescript, go, k8s,\xa0jenkins, mongo, github, etcAct in a DevOps fashion to deploy, monitor, and scale our softwareNourish and amplify\xa0great coding principles and\xa0practicesImprove both our software and our development process as you go\xa0Work with teammates to pair program and review/test code\xa0Troubleshoot and provide solutions to product issuesBe a vibrant and enthusiastic contributor to multiple development and support teams across our organization', 'Experience with node, linux, and k8s\xa0', 'About Clarabridge', 'Required']

['We know that innovation thrives on product teams where diverse points of view come together to solve hard problems in ways that are just now possible. As such, we explicitly seek people that bring diverse life experiences, diverse educational backgrounds, diverse cultures, and diverse work experiences.\xa0', '', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.\xa0', 'Necessary Qualifications:\xa0', 'viable', 'usable', 'Our\xa0product manager must contribute to\xa0their\xa0product team a solid knowledge of the various constraints of the business – constraints from marketing, sales, service, finance, legal, and privacy are typical examples. The product manager must also contribute to the product team a deep knowledge of our users and customers, and the data about how our customers engage with our products. Finally,\xa0our\xa0product managers\xa0are\xa0expected to track industry trends and the competitive landscape as they pertain to her product.\xa0', '\xa0', 'Diverse Perspectives:\xa0', 'Our\xa0product managers that are not afraid of signing up for results, even when this means they\xa0must\xa0work through others to achieve the necessary results.\xa0You will need to be able to influence your teammates, as well as colleagues, stakeholders, and key executives, through your use of data and logic.\xa0', 'Demonstrated understanding of the techniques and methods of modern product discovery and product delivery.\xa0', 'Necessary Qualifications:', 'We staff our product teams with the skills necessary to come up with effective solutions that are\u202fvaluable\u202f(our customers choose to buy or use),\u202fviable\u202f(the solution works within the many constraints of the business),\u202fusable\u202f(the user can figure out how to use) and\u202ffeasible\u202f(our engineers have the skills and technology to implement).\xa0', 'Demonstrated ability to figure out solutions to hard problems with many constraints, using sound judgement to assess risks, and to lay out your argument in a well-structured, data-informed, written narrative.\xa0', 'Our\xa0product teams solve hard problems – customer problems and business problems – in ways that our customers love\xa0and\xa0yet work for our business. Our product teams are cross-functional and durable, generally comprised of a product manager, a product designer, and several engineers.\xa0', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.\xa0Demonstrated understanding of the techniques and methods of modern product discovery and product delivery.\xa05\xa0years working on technology-powered products as either a product manager, product designer, engineer, data analyst, data scientist, or user researcher.\u202f\xa0Demonstrated ability to figure out solutions to hard problems with many constraints, using sound judgement to assess risks, and to lay out your argument in a well-structured, data-informed, written narrative.\xa0Proven ability to engage with engineers, designers, and company leaders in a constructive and collaborative relationship.\xa0', 'feasible', 'Diverse Perspectives:', 'We look for product managers that understand that consistent innovation is the result of each member of the product team contributing their passion and their ideas. The product manager must collaborate closely with her product designer and engineers to discover effective solutions, and then work together to deliver those solutions to market.\xa0', 'Proven ability to engage with engineers, designers, and company leaders in a constructive and collaborative relationship.\xa0', '5\xa0years working on technology-powered products as either a product manager, product designer, engineer, data analyst, data scientist, or user researcher.\u202f\xa0', 'valuable']

Provide root cause analysis and participate in continuous improvement initiatives.Make pragmatic and data-driven decisions that will meet both business and technology needs.Communicate with the Quality Assurance team on a regular basis. This position is not remote and candidates will need to relocate or be living in the Raleigh, NC or Washington DC area to be considered.\xa0', 'About ChurnZero', 'Write clear and maintainable full-stack code while working in a professional software engineering environment (source control, continuous integration, short release cycles, automated testing, etc…).', '2+ years of working with a relevant front-end framework (AngularJS, Angular, React, etc…)', '2+ years working with Microsoft development stack (ASP.NET, MVC, Web Api, .NET Core, etc…)', 'Build innovative and performant features into our Customer Success platform using the latest engineering practices and technologies.', 'Please note:\xa0At this time we are unable to consider candidates who would require a VISA now or in the future. This position is not remote and candidates will need to relocate or be living in the Raleigh, NC or Washington DC area to be considered.\xa0', 'Work with Support and Customer Success Managers to quickly identify and resolve customer reported issues. Provide root cause analysis and participate in continuous improvement initiatives.', 'Document key business workflows and software design.', 'Qualifications', 'Demonstrated ability to work independently and without supervision. You will be expected to make business and technology decisions on a daily basis', 'Strong verbal and written communications skills', 'Please note:', 'Communicate with the Quality Assurance team on a regular basis. Work to deliver work in small chunks that can be tested early in the development process.', 'ChurnZero helps subscription businesses fight customer churn. Our software solutions allow businesses to understand how their customers use their product, asses their health and their likelihood to renew, and give businesses the means to personalize the customer experience through timely and relevant touchpoints. ChurnZero is backed by the leading angels and venture capital firms Baird Capital, Grotech Ventures, and Middleland Capital.\xa0', 'Our fast-growing startup is looking for a skilled, self-motivated problem solver to join our team as a\u202fFull Stack Software Engineer. As a\u202fSoftware Engineer, you will work closely with our product and quality assurance teams to design, implement, deliver and support our top-rated Customer Success platform.\xa0Join the team that proudly supports the highest ranked Customer Success\u202fplatform\u202fon G2 Crowd, Capterra and Trust Radius\u202f– and be an important part to our continued success!', 'Participate in regularly scheduled security reviews. Review periodic security scan results and address any found security vulnerabilities.', '2+ years working with Microsoft development stack (ASP.NET, MVC, Web Api, .NET Core, etc…)2+ years of working with a relevant front-end framework (AngularJS, Angular, React, etc…)2+ years developing and interacting with REST services2+ years of relational database design and development (MS SQL Server, MySql, Oracle, etc…)SaaS/Cloud experience strongly preferredStrong verbal and written communications skillsDemonstrated ability to work independently and without supervision. methods are driven by artificial intelligence allowing computers to perform such complex operations as grading essays with more accuracy than humans.', 'Good communication skills', 'SQL experience to include work with relational databases and writing SQL queries preferred (MySQL preferred)', '2-5 years professional experience utilizing core Java language', 'SSO & Security experience a plus', million annually!Our machine scoring methods are driven by artificial intelligence allowing computers to perform such complex operations as grading essays with more accuracy than humans.Our processes as JSP, Spring, JavaScript, XML, JMS, or Web Services is preferred', 'Do you want to be a part of something innovative and cutting edge? We have the most advanced features of any online testing system.', 'The Java Developer will be an integral part of the Single Sign On software engineering and product development team using cutting edge technologies centered around Java centric solutions. ['', 'As much as we care about our customers and our products, we are first and foremost a team of like-minded, passionate innovators.\xa0We have built (and continue to build) a world-class, dynamic, and innovative environment with a dash of customer-focus, determination, and humility.\xa0We practice and seek talented people who share our values.\xa0In return, we offer you the opportunity to make a real impact within our business, working towards a better tomorrow.', 'Knowledge of WebAPI (now MVC6) required.', 'Comply365 offers a comprehensive benefits package (medical, dental, vision, life insurance), 401(k) plan and unlimited PTO. You can work as a team, often pair or group programming. You also like to work autonomously and have a lot of freedom to be creative and inventive. You love to share knowledge and ideas, both with our own development team, as well as our clients.\xa0You constantly learn about 3rd party apps and data sources within the industry in which you work and find ways to improve your own work by leveraging such tools.', 'Degree in computer science or related field preferred', 'Unit and Integration testing experience required.', 'Comply365 is an equal opportunity employer, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'Answer client questions around best practices using our product.', 'Comply365 is a fast-growing provider of SaaS solutions for enterprise customers in highly regulated industries like aviation and rail. Our applications help mobile workforces’ access, author and effectively use critical information (Documents, Forms, Training content). We save money and time, increasing safety and efficiency for our customers.', 'Develop highly performant, testable API’s', 'About the Position', 'Work with Product Owners and clients to build out requirements for API’s.', 'Understanding of parallelism as well as asynchronous actions in programming', 'Experience migrating from .NET Standard to .NET CoreExperience with message queue/background jobsUnderstanding of parallelism as well as asynchronous actions in programmingExperience with WCFExperience with System Services', 'About Comply365', 'Essential Duties and Responsibilities:', 'Desired Qualifications and Skills:', 'Experience with message queue/background jobs', 'About You', 'Experience migrating from .NET Standard to .NET Core', 'Experience with System Services', 'Required Qualifications and Skills: ', 'Knowledge and experience in ASP.NET, Visual Studio and C#', 'Understanding of SOLID principles', 'This position requires a unique skillset. Your time will be spent interacting with customers on a frequent basis as well as supporting mission critical software integrations. Responsibilities of this position include expanding features in our APIs, developing features for integration agents as well as holding training sessions with clients who may not have experience implementing API-based integrations.']

Work closely with development teams outside the Data Engineering group, including, Business Intelligence Developers, Product Development, and Data Scientists, who will use the data being delivered.', '-Produce and maintain accurate test plans and test system overview documentation.', '-Detail oriented', '-Passionate about data', 'Education:', '-Review for existing standards and adjust to new standards as they mature.', '-Minimum 1 year of experience with database design and/or development required.', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'Experience:', '-Occasionally take on special projects and additional duties.\xa0', '-Expert knowledge on how to test processes that affect data', 'EMPLOYMENT STATUS:', 'Knowledge/Skills/Abilities:', '-Familiarity with visual data analysis using tools such as Tableau or other Business Intelligence platforms', 'FLSA:', '-Minimum 1 year of experience with MS SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB preferred.', '-Be an active participant in the development process and possess an understanding of the intent of the design and the desired outcomes of the Data Engineering team members.', '-Positive and creative attitude', '\ufeffPersonal Attributes:', '-Strong verbal and written communication skills', '-Committed to personal development and professional growth', '-Collaborate with various data providers to evaluate and help resolve data issues.', 'The Data Services team mission is to unify data across the enterprise to optimize the business decisions made at the strategic, tactical, and operational levels of the organization. We accomplish this by providing an Enterprise Data Warehouse, reporting platform, and business processes that can provide quality data, in a timely fashion, from any channel of the company and present it in such a manner to maximize the value of that data for both internal and external customers.', 'The Data Engineer (Quality) is responsible for designing, developing, and executing test plans for automated ETL processes. This role will be part of a team adopting and implementing new data technologies and tools like Snowflake, Spark, Hadoop, HDFS, MongoDB and/or others to provide faster, more accurate, and deeper insights into our products and services. As a member of the growing data services and business analytics team, this person will be a key contributor to the successful deployment of strategic future state capabilities critical for our business. As a Data Engineer who is focused on evaluating the quality of the solutions others build, this person is responsible for producing methods of testing the quality of code produced by our Data Engineering staff and adherence to Data Engineering developed standards. This individual will also monitor jobs for performance and error as well as make/suggest changes to address those concerns by working with the members of the Data Engineering team and the Database Administrator. This position will be responsible for designing, documenting, automating, executing, and maintaining test plans and reporting back to the author the results. This individual will implement moderate to complex test scripts to test the functionality.', '-Moderate to advanced working knowledge of Microsoft Transact-SQL (T-SQL) or ANSI SQL and demonstrated ability to create ad-hoc SQL queries to analyze data, create prototypes, etc.']

['', 'Job Responsibilities', '• Work with Senior SREs to contribute to the overall platform stability, availability, and quality.', '• Deep appreciation and understanding of data, scale and Ruby on Rials.', '• Expertise with a variety of relational and NoSQL databases. MSSQL, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Couchbase, DocumentDB, DynamoDB, MongoDB, Redis preferred.', '• 5+ years of professional experience developing ETL software for modern cloud environments.', 'VIRTUAL – FULL TIME', '• Education: Formal higher-education degrees in STEM fields or vocational certificates related to software development are preferred, but not required. Real-world experience and proven track records count as much, if not more.', 'Candidates must be US Citizen or US Permanent Resident - no sponsorshipo', '• Real-world shipping product development experience using client-side JavaScript frameworks and backend dynamic languages/frameworks in a service-oriented architecture.', '• Strong verbal and written communication and documentation skills is required.', '• Enable SREs to have visibility and responsibility into the function of the code they are operating.', '• Working knowledge and hands-on experience with Docker and Kubernetes (or similar container/orchestration).', '• Follow software development best practices to create maintainable and extensible software solutions.', '• Own and implement the key data delivery pipelines for the company’s flagship SaaS platform.', '• Understanding of privacy-by-design frameworks, and code-level security techniques is a plus.', 'Our client is searching for an experienced Senior Software Development Engineer (SDE) to work within an agile team of software architects and developers to implement and maintain secure, scalable, cloud-based data/ETL pipelines for our public and customer specific data integrations. Technical aptitude is a must, and so is the right team-minded attitude and the ability to work interchangeably with others. The core team is as a small SWAT-style team with everyone pulling their own weight, playing a variety of roles, and covering each other’ responsibilities when needed. Applicants should be qualified as top-notch full-stack developers, with a passion for focusing on backend service-oriented architectures, scalable system design, databases and data models, and API-driven models.', 'Experience and Qualifications', '• Familiar with cloud and Linux sysadmin experience – IaaS, PaaS, and container/orchestration experience is important.', '• Interact directly with SREs and customers to triage, debug, and remediate production issues.', '• Experience with Sidekiq, ActiveAdmin, Custom DSLs or very similar is a must.', '• Work in an agile manner with transparency and fluid communication within the engineering team and across other teams in the company.', '• Work with product owner to understand internal and external requirements and help the team design solutions to satisfy these.', '• Proven track record of success in high-functioning continuous delivery environment.', '• Live and breathe a DevOps culture on a small team of Senior SDEs and SREs that work hand-in-hand with you to deliver modern, scalable, SaaS software across multiple cloud providers.', '• Work with modern CI/CD tool and methodologies to ship product on a daily basis.', '• 5+ years of professional programming experience with languages and frameworks such as Ruby, Rails, Python, etc.', 'SENIOR SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT ENGINEER (SDE) – Data/ETL', '• Familiarity with Big Data systems such as Hadoop, HBase, HDFS, Spark, Kafka, etc. is a plus.', '• Solid understanding of modern API design patterns (REST, GraphQL, JSON, etc.)', '• Understanding of source control systems (git, hg, etc.) and related workflow patterns (e.g. GitFlow)']

job_title: Principal Data Scientist - Human Capital Analytics
job_text: ['', 'Works with senior executives to develop and drive segment or enterprise-wide functional strategies.', 'The People Analytics team at Humana takes a customer centric approach to optimizing talent outcomes and improving the associate experience. We provide advanced analytic products and consulting to our Enterprise business leaders and HR centers of excellence. Our passion for improving the associate experience is supported through a strategy of a strong data infrastructure, analytic product development, and advanced data science capabilities.', 'Creates reports, projections, models, and presentations to support business strategy and tactics.', 'Experience in developing, maintaining, and collecting structured and unstructured data sets for analysis and reporting', 'Responsibilities', 'The Principal Data Scientist develops, maintains, and collects structured and unstructured data sets for analysis and reporting.', 'Advanced Degree in a quantitative discipline, such as Mathematics, Economics, Finance, Statistics, Computer Science, Engineering or related fieldExperience with people systems and technologies', 'Experience in creating reports, projections, models, and presentations to support business strategy and tactics', 'Advanced Degree in a quantitative discipline, such as Mathematics, Economics, Finance, Statistics, Computer Science, Engineering or related field', 'Ability to work at very high levels in multiple knowledge and functional areas across the enterprise', 'Advanced proficiency in statistical software like R, SAS, SPSS, etc.', 'Must be passionate about contributing to an organization focused on continuously improving consumer experiences', 'Experience with providing strategic advice and guidance to functional teams', "Master's degree and 10 or more years of experience in data analytics", 'Experience in using mathematics, statistics, modeling, business analysis, and technology to transform high volumes of complex data into advanced analytic solutions', '2 or more years project and/or people leadership experience', 'Advises one or more areas, programs or functions and provides recommendations to senior executives on matters of significance, and as an advanced subject matter expert competent to work at very high levels in multiple knowledge and functional areas across the enterprise.', 'Required Qualifications', 'Ability to advise one or more areas, programs or functions', 'Description', 'Successful demonstrated experience in working with senior executives to develop and drive segment or enterprise-wide functional strategies', 'Preferred Qualifications', "Master's degree and 10 or more years of experience in data analytics2 or more years project and/or people leadership experienceExperience in using mathematics, statistics, modeling, business analysis, and technology to transform high volumes of complex data into advanced analytic solutionsAdvanced proficiency in statistical software like R, SAS, SPSS, etc.Experience with providing strategic advice and guidance to functional teamsExperience in developing, maintaining, and collecting structured and unstructured data sets for analysis and reportingExperience in creating reports, projections, models, and presentations to support business strategy and tacticsSuccessful demonstrated experience in working with senior executives to develop and drive segment or enterprise-wide functional strategiesAbility to advise one or more areas, programs or functionsAbility to work at very high levels in multiple knowledge and functional areas across the enterpriseMust be passionate about contributing to an organization focused on continuously improving consumer experiences", 'The Principal Data Scientist develops, maintains, and collects structured and unstructured data sets for analysis and reporting.Creates reports, projections, models, and presentations to support business strategy and tactics.Works with senior executives to develop and drive segment or enterprise-wide functional strategies.Advises one or more areas, programs or functions and provides recommendations to senior executives on matters of significance, and as an advanced subject matter expert competent to work at very high levels in multiple knowledge and functional areas across the enterprise.', 'Experience with people systems and technologies', 'The Principal Data Scientist will enhance and mature the vision of People Analytics at Humana. The principal drives analytic value by working with business customers to identify and prioritize advanced analytic use cases. They will deliver analytic output and lead a team of data scientists. The principal will partner and consult with executives in the business, set objectives, and execute on a customer-centric approach of delivery.']

[' ', ' • Experience with DB2 z/OS', ' • 5+ years experience with modeling Rational Rose', ' • 5+ years experience with ERwin modeling (exposure to the version we are currently using: Erwin Data Modeler 2020 R2)', ' • Software Development experience with SQL', ' • Participate in Data Governance procedures and policy management', ' Experience in these areas is a Plus:', ' An ideal DAE Data Modeler is an analytical and creative thinker who is not intimidated by roadblocks and challenges. They understand how to successfully evaluate problems and develop appropriate solutions. Data Modelers perform well under pressure, possessing great focus while completing projects efficiently. They should be able to work well as part of a team, but also carry responsibility for their own work. Data Modelers also need to be able to work on multiple projects at a time, with the ability to quickly understand and incorporate new technologies. Below are the skills and abilities that DAE will look for in this Data Modeler position.', ' • Assist with the generation and analysis of DDL generated by Rose and Erwin', ' • Must be able to work independently and collaboratively on large scale data projects', 'Description:', ' • Experience with ETL tools such as Informatica or Snaplogic', 'Senior Data Modeler for Rational Rose to Erwin model translation', ' • Experience with using the bulk editor in ERwin', ' What you will do:', ' • 5+ years experience developing Conceptual, Logical & Physical data models for a data lake and data warehouse', ' • Work with the Data Office, DAE and Application Development teams to translate an extensive existing DB2 model from Rational Rose (2003 version) to Erwin (current version)', ' • Experience with Snowflake and/or Data Vault', ' The Data Analytics and Engineering (DAE) organization Global Retail Marketing is expanding its data modeling team. DAE Data Modelers design analytical databases that translate complex business data into usable computer systems. Data Modelers work with data architects to design databases and data structures that meet organizational needs using conceptual, logical, and physical data models.', ' • Experience with industry standard data models such as ACORD', " • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or similar", ' • Experience in reverse engineer databases', ' • Exposure with messaging solution like Kafka and MQ', ' • Experience in the insurance industry', ' What you will need:']

['This Principal Data Scientist Role is an opportunity to join an innovative organization that is amongst the largest privately held companies in the U.S.\xa0with data driven business operations. As a\xa0senior level individual contributor, you will have expertise in complex data modeling, forecasting and possess a strong business acumen!\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Servant leadership and collaborative team environment', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Never had a layoff in over 60 years in business', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Preferred experience in AI / Deep Learning for text/image/video analytics and/or cloud Computing and/or data streaming', 'Do you enjoy using data to influence company business decisions? Do you support operational leaders in a production environment to tell the story using data?\xa0', 'Why this company?', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Employee centric culture\xa0', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ph.D. Required\xa0(e.g., statistics, computer science, economics, mathematics, physics, electrical engineering, industrial engineering,\xa0or other STEM fields)\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ph.D. Required\xa0(e.g., statistics, computer science, economics, mathematics, physics, electrical engineering, industrial engineering,\xa0or other STEM fields)\xa0AND', 'In this role, be a hands-on thought leader using large data sets, complex algorithms and data modeling to tell the story and successfully guide C-suite business decisions working with senior leadership.', '***Must be authorized to work in the United States without restrictions or the need of sponsorship, now or in the future. ***', 'Qualifications:', 'Start 100% remote, with relocation package to Phoenix mid to late 2021!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to run standard model algorithms in Python, to perform classification/regression, clustering, basic text analytics, image recognition, etc.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Start 100% remote, with relocation package to Phoenix mid to late 2021!', 'AND', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Employs over 22,000 employees nationwide', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa05+ years of relevant professional work experience in data science or closely related field (e.g., as a statistician/ data analysis/ data engineer).\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with writing SQL queries, usage of R/RStudio, Python, Jupyter Notebook']

job_title: Software Engineer II - Data Warehouse Specialist
job_text: ['', 'In this role you will work closely with our internal business teams and BI specialists to define the end goal for any analytics needs of the company', ' You have 5+ years of experience ', ' You have 5+ years of experience  working on architecting and building a data warehouse. ', 'You will also be a key player in building the ETL stack to cleanse, transform and load data from different enterprise sources using multiple ETL technologies.', 'In this role you will assist the Data Warehouse Architect in building an enterprise data warehouse to provide insights and analytics to our internal clients.', ' You are a broadly skilled engineer  , accustomed to interfacing with web services of external and internal systems, building ETL pipelines using variety of technologies and service layers. ', 'WHAT WE CARE ABOUT: ', ' You are a broadly skilled engineer ', 'Our Senior Engineers contribute to more than our product – they build up our team. Through a combination of mentoring, technical leadership, and/or direct management of small teams, they make others better and raise the bar for those around them. ', ' You have 3+ years of experience developing solutions using iPaaS applications  such as Dell Boomi, SSIS or Informatica. ', ' You work with confidence and without ego. ', ' You value, seek out, and foster diversity. ', 'You will help formulate the vision for data integrity and security of the data within the warehouse.', ' You have basic understanding of engineering fundamentals and database technologies. You have 3+ years of experience developing solutions using iPaaS applications  such as Dell Boomi, SSIS or Informatica.  You have basic understanding of engineering fundamentals and database technologies. This will be key to highly performant world class design and implementations. You are a broadly skilled engineer  , accustomed to interfacing with web services of external and internal systems, building ETL pipelines using variety of technologies and service layers.  You have a product-focused mindset. You have the passion and ability to contribute to the process of discovering what will delight our clients and push forward one of the world’s largest and most influential industries toward a vision of openness, transparency, and evidence-based decision-making.  You work with confidence and without ego. Our engineers have deep knowledge and exercise a high degree of leadership in their daily work. You have strongly-held, defensible ideas, and advocate for what you believe is right. You are also adept at identifying and evaluating trade-offs, willing to be proven wrong, and quick to walk through fire to support your fellow teammates.  You value, seek out, and foster diversity. We are a global team from many diverse backgrounds, with different experiences and perspectives. To complement this team, you will welcome ideas that are different from your own and be skilled at finding and building from common ground. ', ' You value, seek out, and foster diversity. We are a global team from many diverse backgrounds, with different experiences and perspectives. To complement this team, you will welcome ideas that are different from your own and be skilled at finding and building from common ground. ', 'You will work with a team of Senior engineers who are end-to-end owners and help us define the current and future of technology within the group and the entire company.', ' You have basic understanding of engineering fundamentals and database technologies. ', ' You have 3+ years of experience developing solutions using iPaaS applications ', 'You will develop a deep understanding of our company’s various operational systems and datasets in order to then extract data into the data warehouse, model it and build data marts.', 'WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR:', ' You have a product-focused mindset. ', 'About The Role', ' You have a product-focused mindset. You have the passion and ability to contribute to the process of discovering what will delight our clients and push forward one of the world’s largest and most influential industries toward a vision of openness, transparency, and evidence-based decision-making. ', ' You work with confidence and without ego. ', 'In this role you will assist the Data Warehouse Architect in building an enterprise data warehouse to provide insights and analytics to our internal clients.You will develop a deep understanding of our company’s various operational systems and datasets in order to then extract data into the data warehouse, model it and build data marts.You will help formulate the vision for data integrity and security of the data within the warehouse.You will also be a key player in building the ETL stack to cleanse, transform and load data from different enterprise sources using multiple ETL technologies.In this role you will work closely with our internal business teams and BI specialists to define the end goal for any analytics needs of the companyYou will work with a team of Senior engineers who are end-to-end owners and help us define the current and future of technology within the group and the entire company.Our Senior Engineers contribute to more than our product – they build up our team. ['', 'Experience with Big Data e.g. Hadoop, MapR', 'Ability to use statistical programming languages such as R', 'About This Role', '5+ years of industry experience in applying AI/ML', 'Working knowledge of NoSQL databases e.g. MongoDB', 'Great team player who has a strong desire to change the way people use their data and have a huge impact on a small team', 'Education', 'Required Skills', 'Responsibilities Include', ' BSCS or equivalent required, MSCS or equivalent strongly preferred', 'Using statistical tools to interpret data sets, paying particular attention to trends and patterns that could be valuable for diagnostic and predictive analytics efforts.', 'Collaborating with programmers, engineers, and organizational leaders to identify opportunities for process improvements, recommend system modifications, and develop policies for data governance.', 'About Netskope', 'Mining data from primary and secondary sources, then reorganizing the data in a format that can be easily read by either human or machine.', 'Creating appropriate documentation that allows stakeholders to understand the steps of the data analysis process and duplicate or replicate the analysis if necessary.', 'Programming experience in SQL and/or Python for data manipulation necessary', 'Excellent interpersonal skills: collaboration, creativity and communication all key to success.', 'BSCS or equivalent required, MSCS or equivalent strongly preferred', 'Preparing reports for executive leadership that effectively communicate trends, patterns, and predictions using relevant data.', 'Data Scientist ', ' 5+ years of industry experience in applying AI/ML Ability to use statistical programming languages such as R Programming experience in SQL and/or Python for data manipulation necessary Working knowledge of NoSQL databases e.g. MongoDB Experience with Big Data e.g. Hadoop, MapR Excellent interpersonal skills: collaboration, creativity and communication all key to success. Great team player who has a strong desire to change the way people use their data and have a huge impact on a small team ', ' Mining data from primary and secondary sources, then reorganizing the data in a format that can be easily read by either human or machine. Using statistical tools to interpret data sets, paying particular attention to trends and patterns that could be valuable for diagnostic and predictive analytics efforts. Preparing reports for executive leadership that effectively communicate trends, patterns, and predictions using relevant data. Collaborating with programmers, engineers, and organizational leaders to identify opportunities for process improvements, recommend system modifications, and develop policies for data governance. Creating appropriate documentation that allows stakeholders to understand the steps of the data analysis process and duplicate or replicate the analysis if necessary. ']

['Provides expert content/professional leadership on complex Engineering assignments/projects. Designs and develops a consolidated, conformed enterprise data warehouse and data lake which store all critical data across Customer, Provider, Claims, Client and Benefits data. Designs, develops and implements methods, processes, tools and analyses to sift through large amounts of data stored in a data warehouse or data mart to find relationships and patterns. Participates in the delivery of the definitive enterprise information environment that enables strategic decision-making capabilities across enterprise via an analytics and reporting. Exercises considerable creativity, foresight, and judgment in conceiving, planning, and delivering initiatives. Uses deep professional knowledge and acumen to advise functional leaders. Focuses on providing thought leadership within Information Management but works on broader projects, which require understanding of wider business. Recognized internally as a subject matter expert. ', 'Education: Bachelors degree in Computer Science or a related discipline, at least eight, typically ten or more years of solid, diverse work experience in IT with a minimum of four years experience application program development, or the equivalent in education and work experience.', '2+ years of scripting (JavaScript, Python, R, Ruby, Perl, etc.)(must) ', 'Experience with Git/SVN and other code versioning tools Experience with big data technologies a plus, such as Hadoop, Hive,impala, HBase Spark Understanding of data streaming tools like Kafka, SKyline is a plus Excellent troubleshooting skills Strong communication skills Fluent in BDD and TDD development methodologies Work in an agile CI/CD environment (Jenkins experience a plus) Knowledge and/or experience with Health care information domains is a plus ', ' ', '3+ years of working in an object-oriented language: C, C++, Java, Scala, ', 'Minimize "meetings" to get requirements and have direct business interactionsWrite referenceable & modular codeDesign and architect the solution independentlyBe fluent in particular areas and have proficiency in many areasHave a passion to learnTake ownership and accountabilityUnderstands when to automate and when not toHave a desire to simplifyBe entrepreneurial / business mindedHave a quality mindset, not just code quality but also to ensure ongoing data quality by monitoring data to identify problems before they have business impactTake risks and champion new ideaSkills:\xa0 ', 'Key Characteristics: ', '2+ years being part of Agile teams; Scrum or Kanban (must) ', '3+ or other OO compiled language(must) ', '3+ years of database; SQL(must) ']

['', 'At least 2 years of software engineering experience.Advanced proficiency in at least one language. We use mostly Scala and C++ on our backend and Typescript on the frontend – it’s great if you’re comfortable in those, but we aren’t picky as long as you’re willing to learn.The ability to work closely across teams, clearly communicate goals and manage dependencies.', 'Develop new products and product features on the Gemini platform, as part of a tight knit team of two to eight developers.', 'New York NY, Portland OR, Chicago IL, San Francisco CA', 'The Role: Software Engineer', 'Responsibilities:', 'As an engineer on our backend team, you’ll architect and solve complex problems that will directly influence the direction of the digital asset space. There’s a wide range of problems to solve – from properly securing millions of dollars worth of customer funds, to developing innovative new blockchain products, to shaving microseconds off our API response times. We have a strong culture of code reviews, and a focus on security, with the end goal of writing and shipping high-quality code by getting things right the first time. We want to continue building the best product we can as we scale and grow our business. If you get excited about solving technical challenges that directly impact our customers, clients, and the rest of the team, we’d love to hear from you.\xa0This role can be based in our New York, Chicago, San Francisco, Singapore, or Portland, Oregon offices.', 'Help us Build the Future of Money: We are a licensed digital asset exchange and custodian. We built the platform so customers can buy, sell, and store digital assets (e.g., Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Zcash) in a regulated, secure, and compliant manner.', 'Experience working with or being a power user of Bitcoin, Ethereum, and/or blockchain technologyWork experience or knowledge of the finance industry, payments, trading and/or exchange systems', 'Help us Build the Future of Money\xa0', 'Help us Build the Future of Money:', 'Support your team’s production software by responding to an occasional alert or bug report.', 'The ability to work closely across teams, clearly communicate goals and manage dependencies.', 'Digital assets and blockchain technology have the power to transform the world for good. This truth, along with our core values, form the bedrock of our company and culture. No job is too small and no project too big as we endeavor to build the future of money. We are a mission-driven, team-based, inclusive, and determined community of thought leaders who invest in each other and the long game. Join us in our mission!', 'Develop new products and product features on the Gemini platform, as part of a tight knit team of two to eight developers.Write automated tests and work with our QA team to ensure the operation and correctness of new product features.Support your team’s production software by responding to an occasional alert or bug report.', 'Our CONFIDENTIAL, pre-IPO hypergrowth NYC client is looking to hire an exemplary Software Engineer in New York NY, Portland OR, Chicago IL, San Francisco CA', 'Experience working with or being a power user of Bitcoin, Ethereum, and/or blockchain technology', 'At least 2 years of software engineering experience.', 'Write automated tests and work with our QA team to ensure the operation and correctness of new product features.', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'Bonus Qualifications', 'Work experience or knowledge of the finance industry, payments, trading and/or exchange systems', 'Advanced proficiency in at least one language. We use mostly Scala and C++ on our backend and Typescript on the frontend – it’s great if you’re comfortable in those, but we aren’t picky as long as you’re willing to learn.']

['', "Be a part of the ConsultNet difference. As a leading national provider of IT staffing and solutions, ConsultNet delivers exceptional services to startup, midmarket and Fortune 1000 companies across North America. Since 1996, we've partnered with clients to create rewarding opportunities for our consultants, successfully building teams that have surefire results. In the past two years alone, we have placed more than 1,500 consultants in contract, contract-to-hire, or direct placement opportunities. We understand communication is key to finding the right job that matches your skills and career goals. For us, it's not just the work that we do; it's how we do the work. Our breadth of offerings extends to multiple IT positions in major markets throughout the country, see more at www.consultnet.com"]

Alternatively you might help develop our experimentation framework--we are a startup with lots of interesting data science projects to go around.', 'Writing code that can be put into production.\xa0The data science team writes packages that are directly called by the engineering team. We are disrupting an industry worth $900 billion globally with partnerships in North America, Asia, and soon other continents.', 'Demonstrated success using machine learning model development to solve business needs in a corporate environment. You’ve created models that have driven key decision-making insights or have been deployed to production environments', 'Brightloom is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans status or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'Health, Dental & Vision Insurance Coverage', 'The senior staff level indicates you’ll be a leader within the data science group. You’ll have a broad area of influence within the company and will be relied on to voice your thoughts as needed. That said, despite your high level you’ll be an independent contributor--you’ll get to focus on creating innovative data science products and not managing.', 'Communicating and collaborating with non-data scientists.\xa0You’ll constantly be working with stakeholders who are not data scientists--from software engineers to designers you’ll need to share data science insights and use their feedback to alter your work.', 'Home Office Refresh Reimbursement\xa0', 'About You', 'Led by our CEO, industry veteran and former Starbucks and J.Crew executive Adam Brotman, our unique, world-class team combines software and hardware engineers, designers, and industry experts to push the boundaries on re-engineering every aspect of the restaurant experience.\xa0', 'Have experience in communicating with stakeholders who are not data scientists', 'Fun, creative and collaborative remote work environment\xa0', 'Expertise in R, Python, Julia, or a different programming language with statistics and machine learning capabilities', '\ufeffWhat You’ll Do', 'Incrementally improve existing data science methods.\xa0', 'We believe any restaurant brand should be able to engage customers digitally using a seamless combination of mobile, omni-channel ordering and loyalty offerings. Up until now, only a select few brands could afford, or knew how to put together a top-notch digital engagement and ordering platform. With key Starbucks technology components integrated into our platform, Brightloom will now allow any restaurant brand to create their own version of a world-class digital flywheel ecosystem. Brightloom’s configurable technology suite combines convenience (digital ordering channels), personal connection (personalized marketing) and engagement (loyalty) for restaurant brands in today’s new digital era.\xa0', 'Experience with experimental design or optimization', 'Develop innovative data science methods.\xa0Because of our company size, you’ll be the first data scientist tackling projects no one has looked at before. You’ll need to do analyses to understand the problems, and then create solutions that can be put into production by the engineering team. Your methods need to be robust and scalable for real customers.', 'Brightloom is creating an entirely new category of software-as-a-service for consumer brands -- the Customer Growth Platform. This first-of-its-kind platform enables automated digital engagement and personalized loyalty programs to transform customer experiences while delivering predictable and repeatable lifetime value growth for brands.\xa0\xa0', 'Mentoring junior data scientists and creating team infrastructure.']

['', 'What You’ll Do For Us', ' Innovate, lead and drive actionable adoption of insights through the support and maintenance of current/existing tools and the development of new dashboard and analytics solutions using Microsoft’s Azure, Power BI, and other solutions.', ' Continually grow and apply business acumen coupled with proficiency in data and analytics to create dashboards and tools to drive actionable insights.', ' Expertise or demonstrable knowledge in Statistics / Machine Learning / Data Science.', ' Bachelor’s Degree in a relevant field (e.g. Analytics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Data Science, Engineering, Economics).', ' Demonstrated ability to use software to manipulate data, prototype new tools, and extract actionable insights from data.', ' Demonstrated ability to generate new ideas and develop them from concept to a solution.', ' Experience in building scalable models in R and/or Python, relational database such as SQL (Teradata, Oracle, PostgreSQL, etc.).', ' Relevant industry expertise (Consumer Package Goods and/or Food and Beverage) and understanding of the current state of analytics more broadly, preferred. Demonstrated ability to apply techniques from across industries and continually learn.', 'Qualifications & Requirements', ' Coca-Cola’s Iconic and Innovative brand portfolio plus a dynamic and competitive industry provide unlimited opportunities for continual development of creative, data driven problem solving & business acumen skills in a modern cloud infrastructure environment (AWS and Azure). We are a globally networked organization committed to the development of data and analytical capabilities and have vast amounts of internal, external and syndicated data. Joining our team now provides a great opportunity to be play an active part in our journey and have impact at scale.', ' Proven comfort and an intellectual curiosity for working with large sets of data, pulling in relevant team members to address identified and sometimes undiscovered needs for clients.', 'What We Can Do For You', ' Collaborate with subject matter experts, data engineers/scientists and business stakeholders to align on and develop solutions that meet the business need for actionable insights.', 'Our Purpose And Growth Culture', ' Bachelor’s Degree in a relevant field (e.g. Analytics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Data Science, Engineering, Economics). Experience in building scalable models in R and/or Python, relational database such as SQL (Teradata, Oracle, PostgreSQL, etc.). Experience developing and supporting reporting solutions, dashboards & scorecards using Microsoft Suite (Azure, Power BI, Excel). Expertise or demonstrable knowledge in Statistics / Machine Learning / Data Science. Proven comfort and an intellectual curiosity for working with large sets of data, pulling in relevant team members to address identified and sometimes undiscovered needs for clients. Demonstrated ability to generate new ideas and develop them from concept to a solution. Demonstrated ability to use software to manipulate data, prototype new tools, and extract actionable insights from data. Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with non-technical clients. Ability to create scalable data driven tools to support business applications and processes to drive effective and optimal business decisions. Relevant industry expertise (Consumer Package Goods and/or Food and Beverage) and understanding of the current state of analytics more broadly, preferred. Demonstrated ability to apply techniques from across industries and continually learn.', 'Data Scientist, RGM', ' Drive analytical thought process and make significant contribution to analytical processes, developments, and transformation of new and legacy algorithms.', ' Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with non-technical clients.', ' Coca-Cola’s Iconic and Innovative brand portfolio plus a dynamic and competitive industry provide unlimited opportunities for continual development of creative, data driven problem solving & business acumen skills in a modern cloud infrastructure environment (AWS and Azure).', ' We are a globally networked organization committed to the development of data and analytical capabilities and have vast amounts of internal, external and syndicated data. Joining our team now provides a great opportunity to be play an active part in our journey and have impact at scale.', ' Create and maintain data driven solutions and processes to extract insights in creative ways using confirmatory and exploratory analytics. Manage the end to end analytics of our proprietary approach to revenue optimization and apply creativity to generate new data driven insights to create value in our market. Continually grow and apply business acumen coupled with proficiency in data and analytics to create dashboards and tools to drive actionable insights. Collaborate with subject matter experts, data engineers/scientists and business stakeholders to align on and develop solutions that meet the business need for actionable insights. Work closely with data engineers to understand data structures and requirements. Drive analytical thought process and make significant contribution to analytical processes, developments, and transformation of new and legacy algorithms. Passion for developing data driven tools backed by analytics and algorithms to support business applications and processes. Innovate, lead and drive actionable adoption of insights through the support and maintenance of current/existing tools and the development of new dashboard and analytics solutions using Microsoft’s Azure, Power BI, and other solutions.', ' Create and maintain data driven solutions and processes to extract insights in creative ways using confirmatory and exploratory analytics.', ' Manage the end to end analytics of our proprietary approach to revenue optimization and apply creativity to generate new data driven insights to create value in our market.', ' Work closely with data engineers to understand data structures and requirements.', ' Ability to create scalable data driven tools to support business applications and processes to drive effective and optimal business decisions.', ' Passion for developing data driven tools backed by analytics and algorithms to support business applications and processes.', ' Experience developing and supporting reporting solutions, dashboards & scorecards using Microsoft Suite (Azure, Power BI, Excel).']
